They lift him easily and get him aboard the boat for the return trip. It comes out that he hasn't been working voluntarily as Monroe has been holding his family hostage. Not to worry they tell him: while Miles, Charlie and Nora were kidnapping him, Neville was out snatching his family and as long as he works for them, his family will be safe. ...

2070791.title: The Longest Day
2070791.description: Monroe realizes the rebels are winning the war and decides they must eliminate Miles. They launch a drone attack against the rebel camp but most and Miles believes they have a mole in their midst. Charlie is trapped in the rubble leaving Miles and Nora to rescue her while Neville rescues his son. The tide turns and the entire Georgia Federation is threatened. There's an attempt on Monroe's life and Jeremy Baker pays the price. Meanwhile, Aaron tries to use the device Rachel took out of her son Danny to heal her badly broken leg. They are taken prisoner by people who ...

2070791.title: Clue
2070791.description: Nora has been taken prisoner and Monroe has her tortured after she refuses to tell him where Miles is hiding. She breaks after three weeks telling them everything they want to know including the fact that Rachel is heading to the tower in Colorado. Randall explains that it's an old Department of Defense facility in Colorado of no importance but caught in a lie, he confesses what can really be found there. In Atlanta, the population is fleeing the city as Miles and the Federation's forces prepare to attack Philadelphia. Nora is rescued by Sanborn and taken to the city....

2070791.title: Children of Men
2070791.description: Rachel's attempt to kill Monroe is unsuccessful but it turns out that she can open the blast doors to the tower while Randall Flynn can't. Once inside Flynn says they need to go down to level 12 but only get as as level 11 where those who are guarding the tower ambush them. The tower is a former Defense Department base and safe haven for senior government personnel. Rachel and Monroes escape the ambush but she is loath to help him find a way out. Meanwhile Miles, Charlie, Nora, Jason and Tom Neville have also arrived at the tower. They soon meet up with Aaron who uses...

2070791.title: The Dark Tower
2070791.description: As the Rebels infiltrate the tower, Rachel and Aaron try to convince Dan and Grace to let them turn the power back on.

2070791.title: Born in the U.S.A.
2070791.description: Rachel unexpectedly encounters an important figure from her past. Charlie finds herself on a mission in the Plains Nation. Neville and Jason search a refugee camp for Julia.

2070791.title: There Will Be Blood
2070791.description: Miles finds himself in danger when he ends up in the clutches of Andover, Charlie searches for Monroe, Rachel and Gene desperately try to revive Aaron, and Neville devises a plan to infiltrate The Patriots.

2070791.title: Love Story
2070791.description: Rachel attempts to rescue Miles and to escape with Andover's terminally ill wife. Neville and Jason are caught off-guard. Charlie and Adam are at odds over what to do with Monroe.

2070791.title: Patriot Games
2070791.description: Rachel is suspicious when she awakens to find the Patriots in charge of Willoughby.

2070791.title: One Riot, One Ranger
2070791.description: Aaron and Rachel speculate on the extreme effects of Nano technology. Meanwhile a figure from Miles's past reemerges.

2070791.title: Dead Man Walking
2070791.description: With Monroe facing the death penalty, Miles considers the consequences of his actions. As Charlie, Rachel and Gene question Monroe's true allegiance - since he might be their only ally in stopping the patriots, Miles himself is wary of his former friend's intentions. Meanwhile, Aaron continues to have visions that lead to endless questions.

2070791.title: The Patriot Act
2070791.description: Miles and Company are trapped in Willoughby. When Rachel discovers some unsettling truths, Miles does what he does best to overcome obstacles before him and those he cares about. Meanwhile, Charlie shares a moment with her mom, as Neville and Jason continue their struggles between father and son.

2070791.title: Come Blow Your Horn
2070791.description: Aaron's deathly experience catches people's attention. As Miles and the gang try to escape the perils of their current situation, Rachel and Gene continue to struggle with their relationship, which affects Charlie. Meanwhile, Neville takes a gamble with the Patriots.

2070791.title: Everyone Says I Love You
2070791.description: Neville and Jason run into a familiar face. Rachel and Gene's relationship remains strained. Aaron continues to have strange visions.

2070791.title: Three Amigos
2070791.description: Neville and Julia mount a new plot while Aaron quests after the nanites in Spring City. Monroe, Miles and Rachel travel to Mexico to find Monroe's son.

2070791.title: Mis Dos Padres
2070791.description: As Monroe finds himself in unfamiliar territory, Neville and Julia continue to tango at Jason's dismay. Meanwhile, Gene leads Charlie to an uneasy discovery.

2070791.title: Captain Trips
2070791.description: A reluctant Rachel and Charlie help Gene when he decides to assist the residents of Willoughby. Meanwhile, Miles and Monroe continue to join forces in order to survive.

2070791.title: Happy Endings
2070791.description: While Monroe leads Connor and Charlie on a risky mission, Miles and Rachel watch over Willoughby. Meanwhile, Aaron and Priscilla reunite with an old friend and Neville gets a new assignment.

2070791.title: Fear and Loathing
2070791.description: Doyle hits Willoughby, Peter threatens Aaron and Priscilla, and Monroe and Connor are forced to fight to the death.

2070791.title: Dreamcatcher
2070791.description: Familiar faces re-appear as a confused Aaron awakes to a world with power.

2070791.title: Exposition Boulevard
2070791.description: Miles, Charlie and Connor discover Willoughby now has a reeducation center. Rachel and Miles clash over how to fight the Patriots. Neville and Jason gain an ally.

2070791.title: Why We Fight
2070791.description: While Gene and Miles venture into Willoughby in search of allies, Monroe seizes an opportunity to surprise the Patriots. Meanwhile, Neville's political maneuverings put him and Jason in serious danger.

2070791.title: Austin City Limits
2070791.description: Jason turns to Miles with crucial information about the Patriots' next steps for Texas. Aaron grows suspicious of Priscilla's increasingly unusual behavior.

2070791.title: S#!& Happens
2070791.description: When Neville finds out about his son, he threatens Charlie to tell him what happened.

2070791.title: Tomorrowland
2070791.description: Empowered with authority by the President, Truman launches a mustard gas attack to kill Miles and Monroe. To Rachel's disappointment, Miles agrees to join Monroe in a ruthless plot to beat the Patriots at their own game. Meanwhile, Neville faces his own challenge from the Patriots, and Aaron grows increasingly alarmed by the power of the nanotech.

2070791.title: Memorial Day
2070791.description: United by their desire to take the Patriots down, Neville and Monroe form an uneasy alliance. While searching for Aaron, Rachel comes face to face with the nanotech; and things don't go according to plan for Miles, Charlie and Gene when they try to steal the Patriots' supply of mustard gas.

2070791.title: Declaration of Independence
2070791.description: In the series finale, the stakes are higher than ever as the Patriots prepare for war. Miles, Charlie and Monroe launch an attack on the Patriots, but must improvise a risky new plan in order to halt the oncoming war between California and Texas. Out for revenge, Neville sets his sights on President Davis. Meanwhile, Aaron and Rachel's efforts to save Priscilla from the nanotech have unexpected consequences.

2085059.title: The National Anthem
2085059.description: Prime Minister Michael Callow faces a shocking dilemma when Princess Susannah, a much-loved member of the Royal Family, is kidnapped.

2085059.title: Fifteen Million Merits
2085059.description: In a world where people's lives consist of riding exercise bikes to gain credits, Bing tries to help a woman get on to a singing competition show.

2085059.title: The Entire History of You
2085059.description: In the near future, everyone has access to a memory implant that records everything they do, see and hear - a sort of Sky Plus (Digital Video Recorder) for the brain. You need never forget a face again - but is that always a good thing?

2085059.title: Be Right Back
2085059.description: After learning about a new service that lets people stay in touch with the deceased, a lonely, grieving Martha reconnects with her late lover.

2085059.title: White Bear
2085059.description: Victoria wakes up and cannot remember anything about her life. Everyone she encounters refuses to communicate with her, and they all seem to know something she doesn't. But what?

2085059.title: The Waldo Moment
2085059.description: A failed comedian who voices a popular cartoon bear named Waldo finds himself mixing in politics when TV executives want Waldo to run for office.

2085059.title: White Christmas
2085059.description: Three interconnected tales of technology run amok during the Christmas season are told by two men at a remote outpost in a frozen wilderness.

2085059.title: Nosedive
2085059.description: A woman desperate to boost her social media score hits the jackpot when she's invited to a swanky wedding, but the trip doesn't go as planned.

2085059.title: Playtest
2085059.description: An American traveler short on cash signs up to test a revolutionary new gaming system, but soon can't tell where the hot game ends and reality begins.

2085059.title: Shut Up and Dance
2085059.description: When withdrawn Kenny stumbles headlong into an online trap, he is quickly forced into an uneasy alliance with shifty Hector, both at the mercy of persons unknown.

2085059.title: San Junipero
2085059.description: In a seaside town in 1987, a shy young woman and an outgoing party girl strike up a powerful bond that seems to defy the laws of space and time.

2085059.title: Men Against Fire
2085059.description: Future soldiers Stripe and Raiman must protect frightened villagers from an infestation of vicious feral mutants.

2085059.title: Hated in the Nation
2085059.description: In near-future London, police detective Karin Parke, and her tech-savvy sidekick Blue, investigate a string of mysterious deaths with a sinister link to social media.

2085059.title: USS Callister
2085059.description: A woman wakes up on a Star Trek-esque ship where the crew praise their all knowing and fearless captain.

2085059.title: Arkangel
2085059.description: After nearly losing her daughter, a mother invests in a new technology that allows her to keep track of her.

2085059.title: Crocodile
2085059.description: A woman interviews various people using a device that allows her to access their memories.

2085059.title: Hang the DJ
2085059.description: Paired up by a dating program that puts an expiration date on all relationships, Frank and Amy soon begin to question the system's logic.

2085059.title: Metalhead
2085059.description: In the post-apocalyptic landscape of the Scottish Moors, a woman attempts to survive the land full of "dogs".

2085059.title: Black Museum
2085059.description: A woman enters the Black Museum, where the proprietor tells his stories relating to the artefacts.

2092588.title: To the Ends of the Earth
2092588.description: At the North Pole, the sun returns after six months of darkness.

2092588.title: Spring
2092588.description: Each spring, massive sweet water thawing rapidly transforms the polar regions and the surrounding seas, where broken-off ice floats to. This is crucial in the life cycle of many species, sometimes extremely elaborate. Many colonies (re)unite to mate, hatch and/or start raising offspring, especially in 'temperate' parts, such as South Georgia island.

2092588.title: Summer
2092588.description: In Summer, the non-stop sunlight fires an unrelenting thaw, transforming much of the polar regions into fertile land and open sea, while immense masses of melted sweet water pour into the oceans. Many species profit from the relatively benign conditions to mate, breed and raise their young. However for some, such as ice-bears, the lack of ice also causes major troubles in foraging and just moving around.

2092588.title: Autumn
2092588.description: After non-stop summer months, the polar regions have expanded maximally, abundant food turns even the bears sociable. However the shortening of days soon starts reversing the process as frost expands the ice again. So many seasonal migrations turn too, mainly leaving for warmer regions. A stunning exception are the 'giant' emperor penguins, who arrive to mate, lay and raise their eggs in heroic defiance of the planet's harshest conditions.

2092588.title: Winter
2092588.description: The polar struggle to survive is even harder in winter, missing a single rare prey can be lethal. Well-adapted anatomy is crucial, but also tricks such as isolation with snow or preys' fur. The Antarctic is nearly deserted, except for seals and emperor penguins, even the slightly milder Artic is left by most species, failing to do so is a gamble which can exterminate entire populations.

2092588.title: The Last Frontier
2092588.description: The polar regions are earth's least hospitable environment, yet people live in the Arctic regions. Modern urbanized life is possibly even there thanks to technology, but some (often tribal) communities still practice traditional methods, dependent on specific fauna, such as reindeer herding, dog sleds, hunting seals and collecting bird eggs. Some of those are even used by modern patrols in mineral-rich parts, e.g. in Greenland. The even harsher Antartic, were territorial claims are frozen, remains off-limits for exploitation, except controlled eco-friendly tourism and...

2092588.title: On Thin Ice
2092588.description: David Attenborough journeys to both polar regions to investigate what rising temperatures will mean for the people and wildlife that live there.

2092588.title: The Epic Journey
2092588.description: The harsh lives of polar species, like the Antarctic penguin and the Arctic polar bear, as the seasons turn and climatic change exacts a growing toll.

2092588.title: Science at the End of the Earth
2092588.description: During the filming of Frozen Planet, the team got unprecedented access to film the story of the South Pole Station - the most extreme and remote scientific research base on earth. This film traces the history of the base, which began unwittingly with early explorers like Scott and Amundsen and their quest to be the first humans to reach the South Pole, dragging tools and supplies behind them. Today, modern scientists have access to much more hi-tech instruments and we meet a team working on one of the most extreme scientific projects on earth.

2167393.title: A New War Begins
2167393.description: Out of the turmoil of the Civil War, America enters an age of enlightenment that will change the landscape of the country forever. The growth is driven by five insightful men who will change the world forever.

2167393.title: Bloody Battles
2167393.description: As it recovers from the Civil War, America undertakes the largest building phase of the country s history. While much of the growth is driven by railroads and oil, it's built using steel.

2167393.title: Changing the Game
2167393.description: The steel and oil have forever changed the face of America, but they are just the beginning. JP Morgan arrives on the scene and expedites growth through finance.

2167393.title: When One Ends, Another Begins
2167393.description: Railroads, oil, steel and electricity have all been harnessed in less than 50 years, but the face of America is changing and will never be the same.

2167393.title: A New Rival Emerges
2167393.description: While Carnegie and Rockefeller continue to battle, JP Morgan arrives on the scene and establishes a bank in New York City that has one goal: to further the technological advancements of America. Morgan s first investment is in Thomas Edison s new development--Edison has developed electric light.

2167393.title: Owning It All
2167393.description: With an investment from Morgan, the Edison Electric Company is created and begins wiring homes in New York. A rival, Nikola Tesla, soon emerges with a different technology for electric light. Edison is convinced his is better and goes to war with Tesla. As things escalate, Morgan begins to lose faith. Eventually, Tesla s technology prevails and his theory of Alternating Current (AC) becomes the standard. Morgan fires Edison and renames Edison Electric Company as General Electric (GE). GE is still one of the biggest companies in the world today. Edison vows never to ...

2167393.title: Taking the White House
2167393.description: Vanderbilt, Rockefeller, Carnegie, and Morgan have gone unmonitored for decades, but American politicians are about to change that. They want these men to fall into line under government control. The men, some lifelong enemies, come together with a plan to buy the White House by donating the modern day equivalent of $30 million dollars to Ohio Governor, William McKinley. McKinley intends to repay his backers; he repeals regulation after regulation to allow them the freedom to do unimaginable things without consequence or impediment. Morgan and Carnegie create US Steel...

2167393.title: The New Machine
2167393.description: A young engineer named Henry Ford devises the plan for a gas-powered car. McKinley is assassinated and his VP Theodore Roosevelt takes office and quickly passes a series of regulations increasing oversight of American business. Ford receives his financial backing and comes up with the concept of the assembly line. He targets the middle class with his new product and changes the landscape of America. Rockefeller is put on trial for anti-trust violations. He loses in court and his company, Standard Oil, is one of the first monopolies broken up by the US government. JP ...

2172103.title: Captain
2172103.description: Captain Marcus Chaplin is commander of the USS Colorado, a ballistic missile submarine. He has a good crew and all are quite good at their jobs. They receive an order to launch two missiles - the target is Pakistan - but they've received the order over a low security radio band and when he requests confirmation, Chaplin is relieved of command. His XO Sam Kendal also requests confirmation and soon after, the Colorado is fired upon - by a U.S. destroyer. Chaplin realizes they are in very deep and heads to a nearby island for safety. The locals aren't too keen with the ...

2172103.title: Blue on Blue
2172103.description: A fleet of U.S. warships approaches the 200 mile perimeter Capt. Chaplin has declared but he also activates the prototype Perseus system which makes the sub virtually invisible. On the island, about one-quarter of the crew are refusing to report for duty. But that isn't their only problem. When a airplane approaches the island they suspect teams of special forces may now be on the island. From the brig, Chief Prosser is making his own plans and encouraging disloyalty among the enlisted sailors. In Washington XO Sam Kendal's wife is under pressure to talk to her ...

2172103.title: Eight Bells
2172103.description: The crew is growing restless and some are refusing to take orders. Chief Prosser and the Captain come to an accommodation however and they agree to work together. The Captain wants to find his three missing crewmen and asks Julian Serrat for his help. There is a price to be paid however and one that he finds difficult to meet leading to a death. In Washington, Admiral Arthur Shepard wants to find out how and why the order to the Colorado went over the Antarctic network. He turns to Kylie Sinclair to get the answers for him. She is despondent however that the ...

2172103.title: Voluntold
2172103.description: Morale is not good and some of the crew are starting to have second thoughts about the current command structure. The Captain's solution is quite straightforward - give the crew the choice of staying with the boat or not. The exec isn't so sure that's very practical. When one of the sailor's is caught taking a shot at the Captain, the sailor claims he's acting under orders - and it turns out individual messages have been sent by the Defense Department to sailors telling them they can do so. The Captain is defiant and isn't going to back down even after some try to ...

2172103.title: Skeleton Crew
2172103.description: As Marcus (Andre Braugher) and Sam (Scott Speedman) negotiate with the Secretary of Defense, Grace (Daisy Betts) leads the Colorado on a risky mission to repair the island's damaged sonar defenses.

2172103.title: Another Fine Navy Day
2172103.description: A commando raid that contaminates the island's drinking water sends Marcus (Andre Braugher) and a skeleton crew out to sea to protect the sub, while Sam (Scott Speedman) struggles with drug-induced hallucinations as he tries to fend off the attack.

2172103.title: Nuke It Out
2172103.description: As Marcus (Andre Braugher) and Sam (Scott Speedman) hunt for the traitor in their ranks who stole their nuclear launch key, Prosser (Robert Patrick) disobeys orders and starts a small war he can't control. Meanwhile Grace and James must work together to defuse a dangerous situation, while back in D.C. Christine is indicted as Sam's co-conspirator.

2172103.title: Big Chicken Dinner
2172103.description: "Big Chicken Dinner" - Marcus brings the members of the Colorado and the islanders all together to celebrate their two cultures -- a feast in the spirit of Thanksgiving. But the good times suddenly turn bad the next morning when an essential crew member is accused of a serious crime. Grace handles the man's defense and she's tasked with finding out the truth.

2172103.title: Cinderella Liberty
2172103.description: Marcus (Andre Braugher) must consider launching a nuclear missile on Indian troops moving into Pakistan in order to stop the slaughter of his crew's family members as they approach the island.

2172103.title: Blue Water
2172103.description: Sam and James go to Manila to find Christine. James approaches a former SEAL who lives there for help. A Chinese envoy arrives and offers to provide Marcus with supplies. Prosser who's been nursing his injury and has become addicted to pain meds, returns. And Marcus is forced to resort an unusual tactic to discipline the men.

2172103.title: Damn the Torpedoes
2172103.description: As a coup is hatched in Washington, D.C., Marcus (Andre Braugher) accepts the Chinese government's offer of assistance, placing the United States at odds with the rival superpower and the USS Colorado on a collision course with a Navy destroyer.

2172103.title: The Pointy End of the Spear
2172103.description: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard trying to bring down the president using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan. This affords Marcus the opportunity to surrender the Colorado, if all goes according to plan. Ernie Hudson guest stars as Speaker of the House Conrad Buell. He meets with a small group of Washington heavyweights to discuss an unthinkable development, while Kylie's video information helps persuade him to participate in a highly risky and treasonous maneuver.

2172103.title: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
2172103.description: In the season finale, a violent battle for control erupts on the submarine, which leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party - one with an exploitative plan. The question becomes: can Marcus and Sam take control of the sub before it's too late?

2234222.title: Natural Selection
2234222.description: Sarah Manning witnesses the death of a woman who looks exactly like her. She decides to escape her dramatic life and take the woman's identity for her own. But converting to a new life is harder than she expected.

2234222.title: Instinct
2234222.description: Sarah looks deeper into the secret life that Beth seems to have lead. Art refuses to return Beth's money until Sarah goes through with the hearing.

2234222.title: Variation Under Nature
2234222.description: Sarah has reinstated Beth into the detective force just as law enforcement finds Katja Obinger's body.

2234222.title: Effects of External Conditions
2234222.description: While Sarah tries to track down her mysterious blonde clone, Alison fills in for Sarah on a visit to see her daughter.

2234222.title: Conditions of Existence
2234222.description: Both Sarah and Alison believe that their lovers are actually monitoring them. Vic finds out that Sarah's alive.

2234222.title: Variations Under Domestication
2234222.description: Sarah's hunt for answers is interrupted by a trip to the suburbs. Alison's paranoia has boiled over, putting all the Orphans at risk. But when Sarah, Alison and Beth's worlds dangerously collide, Sarah must decide who to trust with her secret.

2234222.title: Parts Developed in an Unusual Manner
2234222.description: With Paul missing, Sarah is forced to confront the conspiracy head on. But when Paul learns Sarah has kept essential information from him, the fragile trust between them threatens to shatter. Meanwhile, Cosima grows closer to Delphine and the dangerously fascinating Dr. Leekie.

2234222.title: Entangled Bank
2234222.description: Art and Angela investigate Sarah's life. Alison has an affair with her best friend's husband. Paul ties up a loose end. Helena finds Sarah's weak spot.

2234222.title: Unconscious Selection
2234222.description: After Kira's life is threatened, Sarah is on the warpath, but Dr. Leekie makes her think twice about her plans for revenge. Meanwhile, Cosima faces the truth about Delphine, forcing her to choose sides. Now, it's up to Sarah to decide the killer's fate, but the truth about where Sarah came from changes everything.

2234222.title: Endless Forms Most Beautiful
2234222.description: Dr. Leekie offers deals to both Alison and Cosima. Sarah meets Rachel Duncan. Delphine tries to make amends. Alison tries to get her life back together. Helena escapes.

2234222.title: Nature Under Constraint and Vexed
2234222.description: Rachel has kidnapped Kira and Mrs. S. While trying to elude Rachel's thugs herself, Sarah has to decide whether to trust Paul as the person who has the best access to Rachel of those she knows in order to get Kira back. All Paul does tell Sarah is that there is a black tie event at Dyad at which Rachel will be in attendance. Sarah decides that she needs to attend the event - Cosima who already is an invitee - but has no plan beyond knowing that she will need to get in there with concealed gun in hand. With this scant outline of a plan, Sarah enlists the help of Felix ...

2234222.title: Governed by Sound Reason and True Religion
2234222.description: On information from Art, Sarah learns that it is not Rachel who abducted Kira, but rather the Prolethians, the reasons she does not know behind the abduction. However, there is no news whatsoever about Mrs. S, who she believes must have also been abducted along with Kira, which is only of little concern to her based on what her birth mother told her before her death. Regardless, Sarah decides to trust Art so that he can help her locate Kira. What Sarah discovers in the matter is not quite what she expects, which results in her not knowing who to trust. Art also tries ...

2234222.title: Mingling Its Own Nature with It
2234222.description: Sarah is able to escape with Kira from the bird watchers and Mrs. S, and now, along with Felix, are on the run with no money. They decide to take refuge at a secluded house where the owner seems to be away. But the choice of the house is no accident. This stop has an unintended effect on Felix. As Alison prepares for opening night, she slowly begins to unravel under all the pressure, which includes meeting someone who she believes is another monitor. Cosima learns from Delphine of yet another clone, Jennifer, who recently died from whatever ails Cosima herself. They ...

2234222.title: Governed as It Were by Chance
2234222.description: Sarah survives the car crash, is quickly reunited with Kira and sets off with Cal in his camper. She decides to head back to the city to find out from Mrs. S just what is going on. She also pays a visit to Rachel which doesn't quite go as expected. At the Dyad Institute, Cosima takes on the task of finding out about Project Leda. Alison awakens from her drug and alcohol stupor to find her right arm in a sling - and that she's in a rehab clinic. Felix convinces her she should spend a week there and just rest. Henrik Johanssen makes it clear to his daughter Gracie that ...

2234222.title: Ipsa Scientia Potestas Est
2234222.description: Rachel returns home to find Rosen dead, which she takes out on Sarah and Cosima. She also makes Paul an offer he can't refuse, even if he wanted to. In this new position, Paul decides to use Felix to help Rachel. Leekie, unlike Rachel, shows that his plans veer toward the truly scientific, he who provides Cosima and Delphine with some information about the clones' past. Feeling indebted to Helena for saving her from Rosen, Sarah decides to help Helena within the bounds of what Sarah believes is right. Helena may have thoughts of her own about what she wants to achieve...

2234222.title: To Hound Nature in Her Wanderings
2234222.description: Sarah and Helena are traveling together to Cold River to find out more about their clone past and specifically the person who Helena refers to as the Swan Man. This trip marks the first time that Helena has felt a sense of freedom in a long time. This freedom, however, may ultimately cause problems for her. Sarah's quest for information takes her to some unlikely places, or more precisely to some unexpected people. She gets some help in this quest by Art and Felix, who have the information obtained from Maggie Chen's storage unit. Felix, however, is often in a state ...

2234222.title: Knowledge of Causes, and Secret Motion of Things
2234222.description: When a rehab confidante betrays Alison and threatens to expose the truth about Aynsley's death, she goes into free fall on the eve of Family Day. With Donnie and the kids set to visit, it's all clones on deck to contain the fallout.

2234222.title: Variable and Full of Perturbation
2234222.description: A new player in the clone conspiracy turns up at Felix's door, sending him into crisis mode. With Cosima running out of options, Sarah struggles with the decision to surrender a crucial piece of leverage and make a deal with DYAD.

2234222.title: Things Which Have Never Yet Been Done
2234222.description: Cosima takes a turn for the worse, forcing Sarah to take desperate action - with tragic consequences for those she loves. The Proletheans set their ultimate plan in motion. Alison and Donnie tangle with the law.

2234222.title: By Means Which Have Never Yet Been Tried
2234222.description: After the successful abduction of Kira, Sarah prepares to surrender to Rachel and the Dyad Group; but the Clone Club has other ideas as they band together to pull off the ultimate rescue.

2234222.title: The Weight of This Combination
2234222.description: Sarah pursues the missing Helena who is held in a faraway compound. Sarah must use her wiles - and acting chops - to deter a Topside investigator who threatens the Leda sisters' lives. Meanwhile, Cosima appears to be rebounding from her illness, while Alison and Donnie face newfound financial woes. But when the menace of Castor rears its head once more, Sarah and her entire family must come together to survive.

2234222.title: Transitory Sacrifices of Crisis
2234222.description: Castor pursues the Leda clones for original tissue samples. Helena, who is pregnant and imprisoned, is examined by a mysterious new villain. The Castor boys are also out to play, sexually assaulting a frightened young woman, Patty, which ultimately sets Sarah - and Art - hot on the Castor trail. Sarah gleans they may have a mysterious defect that puts their lives in peril.

2234222.title: Formalized, Complex, and Costly
2234222.description: Leda and Castor are both on the hunt for original clone DNA. On-the-lam, Mark and Gracie pursue new leads to find the samples that might set them free, while Art and Sarah reunite to track them down. Meanwhile, Cosima and Scott try to learn more about Castor's biology and Alison's new money-making venture is going gangbusters. A shocking revelation about the Castor-Leda connection leaves the sisters reeling, just before Sarah witnesses a deadly Prolethean-Castor face-off.

2234222.title: Newer Elements of Our Defense
2234222.description: Sarah's fate hangs in the balance as she tries to save her sister.

2234222.title: Scarred by Many Past Frustrations
2234222.description: Sarah and Helena suffer a strained reunion; the Leda family worries about Sarah's absence.

2234222.title: Certain Agony of the Battlefield
2234222.description: Paul learns the truth about Coady's plans for Castor and has no choice but to make a dangerous play.

2234222.title: Community of Dreadful Fear and Hate
2234222.description: Sarah and Helena have managed to escape from the Castor compound, and arranging with Mrs. S are awaiting Benjamin's arrival in the Mexican desert to retrieve them. However, they are surprised to see that their retriever is Mrs. S herself. This meeting allows for a showdown between Helena and Mrs. S, the former who wants to kill the latter for selling her out. With Cosima's new relationship with Shay being strong, Cosima is having problems dealing with Delphine, whether it be on a professional or personal level. Cosima feels like betraying a request by Delphine without...

2234222.title: Ruthless in Purpose, and Insidious in Method
2234222.description: Ruthless in Purpose, and Insidious in Method Rachel bargains for her freedom with decoding Duncan's Moreau book.

2234222.title: Insolvent Phantom of Tomorrow
2234222.description: Clone Club heads to London to track down the Castor Original, but their enemies follow closely.

2234222.title: History Yet to Be Written
2234222.description: Kendall may be the key to stop Castor; the sisters appear to be thwarting their most dangerous foe.

2234222.title: The Collapse of Nature
2234222.description: A flashback to Beth Childs' final investigation, days before her suicide.

2234222.title: Transgressive Border Crossing
2234222.description: After fleeing Iceland, Sarah begins searching for M.K. and uncovers new clues to Beth's breakdown. Scott learns Kendall Malone is hiding something.

2234222.title: The Stigmata of Progress
2234222.description: As Sarah scrambles to learn more about her implant, Alison and Donnie take a drastic step to help. Meanwhile, Kira has a disturbing vision.

2234222.title: From Instinct to Rational Control
2234222.description: While Cosima examines Leekie's body, Felix and Donnie pose as a couple to learn more about a fertility clinic. Sarah discovers M.K. has her own agenda.

2234222.title: Human Raw Material
2234222.description: A risky cover mission at Brightborn yields several big surprises. The rift between Sarah and Felix grows as she checks up on Adele.

2234222.title: The Scandal of Altruism
2234222.description: Seeing that it is the best overall solution yet not perfect by any means, Sarah and Cosima decide with Kendall's OK to set up an agreement with Susan Duncan, which they will not divulge to Mrs. S. until everything is arranged as they know she won't like what they've done. That agreement is an agent representing Susan will remove the bot from Sarah's cheek, with Cosima on site to ensure Sarah's safety. As Scott and Cosima have not yet come up with a "cure" for Cosima and the other affected Leda clones, they in turn will provide their research and Kendall to Susan, with...

2234222.title: The Antisocialism of Sex
2234222.description: Sarah regresses to old habits while struggling to cope with the consequences of her decisions - reconnecting with Beth on a dark night of the soul. Back at the lab, Cosima, haunted by vicious memories and news of Delphine, attempts a dangerous Hail Mary to find a cure. At the Hendrixes, Alison is more determined than ever to create normalcy for her kids. As she forges ahead with a birthday party, Donnie is caught in the Neolution crosshairs.

2234222.title: The Redesign of Natural Objects
2234222.description: Siobhan wants vengeance for her mother. Cosima and Susan Duncan try to come together to try to finally find the cure. Neolution continues with their threats causing Alison to be terrified, and Mrs. To question her loyalty to her sestras.

2234222.title: The Mitigation of Competition
2234222.description: The formal alliance between the sisters on one side Susan/Rachel/Ira on the other side begins in earnest. Cosima has arrived on the island where she and Susan will begin the process of finding a cure for both Leda and Castor by developing original DNA in the absence of Kendall through fertilization of one of Sarah's eggs with Ira's sperm, while Sarah and Felix meet with Rachel and Ira to discuss the next step in bringing down Evie Cho and restoring Susan as the head of Neolution. As Evie ramps up her media campaign to bring BrightBorn's work to the masses, Sarah, ...

2234222.title: From Dancing Mice to Psychopaths
2234222.description: When communication with Cosima is cut off and Neolution appears to be within striking distance, Sarah's alliance with Rachel goes out the window. Sarah lures a high-level Neolutionist into a trap, and sets out to bring down Neolution once and for all.

2234222.title: The Few Who Dare
2234222.description: Desperate to get off the island and reunite with her family, a wounded Sarah journeys into the island's interior, only to discover a mysterious village - the beating heart of the Neolution agenda.

2234222.title: Clutch of Greed
2234222.description: Dragged home from the Island by Neolution, Sarah refuses to follow Rachel's new regime. Sarah sets a plan in motion to get her and her daughter out of Neolution's reach for good.

2234222.title: Beneath Her Heart
2234222.description: As Clone Club reels from the loss of one of their own, Sarah gnaws at the shackles Rachel has firmly placed around her family. Alison struggles to find her place in the sisterhood.

2234222.title: Let the Children and Childbearers Toil
2234222.description: Sarah and Siobhan follow a lead on a Neolution defector, hoping for enough leverage to free Kira from Dyad's clutches. Also, Cosima investigates rumors about a creature in the woods.

2234222.title: Ease for Idle Millionaires
2234222.description: While Sarah and Kira spend time at home bonding, Cosima unlocks the island's biggest secret, discovering a link between the village's so-called creature and the science around Kira.

2234222.title: Manacled Slim Wrists
2234222.description: Cosima is forced into an alliance with Susan Duncan when an old enemy returns to the Island. Meanwhile, on the mainland, Krystal stumbles onto a vital clue to the Neolution endgame.

2234222.title: Gag or Throttle
2234222.description: As Westmoreland demands a more aggressive approach with Kira, and Sarah fights to save her daughter, Rachel discovers a dark secret that makes her question her place within Neolution.

2234222.title: Guillotines Decide
2234222.description: Now that Sarah and Mrs. S have Kira back, they need to get her into a safe place. The activity around their house is remarkably quiet which Sarah believes is not a good sign. However, Mrs. S would like them now to focus on other things in their lives, namely Felix's first art exhibit in two years, he and Adele who have come back from their sleuthing in Switzerland. This exhibit is important for Felix as major art dealers and critics will be in attendance. All the sisters who are around - Sarah, Alison and Cosima - know the role they are to play in Felix's big day. ...

2234222.title: One Fettered Slave
2234222.description: Sarah, Felix and Kira mourning the death of S coincides with they and the other sisters learning from Sister Irina that Helena has been kidnapped. The sisters' first thought is that she has been taken to the island, but they figure that the one person who they now may seemingly be able to trust to some extent that would know for sure is Rachel. Rachel is only able to fill in some of the pieces. However, with news of Dyad's involvement in the genetics project hitting the media, Interpol has been called in to take over from the police the investigation of the deaths of ...

2234222.title: To Right the Wrongs of Many
2234222.description: Now in labor, Helena is forced to hunker down in the basement of Old Dyad for the delivery. It's a cage match for survival as Sarah and Art struggle to protect her in a desperate last stand against Neolution.

2364582.title: Pilot
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D. puts together a special team, led by Agent Phil Coulson, to track down a mysterious man with special abilities and the young computer hacker that's encouraging him to reveal himself to the world.
While extracting a strange object out of Peru, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents are taken hostage aboard their plane.

2364582.title: The Asset
2364582.description: Dr. Franklin Hall has been kidnapped. Coulson and his team are assigned to rescue him.

2364582.title: Eye Spy
2364582.description: The team tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing valuable information.

2364582.title: Girl in the Flower Dress
2364582.description: Centipede kidnaps another gifted man. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to track them down. Also, secrets about Skye are revealed.

2364582.title: FZZT
2364582.description: Simmons becomes infected with an alien virus after exposing herself to a group of people that have come into contact with a Chitauri helmet.

2364582.title: The Hub
2364582.description: Ward and Fitz are sent on a classified mission in South Ossetia.

2364582.title: The Well
2364582.description: Ward becomes exposed to a piece of an Asgardian staff, which causes his worst memory to resurface.

2364582.title: Repairs
2364582.description: The agents investigate the strange occurrences of a woman who, they believe, has telekinetic powers.

2364582.title: The Bridge
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D. receives assistance from Mike Peterson as they take on Centipede once again.

2364582.title: The Magical Place
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D. organizes a full scale hunt for Coulson. Centipede tries to resurface the memories on what happened after Coulson died.

2364582.title: Seeds
2364582.description: While investigating a problem at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy, Coulson and May turn up unexpected information about Skye's parents.

2364582.title: T.R.A.C.K.S.
2364582.description: The team tries to confiscate an important device on a train, but when one agent takes a very risky move that backfires, the entire team is affected.

2364582.title: T.A.H.I.T.I.
2364582.description: Coulson and the team rush to Bethesda in an attempt to save Skye's life.

2364582.title: Yes Men
2364582.description: While Skye recovers, Lady Sif arrives with need of assistance in capturing an escaped Asgardian prisoner, named Lorelei.

2364582.title: End of the Beginning
2364582.description: Agent Garett and Triplett have returned to assist Coulson's team hunt down S.H.I.E.L.D.'s devious nemesis--the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok kill them all to guard his master's identity?

2364582.title: Turn, Turn, Turn
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D. has been compromised by an old enemy. The team doesn't know whom to trust.

2364582.title: Providence
2364582.description: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'S most dangerous secrets -- secrets that could destroy them all.

2364582.title: The Only Light in the Darkness
2364582.description: Agent Koenig puts the team through the ultimate lie detector test and Coulson races to protect an old flame from an old enemy.

2364582.title: Nothing Personal
2364582.description: Just when there's no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill returns to team up with Coulson as S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed around them.

2364582.title: Ragtag
2364582.description: Ward's betrayal and HYDRA's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

2364582.title: Beginning of the End
2364582.description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of HYDRA.

2364582.title: Shadows
2364582.description: Carl Creel is sent after an item that was stolen from Hydra during WWII. Fitz tries to cope with his mental issues.

2364582.title: Heavy Is the Head
2364582.description: Hunter gets captured by General Talbot. May goes after Creel and the Obelisk.

2364582.title: Making Friends and Influencing People
2364582.description: Simmons is forced to help Hydra capture Donnie Gill. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to get to him first.

2364582.title: Face My Enemy
2364582.description: When May gets kidnapped, Hydra sends out an impersonator to lure Coulson into a trap. Fitz tries to find the confidence to join the rest of the team in their social activities.

2364582.title: A Hen in the Wolf House
2364582.description: Raina threatens to expose Simmons to Hydra unless Coulson hands Skye over to her father.

2364582.title: A Fractured House
2364582.description: The world turns against S.H.I.E.L.D. when Hydra impersonates them to attack The United Nations, and an unexpected enemy leads the charge to bring about their downfall.

2364582.title: The Writing on the Wall
2364582.description: A mysterious man is killing off former S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and carving the same markings as Coulson. Coulson tries to track him down. Meanwhile, May leads a team on a manhunt for Ward.

2364582.title: The Things We Bury
2364582.description: Coulson and team find themselves in an epic face-off against Hydra to uncover an ancient secret, while Ward kidnaps his brother, Senator Christian Ward, for a violent trip down memory lane.

2364582.title: Ye Who Enter Here
2364582.description: While Coulson's team tries to find the entrance to the mysterious alien city, the rest of the agents try to rescue Raina when they find out that Hydra is after her.

2364582.title: What They Become
2364582.description: Whitehall and Coulson's forces take part in an explosive confrontation that changes everyone. Skye uncovers some truths about her past.

2364582.title: Aftershocks
2364582.description: Coulson and the team are faced with the consequences of the war with Hydra. As revelations threaten to destroy them, Hydra makes a move.

2364582.title: Who You Really Are
2364582.description: Coulson and the team help a confused Lady Sif, who has lost her memory after a battle with a mysterious warrior.

2364582.title: One of Us
2364582.description: Cal wants vengeance, so he rallies a team of super villains to crush S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, May turns to her ex-husband, Dr. Andrew Garner, to help with a crisis threatening the harmony of the team.

2364582.title: Love in the Time of Hydra
2364582.description: The team are bewildered by a recent shocking revelation as they face a difficult decision. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mack declare their loyalty to Hunter; and Ward and Agent 33 take care of a private matter.

2364582.title: One Door Closes
2364582.description: War comes to Coulson's doorstep in a way he never anticipated as shocking revelations are brought to light, and Skye struggles to control her new abilities but will soon make a decision that irrevocably changes her life.

2364582.title: Afterlife
2364582.description: As Robert Gonzalez makes his move, Coulson must do whatever it takes to protect the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile Skye's journey to control her powers take a surprising turn when she meets the enigmatic Inhuman named Lincoln.

2364582.title: Melinda
2364582.description: The story of May’s transformation into “The Cavalry” is revealed. As Skye learns more about her heritage, the truth will send her in a new direction.

2364582.title: Frenemy of My Enemy
2364582.description: A dangerous new alliance is formed as Coulson and Hunter turn to the last person anyone would expect, Grant Ward! As the war between S.H.I.E.L.D. factions continues, Skye and Lincoln will find themselves drawn into this conflict.

2364582.title: The Dirty Half Dozen
2364582.description: Gonzales and Coulson must find a way to put their differences aside and work together against HYDRA, even if it means teaming up with someone they don't trust.

2364582.title: Scars
2364582.description: As tensions rise between S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Inhumans, Skye finds herself torn between the groups; Coulson reveals a secret.

2364582.title: S.O.S. Part 1
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D puts everything on the line to survive a war that blurs the line between friend and foe. Coulson and his team will be forced to make shocking sacrifices that will leave their relationships and their world changed forever.

2364582.title: S.O.S. Part 2
2364582.description: The battle between SHIELD and the Inhumans reaches its peak. SHIELD must defend their own and keep Skye safe.

2364582.title: Laws of Nature
2364582.description: Director Phil Coulson and Agent Daisy Johnson leading the charge as S.H.I.E.L.D. searches the world for more powered people in the aftermath of their epic battle with Jiaying and her army of Inhumans. However, Coulson and the team soon find out that they are not the only group looking for these new Inhumans.

2364582.title: Purpose in the Machine
2364582.description: Fitz and the team enlist the aid of an Asgardian to unlock the secrets of the ancient monolith that swallowed Simmons, and Agent May is at a crossroads in her personal and professional life.

2364582.title: A Wanted (Inhu)Man
2364582.description: Mack, Daisy, and Coulson race against time to keep Lincoln safe; Hunter will do whatever it takes to get revenge.

2364582.title: Devils You Know
2364582.description: Having reluctantly agreed to share information with Rosalind and the ATCU, Coulson and the team search for the Inhuman who is killing other Inhumans; May feels that Hunter's mission to take down Ward is getting too personal.

2364582.title: 4,722 Hours
2364582.description: After her dramatic rescue from another planet, Simmons is still reeling from her ordeal and reveals how she had to fight for her life in a harsh new world.

2364582.title: Among Us Hide...
2364582.description: The stakes get higher as May and Hunter pursue Ward and Hydra; Coulson thinks the ATCU could be keeping a big secret.

2364582.title: Chaos Theory
2364582.description: As Daisy and the team try to protect Inhumans, a shocking truth is revealed about S.H.I.E.L.D.'s biggest enemy; with Fitz's help, Simmons recovers information that could get them back through the portal.

2364582.title: Many Heads, One Tale
2364582.description: Dangerous facts about the ATCU are discovered by the team; Ward's plans to take down S.H.I.E.L.D. do not go as expected.

2364582.title: Closure
2364582.description: Ward's vendetta and plan for revenge against S.H.I.E.L.D. brings the team to their knees, and Coulson proves he will be willing to do anything to settle the conflict.

2364582.title: Maveth
2364582.description: S.H.I.E.L.D battles Hydra head-to-head, which sees Coulson and Fitz take the ultimate risk while Daisy and the Inhumans try to keep Hydra at bay.

2364582.title: Bouncing Back
2364582.description: Threats loom as the team tries to take down Hydra.

2364582.title: The Inside Man
2364582.description: Coulson and the team investigate an international conference on the fate of the Inhumans. Back on the bus, Fitzsimmons may have found a way to stop the Inhuman gene from spreading.

2364582.title: Parting Shot
2364582.description: After tracking Malick to Russia, Bobbi and Hunter become involved in an assassination plot; the team is changed forever as they race to save lives in the balance.

2364582.title: Watchdogs
2364582.description: Agent Mack and his brother step in when a radical group called the Watchdogs plan to eliminate the Inhumans; Simmons finds a powerful chemical compound.

2364582.title: Spacetime
2364582.description: When Daisy gets a horrifying glimpse of the future, S.H.I.E.L.D. races to prove that fate is not fixed.

2364582.title: Paradise Lost
2364582.description: The team hunts for information on a new enemy; Malick's secret from his past threatens to destroy his Hydra legacy.

2364582.title: The Team
2364582.description: Agent Daisy Johnson must call upon the Secret Warriors for an inaugural mission that will leave no member unscathed, and S.H.I.E.L.D. learns more about Hive's powers, forcing them to question everyone they trust.

2364582.title: The Singularity
2364582.description: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team is left reeling and decimated as Hive continues to sway Inhumans to his side. But there is a sliver of hope as Agents Fitz and Simmons follow a lead that may be able to stop the maniacal Inhuman once and for all.

2364582.title: Failed Experiments
2364582.description: As the threat of Hive looms, loyalties are put to the test and the team must come up with a decisive resolution.

2364582.title: Emancipation
2364582.description: Daisy's prophecy ticks closer towards a major loss, as the aftermath of the events of "Marvel's Captain America: Civil War" force S.H.I.E.L.D. to register the Inhumans.

2364582.title: Absolution
2364582.description: It's a showdown a season in the making as S.H.I.E.L.D. takes on Hive, and when his master plan is finally revealed, the team must spring into action.

2364582.title: Ascension
2364582.description: In the conclusion to "Absolution," S.H.I.E.L.D. must spring into action to combat Hive.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: The Ghost
2364582.description: Daisy has left S.H.I.E.L.D. and is trying to solve the mystery of a bunch of serial killings in the Los Angeles area. At the same time her old friends suspect her for the killings and are following her trail in an attempt to find her.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: Meet the New Boss
2364582.description: Daisy goes to battle Ghost Rider at a terrible cost, and Coulson faces the new director, whose bold agenda surprises them all.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: Uprising
2364582.description: Coulson, Mack and Fitz try to locate and neutralize a rogue group looking to stop Inhuman registration worldwide; Simmons and Dr. Radcliffe have only a short time to save May before she succumbs to her illness.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
2364582.description: As Ghost Rider's quest for vengeance brings him into an explosive confrontation with S.H.I.E.L.D., Coulson and Mack must rely on an unlikely ally in their time of desperate need; and Daisy reunites with a familiar face to stop the Watchdogs.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: Lockup
2364582.description: As Robbie Reyes struggles to control The Ghost Rider, S.H.I.E.L.D. infiltrates a high-security prison to unravel the secrets that haunt them all.

2364582.title: The Good Samaritan
2364582.description: The shocking origin story of Robbie's transition into Ghost Rider is revealed as the lives of Coulson and the team hang in the balance.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: Deals with Our Devils
2364582.description: With the loss of half the team, the remaining members search for answers as the clock counts down for Ghost Rider.

2364582.title: Ghost Rider: The Laws of Inferno Dynamics
2364582.description: With the lives of everyone in Los Angeles hanging in the balance, S.H.I.E.L.D. and Ghost Rider find themselves working together.

2364582.title: Broken Promises
2364582.description: Though Coulson and May are growing closer, Coulson remains unaware of the dark secret May is hiding beneath the surface. Meanwhile, Aida is unrelenting in her search for the Darkhold.

2364582.title: The Patriot
2364582.description: Separated from their team, Coulson and Mack discover a shocking secret about Mace, leaving all of S.H.I.E.L.D. in a precarious position.

2364582.title: Wake Up
2364582.description: May works to uncover the truth about what happened to her; Aida's next move puts everyone's life at risk.

2364582.title: Hot Potato Soup
2364582.description: Dr. Radcliffe goes after the Koenig family to find the location of the Darkhold. The Superior reveals his plans to Radcliffe.

2364582.title: BOOM
2364582.description: An explosive Inhuman surfaces and the team are tasked with containing it. Elsewhere: Coulson and Mack encounter Radcliffe's inspiration for Aida.

2364582.title: The Man Behind the Shield
2364582.description: Coulson and the team engage in a deadly cat-and-mouse game as they work to rescue Director Mace, who is fighting for his life.

2364582.title: Self Control
2364582.description: As Radcliffe and Aida's plan goes into action, Fitz and Simmons are trapped in the Playground unsure of which of their friends are real and which ones have been replaced by LMDs.

2364582.title: What If...
2364582.description: Daisy and Simmons uncover secrets and lies in a world gone mad. With Hydra in control, they are our only hope to save everyone.

2364582.title: Identity and Change
2364582.description: As Daisy and Simmons struggle to discover an escape route to the real world, the identity of the Inhuman leader of the Resistance is revealed.

2364582.title: No Regrets
2364582.description: The truth behind Fitz's turn threatens to bring down all of S.H.I.E.L.D.

2364582.title: All the Madame's Men
2364582.description: Daisy teams up with an unlikely partner; Aida prepares to put her endgame into effect.

2364582.title: Farewell, Cruel World!
2364582.description: The clock is ticking for Daisy and Simmons to get the team out of the Framework, but not everyone is ready and willing to leave.

2364582.title: The Return
2364582.description: Coulson and the team's victory in the Framework is short-lived, as an even deadlier enemy looms against them all.

2364582.title: World's End
2364582.description: With the surprising emergence of Ghost Rider, Coulson and the team attempt to stop Aida from ending the world.

2364582.title: Orientation: Part 1
2364582.description: Coulson and the team find themselves trapped on a mysterious ship in outer space, and that's just the beginning of the nightmare to come.

2364582.title: Orientation: Part 2
2364582.description: Coulson and the team find themselves stranded on a mysterious ship in outer space, and that's just the beginning of the nightmare to come.

2364582.title: A Life Spent
2364582.description: Daisy decides she will rescue Simmons, even though she must risk everything.

2364582.title: A Life Earned
2364582.description: Coulson and the team discover their captors' true intentions.

2364582.title: Rewind
2364582.description: With the help of Lance Hunter, nothing will stop Fitz from finding his lost team as his secret journey is revealed.

2364582.title: Fun & Games
2364582.description: With Daisy's life on the line, an unexpected friend attempts to rescue her.

2364582.title: Together or Not at All
2364582.description: Just as the team reunites, they become prey to an undefeated Kree warrior bent on killing them all.

2364582.title: The Last Day
2364582.description: Coulson and the team discover that the most unexpected person from S.H.I.E.L.D.'s past may hold the key to stopping Earth's destruction.

2364582.title: Best Laid Plans
2364582.description: Mack, Yo-Yo and Flint fight to keep everyone alive by starting a revolution against the Kree.

2364582.title: Past Life
2364582.description: The team has one final chance to return to their timeline, but their actions may have deadly consequences.

2364582.title: All the Comforts of Home
2364582.description: Coulson and his team are out to rewrite the fate of humanity but they are unaware how the changes will affect one S.H.I.E.L.D. agent's life.

2364582.title: The Real Deal
2364582.description: Coulson finally reveals the mysterious deal he made with Ghost Rider, which will impact everyone on the team.

2364582.title: Principia
2364582.description: The team goes in search of Gravitonium in order to save the world.

2364582.title: The Devil Complex
2364582.description: Fitz and Simmons are faced with one of their greatest fears as they search for a way to seal the rift.

2364582.title: Rise and Shine
2364582.description: Coulson uncovers General Hale's real agenda and it could be the end of the world if S.H.I.E.L.D. can't help her.

2364582.title: Inside Voices
2364582.description: Coulson is forced to team up with unlikely allies to save the world, while his team try to track him down and rescue him.

2364582.title: The Honeymoon
2364582.description: When an agents life hangs in the balance, Fitz, Simmons and Yo-Yo attempt to neutralise a weapon that could play a role in Earth's destruction.

2364582.title: All Roads Lead...
2364582.description: The team must find a way to stop Ruby before the prophesied chain reaction that can destroy the earth is put into motion.

2364582.title: Option Two
2364582.description: The team finds themselves trapped and under siege at the Lighthouse.

2364582.title: The One Who Will Save Us All
2364582.description: A newly determined Talbot takes Coulson to meet the enemy and attempts to avert Earth's destruction.

2364582.title: The Force of Gravity
2364582.description: Daisy's future as the destroyer of worlds could take a critical change.

2364582.title: The End
2364582.description: The team must choose between Coulson's life or death; the wrong decision will cause the destruction of Earth.

2364582.title: Missing Pieces
2364582.description: Scattered across the galaxy, the team works to find their footing in the wake of losing Coulson.

2364582.title: Window of Opportunity
2364582.description: While Fitz and Enoch struggle in space, Sarge and his team move forward with their mysterious mission on Earth.

2364582.title: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
2364582.description: While Fitz and Enoch try their luck at the casino, Daisy and Simmons find themselves in a much more exciting situation.

2364582.title: Code Yellow
2364582.description: Yo-Yo and Keller take things public; parasitic aliens threaten the human race; and someone really needs boba.

2364582.title: The Other Thing
2364582.description: Sarge has May; Altarah has Daisy, Enoch and Simmons; and now, there are two planets that need saving.

2364582.title: Inescapable
2364582.description: Fitz and Simmons have fought through space, time and alternate realities to find each other, and now, closer than ever, only their own demons can stop their mission.

2364582.title: Toldja
2364582.description: After finding themselves in yet another gambling dilemma, a mysterious stranger offers Enoch and FitzSimmons a ride home.

2364582.title: Collision Course (Part I)
2364582.description: To face The Galaxy-Hopping Hate-Beast That Eats Planets, the team on Earth asks for help in all the wrong places; while back on the Lazy Comet, something weird goes on with Izel's crew.

2364582.title: Collision Course (Part II)
2364582.description: There's no time for the team to play catch-up when there's a planet to save.

2364582.title: Leap
2364582.description: The team must trust each other in order to face impending doom and an enemy that's closer than they think.

2364582.title: From the Ashes
2364582.description: Out of answers and running out of time, the agents must face the ghosts of their past to move forward.

2364582.title: The Sign
2364582.description: With time running short, the team has to go to hell to stop the end of everything.

2364582.title: New Life
2364582.description: With time running short, the team has to go to hell to stop the end of everything.

2364582.title: The New Deal
2364582.description: Coulson and the agents are thrust backwards in time and stranded in 1931 New York City; with an all-new Zephyr set to time-jump at any moment, the team must hurry to find out exactly what happened.

2364582.title: Know Your Onions
2364582.description: With the identity of the timeline-unraveling "thread" revealed, the team's mission to protect him at all costs leads each agent to question their own values.

2364582.title: Alien Commies from the Future!
2364582.description: A surprise leap forward in time.

2364582.title: Out of the Past
2364582.description: Agent Phil Coulson comes to a realization about the importance of July 22, 1955, in the S.H.I.E.L.D. history books.

2364582.title: A Trout in the Milk
2364582.description: The team - Daniel Sousa in tow - reunites with more than one familiar face at the S.H.I.E.L.D. hangout and discovers exactly how to dismantle the Chronicoms' latest plan; the Zephyr unexpectedly leaps forward again.

2364582.title: Adapt or Die
2364582.description: The team scrambles to rescue Mack's parents.

2364582.title: The Totally Excellent Adventures of Mack and the D
2364582.description: After getting stranded in 1982, Mack retreats to his childhood home to deal with the death of his parents; Deke scouts a group of new agents.

2364582.title: After, Before
2364582.description: With the Zephyr's time drive malfunctioning, the team hurtle toward disaster with Yo-Yo as its only hope; Yo-Yo must enlist the help of an old adversary to regain her powers.

2364582.title: As I Have Always Been
2364582.description: A time storm ravages the Zephyr, propelling it toward destruction while simultaneously forcing Daisy and Coulson to relive their failed attempts to save the team.

2364582.title: Stolen
2364582.description: The team arrives back in 1983, where Nathaniel and Kora are hard at work building an army; Daisy is tasked with protecting Jiaying; the others learn they'll need to face another supercharged enemy to stop Malick.

2364582.title: Brand New Day
2364582.description: With help from Kora on the inside, Sibyl and Nathanial continue their fight to shape a dark new future for S.H.I.E.L.D., managing to stay one step ahead of the agents along the way.

2364582.title: The End is at Hand
2364582.description: Sibyl attempts to get the location of Fitz from Jemma's memories. Meanwhile, the SHIELD team attempts to stop Nathaniel's plans for anarchy and the Chronicoms' attempts to rewrite history.

2364582.title: What We're Fighting For
2364582.description: The final fight against the Chronicoms begins. A familiar face returns.

2375692.title: I.
2375692.description: 1715: The Golden Age of Piracy. New Providence is a lawless island, controlled by history's most notorious pirate captains. The most feared: Captain Flint.

2375692.title: II.
2375692.description: Flint unmasks a thief on his crew. Rackham chases a score over Vane's objection. Silver hides with Max in the brothel. Eleanor faces an impossible choice.

2375692.title: III.
2375692.description: Flint and Gates seek a partner to hunt the Urca d'Lima. Silver helps Billy with a morale problem. Vane impresses Eleanor by being reasonable. Gates gets a promotion.

2375692.title: IV.
2375692.description: An undertaking by The Walrus crew ends in disaster. Silver warns Flint about Billy. Rackham and Bonny try to regain their livelihood. Eleanor needs help from her father. A figure from Vane's past pays a visit.

2375692.title: V.
2375692.description: Flint and his crew of the Walrus play a deadly game of naval warfare when they engage Captain Bryson and the Andromache on the open sea to gain precious cargo. Meanwhile, Richard forces his daughter's hand about his business when he makes an announcement to the locals about his assets being liquidated, causing a mob to riot against Eleanor who seeks help from Hornigold.

2375692.title: VI.
2375692.description: The costs of chasing the Andromache continue to mount. Eleanor needs Silver's help. Billy wants Gates to confront Flint. Bonny takes a stand.

2375692.title: VII.
2375692.description: Flint tells Gates the truth. Randall puts Silver in a bind. Eleanor suffers a loss. Max comes to Rackham's aid. Vane enters the fight of his life.

2375692.title: VIII.
2375692.description: Silver gives Flint the last details of the schedule with the location of the ship. Eleanor's situation changes when the supply ships get sunk in the bay. Meanwhile with Mutiny rising up aboard the Walrus, Gates makes a vital decision.

2375692.title: IX.
2375692.description: Flint and Silver face judgment before the crew. Vane enjoys his new position on the island. Max confronts Bonny. Eleanor faces a new threat.

2375692.title: X.
2375692.description: Flint gives "advice" to Dufresne. John Silver works to become indispensable. Eleanor is called upon to remove Vane from power over the fort. Jack becomes envious of Anne and Max's new relationship.

2375692.title: XI.
2375692.description: Flint returns to Nassau to plan the retrieval of the gold. Rackham restores his reputation. Ned Low confronts Vane.

2375692.title: XII.
2375692.description: Seeing Flint's steady rise up the ranks leaves Vane feeling like he may be a real threat to his position, and while Eleanor determines which side to choose, elsewhere, Silver and a friend from the past are finally reunited.

2375692.title: XIII.
2375692.description: Miranda tries to save the island; Eleanor opens old wounds; Vane deals with a problem.

2375692.title: XIV.
2375692.description: Eleanor negotiates for peace; Rackham learns a lesson the hard way; Flint breaks a promise.

2375692.title: XV.
2375692.description: Max cleans up following a massacre; Flint and Silver receive surprising news from the outside world.

2375692.title: XVI.
2375692.description: Flint and Miranda brace for the worst; Eleanor learns Max's secret; Vane makes his move.

2375692.title: XVII.
2375692.description: Flint and Miranda deal with their past; Vane claims a massive prize; Eleanor declares war.

2375692.title: XVIII.
2375692.description: Flint receives aid from an unlikely ally; Vane's crew seeks a change; Silver makes a sacrifice.

2375692.title: XIX.
2375692.description: Flint and his crew wage war against the world; Eleanor is offered clemency; Vane takes issue with Rackham's methods; one of Nassau's most notorious individuals returns.

2375692.title: XX.
2375692.description: After declining Captain Hornigold's "pardons", Captain Flint and his crew will test their fate; Vane runs into an old friend; Eleanor and Woodes Rogers continue their journey.

2375692.title: XXI.
2375692.description: The conflict between Flint and Silver escalates as starvation and dehydration set in; Woodes and Eleanor arrive to troubling circumstances in Nassau; Blackbeard takes charge of an uncertain situation on the island.

2375692.title: XXII.
2375692.description: Change begins to take root in Nassau; on a strange island, Flint, Silver and Billy are unified against a common adversary; Blackbeard and Vane formulate a plan of escape.

2375692.title: XXIII.
2375692.description: Vane finds a new way forward from Teach; Silver urges Flint to make a move or die; Eleanor and Rogers respond to a new threat.

2375692.title: XXIV.
2375692.description: Flint and Teach clash over the future of piracy; Rogers makes an arrest; Rackham finds new purpose. Madi comes to Silver's aid.

2375692.title: XXV.
2375692.description: Captain Flint and Silver returns to Nassau to finish what they started and a legend is born. With Rackham's fate in the hands of Rogers, his future looks grim. Vane's mission evolves while Eleanor confides in Rogers.

2375692.title: XXVI.
2375692.description: Rogers is attacked during a prisoner transport; Vane and Bonny race to save Rackham; the Walrus and her crew come under siege.

2375692.title: XXVII.
2375692.description: Captain Flint prepares for the final battle, while Billy tries to save Captain Vane from being hanged; Max must decide who she can trust; Eleanor Guthrie finds herself in charge of Nassau.

2375692.title: XXVIII.
2375692.description: Hornigold and the British come for the pirates; Rackham and Bonny face impossible odds; Silver demands answers from Flint; Billy crowns a king.

2375692.title: XXIX.
2375692.description: Flint and Silver lead the fight to reclaim Nassau; Jack and Blackbeard seek vengeance; Eleanor attempts to reconcile herself to her new role.

2375692.title: XXX.
2375692.description: Flint submits himself to Billy's authority; Eleanor tries to find a way to save Rogers; Silver is forced to become the leader of the war to reclaim Nassau.

2375692.title: XXXI.
2375692.description: Max runs afoul of the law. Rogers reckons with his past. Flint and Madi reach an understanding. Long John Silver makes his return.

2375692.title: XXXII.
2375692.description: The streets of Nassau become embroiled in violent strife; Silver demands answers from Billy; Eleanor tries to help Max; Bonny and Rackham suffer a traumatic experience.

2375692.title: XXXIII.
2375692.description: Silver places Flint's survival in his own hands; Billy sows further dissonance; Eleanor jeopardizes everyone and everything to ensure her victory; Rogers orchestrates a seemingly effective appeal.

2375692.title: XXXIV.
2375692.description: Spain invades Nassau without much resistance; Silver tries to fix relations between the pirates and the former slaves; Flint and Eleanor work together to survive the Spanish invasion.

2375692.title: XXXV.
2375692.description: Flint urges Silver to exercise more caution; Max shows Jack and Anne how to get upriver; Billy meets a survivor; Rogers discovers the truth.

2375692.title: XXXVI.
2375692.description: Flint and Silver's relationship threatens to collapse during a rescue mission; Max discovers the true cost of freedom; Rackham pursues his target.

2375692.title: XXXVII.
2375692.description: Silver and his crew travel to Skeleton Island in pursuit of Flint; Madi is presented with a proposition; Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor; Billy commits himself to the group.

2375692.title: XXXVIII.
2375692.description: Flint launches a final, desperate attack to destroy England's hold on Nassau; Silver makes an irreversible decision; Rackham confronts Rogers; Nassau is forever changed.

2402207.title: Phase Six
2402207.description: CO CDR Tom Chandler and his crew find themselves in a whole new world when the ship's scientist passenger, Dr. Rachel Scott, reveals that the entire planet is in their hands.

2402207.title: Welcome to Gitmo
2402207.description: Chandler and his crew head to the U.S. Military base at Guantanamo Bay in hopes of collecting food, medical supplies and fuel replenishments.

2402207.title: Dead Reckoning
2402207.description: The James faces off against a new foe who demands Chandler hand over Rachel and her research.

2402207.title: We'll Get There
2402207.description: Mechanical problems leave the ship with a severe shortage of drinking water.

2402207.title: El Toro
2402207.description: With Rachel close to a breakthrough on her vaccine, she, Chandler and XO Slattery lead a small team into the jungles of Nicaragua on a mission to find monkeys for her vaccine trials.

2402207.title: Lockdown
2402207.description: With monkeys for testing, they work towards a vaccine but with no cure in sight, a serious lack of monkeys and increasingly depressing distress calls, they think about returning to Nicaragua.

2402207.title: SOS
2402207.description: After picking up a distress call near Jamaica, Chandler and a small team stage a rescue attempt. But a surprise attack leaves Chandler and Tex stranded at sea.

2402207.title: Two Sailors Walk Into a Bar...
2402207.description: With Chandler and Tex held prisoner on the Russian ship, it is up to Slattery to devise a plot to free them.

2402207.title: Trials
2402207.description: With a potential cure in their grasp, Dr. Scott asks for human volunteer's to test her formula that was successful on a monkey. However, will this be the answer she is looking for, or will it put the volunteers' lives in jeopardy?

2402207.title: No Place Like Home
2402207.description: The crew of the USS Nathan James arrive in Baltimore with the cure expecting a welcoming committee, but what they find is something else entirely.

2402207.title: Unreal City
2402207.description: Chandler and his fractured team join forces with an underground resistance in an attempt to defeat Amy Granderson; Rachael tries to help the sick while remaining a prisoner; Sidney and the crew try to regain control of their ship.

2402207.title: Fight the Ship
2402207.description: Slattery and the crew of Nathan James are in a race against time to save an injured Dr. Tophet and regain control of their ship.

2402207.title: It's Not a Rumor
2402207.description: The ship goes to Norfolk so that the crew can check on their families. And Chandler gives them the opportunity to decide if they want to continue or remain. Something even he is considering.

2402207.title: Solace
2402207.description: The crew makes a discovery; Chandler sees an opportunity to add another ship to the fleet.

2402207.title: Achilles
2402207.description: Chandler and his crew face off against a nuclear-powered submarine led by British naval officers.

2402207.title: Long Day's Journey
2402207.description: Chandler tracks the immunes to Northern Florida; Rachel comes across a secret formula.

2402207.title: Alone and Unafraid
2402207.description: Slattery struggles to evade the sub; Chandler and the land team infiltrate the immune compound.

2402207.title: Safe Zone
2402207.description: Trying to piece together Dr. Hunter's lost formula, Rachel grapples with the fact Niels, her sworn enemy, is on board Nathan James, while Chandler works to gain intel and reverse the brainwashing Michener suffered at the hands of the Ramseys.

2402207.title: Uneasy Lies the Head
2402207.description: Chandler and his team set out to find supplies and materials for Dr. Scott's lab, only to tangle with bounty hunters and the Immunes. Meanwhile, Rachel's effort to find a spreadable cure depends on the scientist who nearly erased mankind.

2402207.title: Friendly Fire
2402207.description: Rachel is hard at work on a new, more efficient version of the cure while Alisha decodes a message found on a cell phone recovered from the Immunes on land.

2402207.title: Valkyrie
2402207.description: Sean Ramsey broadcasts a message implicating the Navy in a devastating disaster.

2402207.title: Cry Havoc
2402207.description: The Nathan James is trapped between the sub and the civilian blockades set up by the immune. Chandler sends Dr. Scott off the ship under Slattery's protection.

2402207.title: A More Perfect Union
2402207.description: As small Immune factions continue to fight the cure, CDR Chandler, and his team, put a call out to civilians to meet them at ports all over the United States to receive the cure.

2402207.title: The Scott Effect
2402207.description: Chandler is sent to Asia to probe a possible mutation of the Red Flu. Captain Slattery and his crew deliver a cure to Southeast Asia but they might be heading toward an unforeseen threat.

2402207.title: Rising Sun
2402207.description: Chandler tries to return to his old crew while sharpening attention on a menacing new enemy.

2402207.title: Shanzhai
2402207.description: Chandler scrambles to find answers in an Asian Dodge City. Meanwhile, Slattery seeks the truth about his predicament.

2402207.title: Devil May Care
