2402207.description: China's president was given the cure, however he has refused to give it out to the people and countries around his land. Chandler believes he can not trust him at all.

2402207.title: Minefield
2402207.description: Chandler's mission becomes complicated as his position is worsened. President Michener faces pressure from the regional leaders.

2402207.title: Dog Day
2402207.description: Chandler's mission comes to a head as he prepares the final part of his plan. President Michener ponders the fate of his presidency.

2402207.title: In the Dark
2402207.description: The Nathan James must dodge an overwhelming threat. Meanwhile, President Michener is put in a terrible position following a revelation in St. Louis.

2402207.title: Sea Change
2402207.description: America copes with tragedy. Meanwhile, Chandler probes a potential virus mutation.

2402207.title: Paradise
2402207.description: Chandler unearths a lead that could resolve menacing questions. Meanwhile, Kara snoops in the White House.

2402207.title: Scuttle
2402207.description: Chandler faces a tough decision when the White House delivers a bizarre order.

2402207.title: Legacy
2402207.description: A final showdown pits Chandler against his formidable enemy. Elsewhere, Kara joins forces with someone who can help with her mission.

2402207.title: Resistance
2402207.description: Chandler returns to America to find out what has really been happening.

2402207.title: Don't Look Back
2402207.description: The fight for America comes to an end. Chandler faces a challenge that could change his life forever.

2402207.title: In Medias Res
2402207.description: Sixteen months after thwarting the coup in America, Nathan James must face yet another global disaster. The question remains, where in the world is Tom Chandler?

2402207.title: The Pillars of Hercules
2402207.description: Having lost their only lead, the crew of Nathan James continues their search for an item that could save the world. Chandler immerses himself in a mission for revenge.

2402207.title: Bread and Circuses
2402207.description: Nathan James's crew searches for a precious item leading them to a strange place of opulence and violence where they cross paths with a most unexpected ally.

2402207.title: Nostos
2402207.description: Chandler and his team search for Slattery while evading Giorgio and Omar's men. Slattery begins to hallucinate seeing his family. The Nathan James faces off with a Hydra class Greek Navy vessel.

2402207.title: Allegiance
2402207.description: Nathan James is diverted from their mission when they receive a suspicious distress call from a fishing trawler.

2402207.title: Tempest
2402207.description: With an enormous storm on the horizon, Nathan James must navigate an equally terrifying threat in order to make it to safety.

2402207.title: Feast
2402207.description: While searching for the location of the stolen seeds, the crew of the Nathan James fights off an old enemy to escape with intel that reveals Dr. Vellick's sinister plans for humanity.

2402207.title: Lazaretto
2402207.description: An undercover mission in the land of the dead leads to disturbing revelations about Dr. Vellek's sinister plans.

2402207.title: Detect, Deceive, Destroy
2402207.description: The crew of Nathan James faces a threat that will test the limits of their Naval tactics and strategies.

2402207.title: Endgame
2402207.description: Chandler confronts his enemy and his personal demons in the final showdown, with the fate of humanity on the line.

2402207.title: Casus Belli
2402207.description: Three years after overcoming the global famine, the United States Navy is ready to unveil its first fully functional fleet since the Red Flu pandemic, but a new type of threat may mean the next world war.

2402207.title: Fog of War
2402207.description: Thrust back to World War II era military technology, Nathan James must think fast to survive a fight with limited weapons capabilities.

2402207.title: El Puente
2402207.description: With nations being rapidly occupied, Chandler tries his hand at diplomacy to unite two hostile countries so they can fight a common enemy.

2402207.title: Tropic of Cancer
2402207.description: As Nathan James and her allies attempt to prevent the enemy moving north, Chandler's haunting visions manifest into reality.

2402207.title: Warriors
2402207.description: After months of fighting, the crew of Nathan James must embark on a dangerous mission to secure important intel that could decide the fate of the war.

2402207.title: Air Drop
2402207.description: Nathan James must seek the aide of a prominent rebel leader in order to create a staging area before mounting an invasion of their own.

2402207.title: Somos la Sangre
2402207.description: Pinned down after days of fighting, Vulture team must find their way into a secretive enemy camp.

2402207.title: Honor
2402207.description: With a devastating hostage situation occurring back home, Chandler must devise the perfect plan to avoid losing everything.

2402207.title: Courage
2402207.description: Preparations to invade Columbia begins. Many obstacles are faced; one hero is lost.

2402207.title: Commitment
2402207.description: In the Series Finale, it is all out war as Chandler must face his fears and confront the greatest threat he has ever encountered.

2406376.title: Pilot
2406376.description: When a body is found on the bridge connecting El Paso and Juarez, two detectives, one from the United States and one from Mexico, must work together to hunt down a serial killer operating on both sides of the border.

2406376.title: Calaca
2406376.description: Marco and Sonya investigate the body from the bridge. Frye learns that the Killer isn't done with him. Charlotte makes an unwelcome discovery on her property.

2406376.title: Rio
2406376.description: Sonya and Marco race to track down a prime suspect who could lead them to the lone desert survivor. Charlotte confronts an unexpected visitor determined to keep business as usual.

2406376.title: Maria of the Desert
2406376.description: The clock ticks as Maria's broadcast continues. Sonya searches for the girl's location. Against protocol, Marco works a unique ransom angle. A powerful Juarez force crosses the border.

2406376.title: The Beast
2406376.description: Sonya and Marco suspect a cover-up. Charlotte goes to Marco for advice. A troubled girl seeks adventure in Juarez. A visitor stops by Linder's apartment.

2406376.title: ID
2406376.description: Sonya bonds with a key witness from the case. Marco uncovers Sonya and Hank's past. Charlotte calls on an old friend for help.

2406376.title: Destino
2406376.description: The EPPD corners their prime suspect. Charlotte questions Ray's true intentions. Linder crosses the border and takes on his most difficult case yet.

2406376.title: Vendetta
2406376.description: Sonya pursues a cold lead despite Marco's insistence that it's a dead end. Charlotte finds out that Ray has jeopardized her ranch.

2406376.title: The Beetle
2406376.description: Marco reconnects with a friend from his past and races to save his family. Charlotte responds to her biggest threat. Linder reveals his true feelings.

2406376.title: Old Friends
2406376.description: Showdown on the bridge as the Killer reveals his endgame.

2406376.title: Take the Ride, Pay the Toll
2406376.description: Showdown on the bridge as the Killer reveals his endgame.

2406376.title: All About Eva
2406376.description: Sonya uses Linder's latest problem to repair her relationship with Marco. Charlotte forms an unlikely alliance.

2406376.title: The Crazy Place
2406376.description: Sonya and Marco search for a missing girl. Charlotte meets someone who knows too much about her new business venture. Marco makes a decision that could change everything.

2406376.title: Yankee
2406376.description: Sonya meets a man connected to her past as Marco discovers he is no longer safe in his own department. Frye and Adriana investigate the origins of the "money house." A mysterious woman crosses The Bridge into El Paso.

2406376.title: Ghost of a Flea
2406376.description: A bizarre killing attracts attention on both sides of the border. Frye & Adriana find more than they bargained for with their first lead. Eleanor enlists the help of a young boy.

2406376.title: Sorrowsworn
2406376.description: Sonya and Marco start working together in the hunt for Eleanor Nacht. Linder pays a visit to Eva. Charlotte and Ray begin fearing for their lives after losing one of Fausto Galvan's shipments.

2406376.title: The Acorn
2406376.description: Marco gains a new ally while discovering the true extent of Fausto's reach. A disruption at a local bank provides new intel to our Detectives and Reporters. Charlotte & Ray discuss their future.

2406376.title: Eye of the Deep
2406376.description: Eva gives her deposition. Jim Dobbs' body is cremated. Marco gets the chance to have his revenge against David Tate.

2406376.title: Harvest of Souls
2406376.description: Eva's case hits a wall, putting Marco and Sonya in the cross-hairs. Jack Dobbs digs up his past. Frye makes a career move. Eva takes matters into her own hands.

2406376.title: Lamia
2406376.description: Sonya uncovers the truth behind Lisa's death. Meanwhile Frye and Adriana find a mystery.

2406376.title: Goliath
2406376.description: Sonya visits a stranger from her past while Marco's tainted history is unearthed. Frye takes a step too far. Eleanor's loyalties are tested. A move is made to apprehend Fausto.

2406376.title: Rakshasa
2406376.description: Marco tries to find Sonya and her kidnapper. Fausto makes his move against Eleanor.

2406376.title: Eidolon
2406376.description: With Charlotte dead and his children's safety on the line, Cesar begins to follow Eleanor's orders. Meanwhile, Hank fights for his life after being wounded in the Red Ridge's stand-off.

2406376.title: Beholder
2406376.description: Marco and the marines go after Fausto. Sonya interrogates Eleanor. Frye and Adriana discover new secrets about the CIA and the DEA activities on the border.

2406376.title: Quetzalcoatl
2406376.description: Marco becomes Fausto's ticket to freedom. Sonya attempts to interpret Eleanor's ledger. Frye & Adriana aid the EPPD investigation.

2406376.title: Jubilex
2406376.description: Marco, Fausto, Obregan and an ailing Romina try to make it through the woods. Sonya and Hank get closer to their targets. Eleanor gets her reward.

2431022.title: Inventors
2431022.description: On a unique planet, a unique species takes its first steps: Mankind begins. But it's a world full of danger.

2431022.title: Iron Men
2431022.description: A mysterious band of pirates plunders the Mediterranean coast - leaving destruction in its wake. Empires fall, but out of the chaos, we discover iron. Armed with this wonder metal, ordinary folk can overthrow tyrants and build a new world order.

2431022.title: Empires
2431022.description: In the city of Jerusalem, a man is crucified - Jesus of Nazareth. His death gives birth to a global religion. But Christianity may never have happened without the Roman Empire.

2431022.title: Warriors
2431022.description: When Rome is sacked by barbarians, Europe enters a Dark Age. But from the fringes of the old empire, two new forces remake the world. The Arabs, funded by a gold rush, unite under the banner of Islam.

2431022.title: Plague
2431022.description: Genghis Khan, the bloodiest warlord in history, sweeps south from Mongolia into China and creates a mighty empire. He leaves 40 million dead bodies in his wake. But a greater killer stalks Mankind - the Plague.

2431022.title: Survivors
2431022.description: Gold from Africa kickstarts the rebirth of Europe. Money flows into Venice, creating new opportunities for entrepreneurs willing to take risks. In China, a new weapon, the gun, allows a peasant uprising to unify the country.

2431022.title: New World
2431022.description: The Aztecs have built a mighty empire that dominates Central America. But it will be destroyed because of a domino effect. 7,000 miles away in modern-day Turkey, the great trading center of Constantinople is overrun by an Islamic army.

2431022.title: Treasure
2431022.description: In the Andes, the Spanish open up the largest silver mine in the world and mint millions of pesos de ocho (pieces of eight). These coins transform the global economy. They fill the treasure chests of pirates.

2431022.title: Pioneers
2431022.description: Mankind embarks on a new age of exploration and tames the wilderness. In North America, Siberia and Australia ancient traditions are swept away in the name of commerce and science.

2431022.title: Revolutions
2431022.description: Two great revolutions entwine. The American Revolution inspires dreams of political and personal liberty. The Industrial Revolution replaces muscle power with machines, freeing Mankind from nature's limits.

2431022.title: Speed
2431022.description: The end of the Civil War allows mankind to go into overdrive. This is an age of innovation, transformation and mass production. People believe that anything, everything, is possible.

2431022.title: New Frontiers
2431022.description: Mankind takes on godlike powers: to feed billions of people, reshape the landscape, re-engineer the human body. The greatest power of all was unleashed over Hiroshima on August 6, 1945.

2442560.title: Episode #1.1
2442560.description: Thomas Shelby plans to fix a horse race; some guns turn up stolen.

2442560.title: Episode #1.2
2442560.description: Thomas Shelby starts a feud with a gypsy family and finally meets with Inspector Campbell to talk about the stolen guns.

2442560.title: Episode #1.3
2442560.description: Thomas is livid to find out that Ada and Freddie are married; IRA sympathizers tries to get information from Thomas about the stolen guns.

2442560.title: Episode #1.4
2442560.description: Thomas attempts to make a deal with Campbell; The Peaky's war with the Lees intensifies.

2442560.title: Episode #1.5
2442560.description: The Shelbys get a surprise visit by an almost forgotten relative. Thomas has one more dangerous plan with the cops.

2442560.title: Episode #1.6
2442560.description: Tommy and the Peaky Blinders prepare for a big operation, that quickly becomes way trickier than they thought.

2442560.title: Episode #2.1
2442560.description: When Birmingham crime boss Tommy Shelby's beloved Garrison pub is bombed, he finds himself blackmailed into murdering an Irish dissident.

2442560.title: Episode #2.2
2442560.description: After murdering an Irish dissident, Tommy has no choice but to be a pawn in Inspector Campbell's treacherous political game.

2442560.title: Episode #2.3
2442560.description: After joining London crime boss Alfie Solomons in a business venture, Tommy worries that Alfie's newly revealed volatility could pose a problem.

2442560.title: Episode #2.4
2442560.description: The Peaky Blinders take over London's Eden Club; Sabini convinces his old adversary Alfie Solomons to join forces and eradicate the gang.

2442560.title: Episode #2.5
2442560.description: The Peaky Blinders are under attack. Tommy's power base in London is obliterated, and both Arthur and Michael are arrested and imprisoned.

2442560.title: Episode #2.6
2442560.description: Tommy plans to execute the mission given to him by Campbell: the assassination of a high-ranking member of the military establishment.

2442560.title: Episode #3.1
2442560.description: It is Thomas Shelby's long-awaited wedding day. A mysterious visitor imperils the entire Shelby family, and Tommy finds himself pulled into a web of intrigue more lethal than anything he has yet encountered.

2442560.title: Episode #3.2
2442560.description: Tommy discovers the extent of the mission given to him and the extreme lengths his new paymasters are willing to go to in their quest for power. Meanwhile his own family's activities lead to escalating danger in Birmingham.

2442560.title: Episode #3.3
2442560.description: Tommy travels to Wales seeking absolution and uncovers a traitor in the Economic League. Michael develops a taste for guns. Arthur gets good news.

2442560.title: Episode #3.4
2442560.description: Polly goes to confession, igniting a chain of events that reveals a trap being laid at the Shelbys' expense. Tommy plans an exit from dirty business.

2442560.title: Episode #3.5
2442560.description: As the Russians test the Peaky Blinders, Tommy realises that he is seriously outmaneuvered. But he has an ace up his sleeve.

2442560.title: Episode #3.6
2442560.description: As Tommy prepares to commit the most audacious crime of his career, an unexpected blow forces him to face his worst fears in a race against time.

2442560.title: The Noose
2442560.description: It is Christmas and Tommy Shelby receives a letter that makes him realize that he and every member of the family are in danger. He knows that it is time for the family to bury their differences and face the enemy together.

2442560.title: Heathens
2442560.description: As the Shelbys come to terms with shocking events, Tommy makes a decision he may come to regret. Meanwhile, a bold new enemy makes his move.

2442560.title: Blackbird
2442560.description: Luca Changretta understands the complexity of his enemy, as the weight of gypsy tradition hangs upon Arthur. But could there be a traitor within the Peaky Blinders' midst?

2442560.title: Dangerous
2442560.description: In a daring cat and mouse chase, will Tommy be outwitted by his enemies? And with the return of an old friend, Tommy tries to distract himself with other pursuits.

2442560.title: The Duel
2442560.description: Tommy prepares himself as the bloody battle lines are drawn between the Peaky Blinders and Changretta. A deal is struck - with potentially devastating consequences.

2442560.title: The Company
2442560.description: During the fight between Goliath and Bonnie Gold events escalate. Then Audrey Changretta appears at a funeral, waving a white flag. She proposes to declare the Vendetta between her family and the Shelbys settled. And she names her price.

2442560.title: Black Tuesday
2442560.description: In the wake of the Wall Street Crash, Tommy faces new dangers from unexpected quarters.

2442560.title: Black Cats
2442560.description: As the Peaky Blinders come under fire, Tommy is warned about a traitor in his midst.

2442560.title: Strategy
2442560.description: As the charismatic Mosley shows his hand, Tommy makes a treacherous new alliance.

2442560.title: The Loop
2442560.description: Tommy agrees to dangerous new partnerships, and a Shelby party promises fireworks.

2442560.title: The Shock
2442560.description: As Tommy reveals his intentions for Mosley, someone close to the Shelbys is targeted.

2442560.title: Mr. Jones
2442560.description: Family tensions surface after an unexpected announcement. Tommy puts his plan for Oswald Mosley into action, but has he underestimated his opponent?

2575988.title: Minimum Viable Product
2575988.description: Richard is a computer programmer. He has to choose between a $10 million deal with Gavin Belson and a $200,000 deal with Peter Gregory, in exchange for his cooperation to make the idea of a super compressing algorithm change the world.

2575988.title: The Cap Table
2575988.description: Richard hires Jared to design a business plan. Big Head is asked to work for Gavin Belson, where he discovers that Hooli has stolen the Pied Piper algorithm and calls it Nucleus. Meanwhile Richard struggles to get his money from Gregory.

2575988.title: Articles of Incorporation
2575988.description: The guys find themselves in trouble with their company name when they find out it's already taken. So whilst Richard tries to find a solution, Erlich searches for a new name in another dimension of his consciousness.

2575988.title: Fiduciary Duties
2575988.description: Richard drunkenly promises to make Erlich a board member, which he regrets the next morning. Big Head finds others at Hooli, who like him, have made careers out of doing nothing. Richard struggles to put Pied Piper's vision into words.

2575988.title: Signaling Risk
2575988.description: Now that Pied Piper is the official company name, Erlich wants a logotype to go with it so he hires a very unexpected artist in for the job. Meanwhile Richard gets a tighter deadline for the project after a simple mistake.

2575988.title: Third Party Insourcing
2575988.description: Richard comes across a problem in the code writing and hires Kevin, a young kid, to write the code for him.

2575988.title: Proof of Concept
2575988.description: Richard has trouble getting Pied Piper ready in time for the TechCrunch Disrupt, while Erlich realizes he slept with the wife of one of the judges of the contest.

2575988.title: Optimal Tip-To-Tip Efficiency
2575988.description: Pied Piper makes it to the next stage of Disrupt but runs into trouble with Hooli's presentation. The guys break out into a ridiculous argument and Richard tries to pull Pied Piper together before the big presentation.

2575988.title: Sand Hill Shuffle
2575988.description: Monica deals with her new boss; Richard makes a decision about the company's future.

2575988.title: Runaway Devaluation
2575988.description: Richard and the guys struggle to find a backer as they face legal and financial woes. Meanwhile, an old enemy pays Richard a visit.

2575988.title: Bad Money
2575988.description: While considering Gavin's proposal, Richard is approached by a billionaire.

2575988.title: The Lady
2575988.description: Richard butts heads with Erlich over a prospective hire; Dinesh and Gilfoyle grow suspicious.

2575988.title: Server Space
2575988.description: Gavin's interference causes Pied Piper to struggle with securing their expansion.

2575988.title: Homicide
2575988.description: Monica encourages the guys to pounce on an opportunity; Erlich reconnects with a former mentee.

2575988.title: Adult Content
2575988.description: With the Pied Piper team fielding job offers, Richard faces the prospect of folding.

2575988.title: White Hat/Black Hat
2575988.description: Richard accidentally sparks a feud that leads him to become paranoid about security.

2575988.title: Binding Arbitration
2575988.description: Erlich demands to be put on stand as Pied Piper and Hooli enter Arbitration. Richard faces a moral dilemma now that he realizes that Hooli's claim may have successful potential. Meanwhile back at Pied Piper headquarters, Jared, Dinesh and Gilfoyle question a profound theory and its affiliation to their live stream.

2575988.title: Two Days of the Condor
2575988.description: The verdict on Pied Piper's fate coincides with a startling real-life drama that makes their livestream immensely popular, and emotions run high as the gang tries to keep the company together.

2575988.title: Founder Friendly
2575988.description: After being unceremoniously fired, an angry Richard faces a tough decision: accept the diminished role of CTO, or leave Pied Piper for good. Erlich takes a shine to Jack Barker, Laurie's new choice of CEO, while Dinesh and Gilfoyle weigh their options in Richard's absence. At Hooli, Gavin tries to improve his image by admitting failure, and Big Head gets wind of major changes.

2575988.title: Two in the Box
2575988.description: The new and improved Pied Piper impresses Dinesh and Gilfoyle, but worries Richard; Jared and Erlich face housing issues; Gavin suggests a controversial move.

2575988.title: Meinertzhagen's Haversack
2575988.description: Richard searches for a way around Jack; Gilfoyle opens himself up to recruiters; Dinesh draws unwanted attention from a recent purchase.

2575988.title: Maleant Data Systems Solutions
2575988.description: The Pied Piper guys struggle to phone it in; Erlich faces competition; Monica takes a stand; Gavin makes a decision about Nucleus.

2575988.title: The Empty Chair
2575988.description: Richard lets his ego get in the way at an interview; Dinesh, Gilfoyle and Jared misplace hardware; Erlich pitches his plans to Big Head.

2575988.title: Bachmanity Insanity
2575988.description: Richard's new relationship is threatened by neuroses; Big Head and Erlich's launch party has snags; Dinesh falls for a foreign coworker.

2575988.title: To Build a Better Beta
2575988.description: Richard decides to test the Pied Pipper beta. Erlich finds himself in trouble.

2575988.title: Bachman's Earnings Over-Ride
2575988.description: Erlich tries to be honest with Richard, who has mixed emotions about their friendship and the future of Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Jared's new company apparel turns heads but fuels yet another clash between Dinesh and Gilfoyle.

2575988.title: Daily Active Users
2575988.description: Shocking stats are revealed and prompt Richard to bridge the gap between Pied Piper and its users, but Jared must go to extremes to keep everything intact. Meanwhile, Gavin tries to recapture his former glory by bringing in new talent after discovering secrets about the competition.

2575988.title: The Uptick
2575988.description: Pied Piper's future is hazy, but Erlich's industry profile begins to rise, creating a moral dilemma for Richard as Dinesh's new app starts to catch on. Meanwhile, Laurie makes plans for her exit; and Gavin's pompous personality haunts his comeback at Hooli.

2575988.title: Success Failure
2575988.description: The guys struggle to find funding for Pied Piper's video chat app to keep up with their rapidly growing user base. Erlich faces resistance from Big Head's father. Jack steps on Gavin's toes at Hooli. Richard gets sage advice.

2575988.title: Terms of Service
2575988.description: Richard butts heads with Dinesh; Erlich makes a play to be involved in Jian-Yang's new app; Jared sets ground rules in his friendship with Richard; Gavin's paranoia over Jack's enthusiasm causes him to make a rash decision.

2575988.title: Intellectual Property
2575988.description: Dinesh gets back to the ground while Richard continues to explore his new project. Gavin tries to come out of the new problem he has gotten himself into and interestingly the chemistry between Richard and Monica takes a new turn.

2575988.title: Teambuilding Exercise
2575988.description: Sea food demo is being prepared. Big head professorship is proving beneficial to his students. And finally we get a glimpse of the insides of Gavin Belson mansion.

2575988.title: The Blood Boy
2575988.description: Cracks in Richard's latest partnership become more apparent when he has to deal with an unexpected interloper; Dinesh scrambles to find a way out of his new relationship; Monica learns of surprising developments at Raviga.

2575988.title: Customer Service
2575988.description: The guys struggle for funding to launch the latest iteration of Pied Piper. Erlich seeks to join the new VC firm formed by Laurie and Monica. Dinesh and Gilfoyle clash over the alpha build.

2575988.title: The Patent Troll
2575988.description: Richard takes on a patent troll; Gilfoyle battles a smart fridge; Jared embraces multiple identities; Erlich tries to spend time with a new crowd.

2575988.title: The Keenan Vortex
2575988.description: Richard ponders a deal with the tech world's latest "it" boy; Jack faces setbacks.

2575988.title: Hooli-Con
2575988.description: The Pied Piper guys try to pull off a stealth plan at Hooli-Con.

2575988.title: Server Error
2575988.description: Richard finds himself in a web of lies; Jared plans his exit; Jack bets big; Gavin plots a comeback.

2575988.title: Grow Fast or Die Slow
2575988.description: The pressure to get things right stymies Richard and forces him to grow the company in a way he hadn't planned; Dinesh and Gilfoyle question their ability to make good choices; Gavin returns to Hooli and worries about becoming antiquated.

2575988.title: Reorientation
2575988.description: Richard manages a number of conflicts in his efforts to unite his new employees; Dinesh celebrates a new purchase that Gilfoyle looks to spoil; Jian-Yang goes to court; Gavin meets pushback over his signature and what it says about him.

2575988.title: Chief Operating Officer
2575988.description: The COO of a world class company asks to move to Pied Piper. At the same time, Richard deals with a lawsuit from the smart fridge company that Gilfoyle hacked.

2575988.title: Tech Evangelist
2575988.description: Attempting to woo a gaming company to PiperNet, Richard inadvertently angers a prized ally; Dinesh deals with a betrayal; Gavin leaves his underlings with a cryptic message; Jared gets inside information from Big Head.

2575988.title: Facial Recognition
2575988.description: Overshadowed by Jared in an on-camera interview, Richard's confidence wavers further when Laurie and Monica force him to work with Eklow, a new artificial-intelligence company; Gavin questions his future beyond Hooli.

2575988.title: Artificial Emotional Intelligence
2575988.description: Richard decides to help when Laurie gets in a jam, but his lack of emotional discipline threatens to backfire on Pied Piper; Gavin tries to make a deal with a stubborn partner; Dinesh relishes a win; Jared bonds with a surprising figure.

2575988.title: Initial Coin Offering
2575988.description: As Pied Piper prepares to close on their Series B funding, Richard receives some unsettling news; Gilfoyle suggests a proposition; Monica is blunt with Richard; Dinesh competes with a co-worker; Gavin tries to charm small-town America.

2575988.title: Fifty-One Percent
2575988.description: PiperNet launches, but an early success makes Monica suspicious; Richard makes a surprising move; the team races against the clock as its future is threatened.

2575988.title: Artificial Lack of Intelligence
2575988.description: Richard discovers his promise that Pied Piper won't collect user data is under threat; Jared longs for the past; Gilfoyle gets creative in dealing with Dinesh.

2575988.title: Blood Money
2575988.description: Richard meets a potential investor; Gilfoyle butts heads with HR; Gavin explores a leaner Hooli's future.

2575988.title: Hooli Smokes!
2575988.description: The Pied Piper team races to close a major deal; Dinesh considers being a better person; an angry Jared reluctantly helps Richard.

2575988.title: Maximizing Alphaness
2575988.description: Richard's authority is threatened by his former Hooli manager; Monica tries to prove her support of other women; Gavin sets his sights on the literary world.

2575988.title: Tethics
2575988.description: Richard fumes at Gavin's new ethical stance; Dinesh's trip turns into a nightmare; Gilfoyle and Monica work on their peer review scores.

2575988.title: RussFest
2575988.description: A major event puts PiperNet's capabilities to the test; Monica confronts Jian-Yang over his use of Pied Piper's name.

2575988.title: Exit Event
2575988.description: Richard and the Pied Piper team look to pull off a spectacular feat on the day of a big launch.

2618986.title: Where Paradise Is Home
2618986.description: Secret Service Agent Ethan Burke begins his investigation into the disappearance of two federal agents.

2618986.title: Do Not Discuss Your Life Before
2618986.description: After discovering Bill Evans' corpse, Ethan teams up with Beverly to look for clues.

2618986.title: Our Town, Our Law
2618986.description: Kate's participation in a heinous act leaves Ethan stunned; Ben and Theresa continue their search.

2618986.title: One of Our Senior Realtors Has Chosen to Retire
2618986.description: The Burkes return to town to learn Ethan has been given a leadership role; Theresa gets a job offer.

2618986.title: The Truth
2618986.description: Ethan makes a shocking discovery outside of Wayward Pines; Theresa meets with her first client.

2618986.title: Choices
2618986.description: Ethan learns more about the eerie town's history and the people who live there.

2618986.title: Betrayal
2618986.description: Ethan is betrayed by one of his closest. Kate reveals a new truth.

2618986.title: The Friendliest Place on Earth
2618986.description: Ethan sets out to determine who is responsible for an explosion that left two in critical condition.

2618986.title: A Reckoning
2618986.description: Ethan interrogates Harold about other insurgents; Amy's health declines.

2618986.title: Cycle
2618986.description: Citizens of Wayward Pines react to the truth.

2618986.title: Enemy Lines
2618986.description: Theo awakens from suspension; The residents of Wayward Pines battle against the iron-fisted rule of the First Generation.

2618986.title: Blood Harvest
2618986.description: Theo learns the truth and his purpose for being in Wayward Pines; CJ spearheads a vital and potentially deadly project outside the fence.

2618986.title: Once Upon a Time in Wayward Pines
2618986.description: Nurse Pam resurfaces as a lethal threat to the town; Jason's past becomes known.

2618986.title: Exit Strategy
2618986.description: Xander returns to Wayward Pines with an unexpected guest; CJ leads a brave group on an expedition beyond the fence.

2618986.title: Sound the Alarm
2618986.description: The creation of Wayward Pines is revealed; Megan experiments on the first female Abby; Frank deals with personal struggles.

2618986.title: City Upon a Hill
2618986.description: The town's food supply is critically low after the Abbies attack CJ and the harvesters; Theo is able to build a makeshift triage unit.

2618986.title: Time Will Tell
2618986.description: CJ reflects on his life and the great responsibilities he's had over the centuries; Theo and Megan disagree over the Abbies' intelligence.

2618986.title: Pass Judgment
2618986.description: Theo enlists the help of Hassler to capture Margaret; Xander has a confrontation with Rebecca about her condition.

2618986.title: Walcott Prep
2618986.description: Pilcher recalls finding his Chosen One; Jason makes a fatal judgment call; Theo and Xander must put aside their differences to stop him before the human race is lost.

2618986.title: Bedtime Story
2618986.description: Theo is forced to make a decision that could seal humanity's fate.

2654620.title: Night Zero
2654620.description: When a commercial airliner lands and stands silent, CDC agent Ephraim Goodweather investigates the plane to find that the passengers are infected by a vile plague.

2654620.title: The Box
2654620.description: The four survivors begin manifesting strange symptoms, but Eph and Nora's attempt to quarantine them is thwarted as the disinformation campaign begins. Meanwhile, in jail, Setrakian receives a surprise visit from an old - a very old - acquaintance.

2654620.title: Gone Smooth
2654620.description: Eph and Nora fight to save Captain Redfern's life before coming face-to-face with the horrifying effects of the virus. A spike in rat attacks signals Fet that something inexplicable is happening deep below the city. Released from jail, Setrakian begins his own merciless plan to stop the spread of the disease.

2654620.title: It's Not for Everyone
2654620.description: A secret autopsy demonstrates the bizarre progression of the mystery virus, prompting Jim to make a startling confession. Eph and Nora race to find the father of the youngest victim of the plane tragedy, but someone unexpected beats them to it. Ansel, in the grip of disease, takes desperate measures to protect his family.

2654620.title: Runaways
2654620.description: With Nora gone, Eph reluctantly joins Setrakian's quest in hopes of gathering enough evidence to warrant a citywide quarantine. Fet encounters the unexpected inside the subway tunnels, and a medical emergency threatens Palmer's master plan.

2654620.title: Occultation
2654620.description: After warning Kelly to leave the city with Zack ahead of the spreading plague, Eph is arrested by the FBI. Eichhorst has one final job for Gus, while Setrakian realizes that the coming eclipse is the tipping point for virus infection and the beginning of the end.

2654620.title: For Services Rendered
2654620.description: Setrakian, Eph, and Nora formulate a plan to track down the Master using Jim as bait. Eichhorst and Setrakian's pasts are revealed. At the Luss home, Neeva struggles to protect the children while encountering a mysterious stranger whose help she may not want.

2654620.title: Creatures of the Night
2654620.description: After discovering the potency of ultraviolet light against the strigoi, Setrakian gains a new and unlikely disciple. A quick trip to a Brooklyn convenience store turns into a deadly all-night siege.

2654620.title: The Disappeared
2654620.description: Eph races to safeguard his family, only to learn that Kelly is missing. Dutch reveals her role in Palmer's plan, and Gus is forced to make a difficult decision about Felix.

2654620.title: Loved Ones
2654620.description: Eph investigates Kelly's disappearance and struggles with what he finds. Dutch pursues a plan to retaliate against Palmer, and Fitzwilliam makes a surprising choice.

2654620.title: The Third Rail
2654620.description: Setrakian leads Eph, Fet and Nora in the hunt for the Master's lair. Left behind at the pawnshop with Mariela, Zack risks his safety for Mariela's sake.

2654620.title: Last Rites
2654620.description: Dutch returns with a plan to broadcast Eph's warning about the vampiric plague. However, they face a new threat when Eichhorst launches his own attack against the pawn shop. Palmer receives a special visitor, and Gus gears up for the on-coming fight but discovers there's another mysterious factor involved.

2654620.title: The Master
2654620.description: Eph and Fet recon for an all-out assault that Setrakian assures them will finally kill the Master. Gus aligns himself with a strange new force, one that may swing the fight in an unforeseen direction.

2654620.title: BK, NY
2654620.description: Eph and Nora work on a weapon to kill the strigoi, but Setrakian puts the group at risk by searching for an ancient text, while the Master introduces a new breed of creature and taps Kelly to control it.

2654620.title: By Any Means
2654620.description: Vet and Dutch grow closer on a mission to make sure neighbourhood buildings are clear. Meanwhile, Eph and Nora perform experiments on their new patients; and Kelly begins her search for Zack.

2654620.title: Fort Defiance
2654620.description: Gus and Vaun wage an attack on Palmer as Eph struggles to connect with Zack. Councilwoman Justine Faraldo vows to bring her extermination policies to the other boroughs.

2654620.title: The Silver Angel
2654620.description: Eph and Nora finally see their lethal virus in action; Fet takes the security of Red Hook into his own hands; Dutch and Setrakian set off for Staten Island to question Fitzwilliam.

2654620.title: Quick and Painless
2654620.description: Eph alters his appearance so he can leave the city, which makes Nora a reluctant parent for Zack. Meanwhile, Dutch and Nora negotiate with Justine to get Fet out of jail.

2654620.title: Identity
2654620.description: Eph concocts a plan to make and distribute a bioweapon. Gus realizes Angel can be an unlikely ally, and Kelly comes after Nora and Zack.

2654620.title: The Born
2654620.description: Eph returns to New York intent on going after the individual responsible for his friends' deaths. Meanwhile, Setrakian and Fet launch an attack on the Master using Fitzwilliam's tip; and Dutch has a surprise visitor.

2654620.title: Intruders
2654620.description: Eph must protect Zack against a surprise intruder into Red Hook. Gus convinces the Guptas to make a difficult choice. Fet and Setrakian set out to acquire the Lumen but discover they are not the only potential buyer.

2654620.title: Battle for Red Hook
2654620.description: Justine takes drastic measures to counter a surprise invasion. Nora and Fet perform a useful mission while Eph and Setrakian face off against an old foe.

2654620.title: The Assassin
2654620.description: Eph and Dutch work to execute Eph's plan against Palmer. Meanwhile Fet & Dr. Martinez accompany Setrakian on his search for the Lumen's true owner. And Councilwoman Feraldo makes a bold move in her quest to take New York City back from the Strigoi.

2654620.title: Dead End
2654620.description: Gus helps the Guptas get across the border; Fet, Nora and Eph look all over the city for Dutch, who's in a life-or-death struggle with Eichhorst; Setrakian meets a familiar face while searching for the Occido Lumen.

2654620.title: Fallen Light
2654620.description: The Lumen's auction starts in 24hrs. Setrakian seeks the Ancients backing. Gus seeks allies from his past. Zach's Grandparents found leaving Eph with a choice. Eldritch discovers the "White" has an unexpected price at Eichhorst's delight.

2654620.title: The Night Train
2654620.description: Setrakian and Fet battle for possession of the Occido Lumen, and gain a surprising new ally. A massive attack imperils Eph, Nora, and Zack's escape from New York.

2654620.title: New York Strong
2654620.description: As the strigoi turn New York into a war zone, survivors and the military must pull together and fight.

2654620.title: Bad White
2654620.description: The Master's offer to return Zack plagues Eph as he considers taking the deal. Dutch reunites with an old group of friends but begins to question if her safety is better with them or with Fet, Eph and Setrakian. Palmer strives for answers to Setrakian's secret strigoi blood treatments and discovers he may have a way to acquire it.

2654620.title: First Born
2654620.description: The Occido Lumen is gone. Stolen. Setrakian and Fet race to recover it. Gus and Angel try to hide a secret houseguest while avoiding a police sweep, and Quinlan's thirst for vengeance is revealed.

2654620.title: Gone But Not Forgotten
2654620.description: Things have changed. The infection enters a new phase. Fet wants to celebrate, but Setrakian and Eph are worried there's more work to be done. Justine conscripts a new, unwilling army in the fight while Eichhorst angrily lashes out with a plan to strike back.

2654620.title: Madness
2654620.description: New information from the Lumen forces Setrakian to seek help from his lifelong nemesis, Eldritch Palmer. Eph's new experiments to understand strigoi communication seemingly take him to the brink of madness while Fet is on a mission to discover strigoi movements across New York City.

2654620.title: The Battle of Central Park
2654620.description: Fet strikes hard at the heart of the strigoi army while Justine embarks upon a risky mission to drive the strigoi out of Manhattan once and for all. Gus and Angel fight for their lives and their freedom but are faced with a moral dilemma.

2654620.title: Collaborators
2654620.description: Setrakian offers hope in a new plan to trap the Master while Eph and Dutch seek out the Master's "voice." Palmer, frail and close to death, needs Setrakian's access to the white to hold up his end of their bargain. Fet suffers a devastating personal loss revealing a long-hidden family secret.

2654620.title: White Light
2654620.description: The Master's voice proves to be more powerful and potentially fatal than Eph or Dutch anticipated. Fet and Setrakian track down the cargo from the Egyptian vessel and realize they may be in over their heads. Quinlan strikes a deal with the Ancients, but a last minute betrayal proves deadly.

2654620.title: Do or Die
2654620.description: NYC is falling. Eph and Dutch frantically race to finish their new device to stop the Master before the city is overrun. Justine, Gus, and Angel fight in one last stand to stop the spreading virus. Palmer extracts vengeance for past wrongs but may have crossed the line.

2654620.title: The Fall
2654620.description: Humanity teeters on the edge of destruction. The Master finally reveals himself, initiating the end game of a battle in which there can be only one winner. Eph, Fet, Setrakian, and Dutch must overcome their personal differences in a last-ditch effort to vanquish the strain.

2654620.title: The Worm Turns
2654620.description: Out of the ashes of humanity's nuclear war, Night Eternal has begun. Haunted by the atrocities committed by his son, Eph abandons NYC for Philadelphia. His solitude is cut short when he encounters new fighters who rekindle his drive to fight back. Tasked by Setrakian, Fet and Quinlan search for a new means of stopping the Master.

2654620.title: The Blood Tax
2654620.description: Imprisoned as a subject in a strigoi breeding program, Dutch is desperate to escape and find Setrakian. Gus recruits his cousin for the inside job that will put his gang at the top of the new world's underground economy, but Creem is suspicious of his business partner's ambitions.

2654620.title: One Shot
2654620.description: Quinlan and Fet discover that stealing a nuclear warhead isn't easy when they encounter an unexpected enemy. Eph and Alex concoct a new weapon to use against the strigoi. Frustrated with his seclusion, Zack discovers a love interest.

2654620.title: New Horizons
2654620.description: Dutch is forced to make a deal with Desai while she plots to escape a strigoi breeding facility. Eph and Alex seek to uncover the dark secrets behind the Partnership's new plan but face the repercussion of their last attack. Gus and Creem face off against a gang encroaching on their turf.

2654620.title: Belly of the Beast
2654620.description: Fet and Quinlan have a lead on a nuclear weapon. Eph and Alex continue to search for the Master's overall plan. Dutch is trapped but encounters an old friend.

2654620.title: Tainted Love
2654620.description: Fet and Quinlan have to figure out how to get the nuclear bomb back to New York, while a desperate Eichhorst draws near. Love struck Zack tries to learn more about his new crush, but makes a devastating discovery.

2654620.title: Ouroboros
2654620.description: His health failing, Setrakian ignores Eph's warnings, pushing himself to the limit in his quest for victory and revenge. Fet and Quinlan race back to Manhattan, while the Master seals off the city and prepares to eliminate them all.

2654620.title: Extraction
2654620.description: Reeling from loss, our heroes regroup. To defeat the Master, they must locate him first. Our heroes devise a new plan to track him through human collaborators, beginning at the blood farm with someone Dutch knows all too well.

2654620.title: The Traitor
2654620.description: An unexpected guest brings old conflicts to the surface, dividing our heroes, threatening the group's trust. With questionable new intel in hand, they launch a make or break final assault on the Master.

2654620.title: The Last Stand
2654620.description: In the series finale, Quinlan devises a desperate plan, but the costs are enormous. Eph wrestles with his conscience, Fet undertakes a suicide mission, and Dutch and Gus dig in for battle as humankind makes its final stand against the Master and his Strain.

2661044.title: Pilot
2661044.description: 97 years after a nuclear war, human kind is living in space. 100 juvenile delinquents are sent down to Earth to see if the planet is habitable.

2661044.title: Earth Skills
2661044.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

2661044.title: Earth Kills
2661044.description: As a dangerous, acidic fog approaches, Clarke, Finn and Wells set out in search of a seaweed-like plant to make an antibiotic poultice for Jasper's wounds, while a vulnerable young girl follows when Bellamy takes a group out hunting for food.

2661044.title: Murphy's Law
2661044.description: Bellamy, Clarke and Finn try to protect Charlotte when everyone learns she killed Wells. On the Ark, Abby risks getting floated in order to give Raven the chance to launch the escape pod.

2661044.title: Twilight's Last Gleaming
2661044.description: A plan to contact the Ark is put in motion after Raven crash lands on Earth. Meanwhile, Abby exposes Kane's plan to reduce the population of the Ark.

2661044.title: His Sister's Keeper
2661044.description: Bellamy, Finn and Jasper head into Grounder territory to search for Octavia, as flashbacks show the siblings' difficult childhood on the Ark. Meanwhile, Raven finds out about Clarke and Finn.

2661044.title: Contents Under Pressure
2661044.description: While Bellamy tortures the Grounder, Raven and Clarke make contact with the Ark and ask Abby to help them save Finn. On the Ark, Kane deals with his guilt, and Jaha surprises the council with a shocking revelation.

2661044.title: Day Trip
2661044.description: Shumway secretly orders one of the 100 to kill Bellamy. Meanwhile, hallucinogenic nuts provide Octavia with an opportunity to help the Grounder escape the camp, and Bellamy and Clarke investigate a nearby underground depot, where they find military weapons.

2661044.title: Unity Day
2661044.description: Finn arranges a meeting with Clarke and the leader of the Grounders in order to bring peace, however a sceptical Clarke warns Bellamy, who along with Jasper and Raven follow them to the meeting with weapons. On the Ark, Diana takes over the exodus ship.

2661044.title: I Am Become Death
2661044.description: Murphy returns to the camp carrying a horrific virus created by the Grounders to weaken the camp. After learning the Grounders plan to attack the next day, Bellamy, Finn and Raven come up with a plan to delay them.

2661044.title: The Calm
2661044.description: Clarke and Finn are captured by Anya, who forces them to save the life of a victim of the explosion. Meanwhile, Raven deals with her split from Finn, and Kane fights to save the Ark and it's survivors.

2661044.title: We Are Grounders: Part 1
2661044.description: Clarke and Finn come face to face with a new enemy after Lincoln rescues them from Anya, while Bellamy, Raven, Octavia and Jasper deal with a vengeful Murphy. On the Ark, Jaha makes a plan to try and get to Earth.

2661044.title: We Are Grounders: Part 2
2661044.description: As the remaining members of the 100 face off against the Grounders, Jaha makes a noble sacrifice to ensure the Ark makes it to Earth.

2661044.title: The 48
2661044.description: While Clarke struggles to make sense of her bizarre surroundings, Lincoln risks his life to save Octavia, and Kane establishes his authority.

2661044.title: Inclement Weather
2661044.description: Clarke demands answers from President Wallace, Abby performs emergency surgery on Raven, and Octavia resorts to violence to find Lincoln.

2661044.title: Reapercussions
2661044.description: Clarke and Anya join forces to escape Mount Weather. Kane issues an order to have Abby brutally punished. Octavia searches for Lincoln.

2661044.title: Many Happy Returns
2661044.description: Clarke faces betrayal. Meanwhile, Bellamy, Finn, Murphy, Sterling and Monroe race against time to save a survivor of the Ark crash, and Raven struggles to cope with her paralysis.

2661044.title: Human Trials
2661044.description: While Kane leads a mission to make peace with the Grounders, Jasper agrees to participate in a risky experiment, and Finn's search for Clarke takes a violent turn.

2661044.title: Fog of War
2661044.description: Tensions run high between Clarke and Finn, and Raven discovers that Mount Weather is interfering with Camp Jaha's communication systems. Meanwhile, Jasper and Monty discover the truth about what's going on at Mount Weather.

2661044.title: Long Into an Abyss
2661044.description: As Abby and Jaha each try to establish their authority, Clarke comes up with a plan to stop the Grounders' attack. At Mount Weather, Jasper, Monty, Miller and Harper plan their escape, as Dr. Tsing and Cage conduct deadly experiments.

2661044.title: Spacewalker
2661044.description: Camp Jaha butt heads over what to do with Finn, as flashbacks show his and Raven's relationship on the Ark.

2661044.title: Remember Me
2661044.description: The alliance between Camp Jaha and the Grounders is jeopardized when Gustus is poisoned. Meanwhile at Mount Weather, Monty lands himself in hot water.

2661044.title: Survival of the Fittest
2661044.description: Clarke and Lexa encounter a new enemy. Bellamy and Lincoln work together to break into Mount Weather. Murphy helps Jaha confront his past. Indra makes Octavia an offer she can't refuse.

2661044.title: Coup de Grâce
2661044.description: Bellamy receives help from an unlikely source after being captured. Meanwhile, Abby fights to stay in control, and Jasper confronts President Wallace.

2661044.title: Rubicon
2661044.description: Clarke is faced with a difficult choice and Raven helps Bellamy navigate Mount Weather as Dr. Tsing begins to harvest the 47, while Jaha and Murphy encounter a stranger on their journey to the City of Light.

2661044.title: Resurrection
2661044.description: Clarke begins to question Lexa's leadership decisions and Indra continues to push Octavia. Meanwhile, at Mount Weather, Jasper steps up into the role of leader, and Cage throws Maya into a life threatening situation.

2661044.title: Bodyguard of Lies
2661044.description: As Jaha and Murphy encounter a perilous obstacle on their journey, Raven and Wick try to figure out how to disable the acid fog, and Bellamy races against time as his cover is blown.

2661044.title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 1
2661044.description: As the Grounder army prepare to attack Mount Weather, a desperate Cage turns to Dante for help, and Raven and Wick experience a major setback.

2661044.title: Blood Must Have Blood: Part 2
2661044.description: After being betrayed by Lexa, Clarke makes a final stand against Mount Weather, while Jaha shocks Murphy as they continue their journey to the City of Light.

2661044.title: Wanheda: Part 1
2661044.description: After leaving Camp Arkadia due to her inability to accept her actions, Clarke sets out on her own, dealing with her emotions while encountering new challenges. Camp Arkadia begins to see political turmoil as the hunger for power mounts.

2661044.title: Wanheda: Part 2
2661044.description: Bellamy and Kane put their lives on the line to rescue Clarke; Abby considers opening Mount Weather as a medical facility; Murphy schemes against Jaha.

2661044.title: Ye Who Enter Here
2661044.description: Now with Clarke in her possession, Lexa has the power to force Skikru to become one with the grounders. Kane and Abby journey to the Polis Summit, while the Ice Nation prepares to draw first blood against Skikru and the other grounder clans.

2661044.title: Watch the Thrones
2661044.description: Clarke discovers the mastermind behind a devious plan, while Kane struggles to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jasper's grief drives him to reckless behavior.

2661044.title: Hakeldama
2661044.description: Pike's twisted crusade threatens Clarke's attempts for peace. Raven becomes a target, while Murphy tries to conspire against Jaha.

2661044.title: Bitter Harvest
2661044.description: Clarke struggles with her morality while Abby grows suspicious of Jaha's motives.

2661044.title: Thirteen
2661044.description: Anger and lust for vengeance and justice from the clans threatens Lexa's position. Murphy unveils new secrets about the identity of Polis. Meanwhile, a dangerous coup brews against Clarke and Lexa and their trust for each other is tested.

2661044.title: Terms and Conditions
2661044.description: Kane tries to stop Pike, but he learns that he is onto him. Kane realizes that for him to ensure peace in Arkadia, he'll have to go through drastic measures.

2661044.title: Stealing Fire
2661044.description: Bellamy tries to save Kane from Pike. Clarke and Murphy debate over what to do with Titus and the A.I. Bellamy confronts Octavia.

2661044.title: Fallen
2661044.description: Jaha employs a terrifying new method to convince Abby to join his cause, Kane is on a mission, and Bellamy is hit with a hard truth. Meanwhile, Monty finds himself in a precarious situation, and Jasper rushes to save one of his own.

2661044.title: Nevermore
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends try to save Raven from Alie's control. However, they realize that they will have to undergo dangerous procedures that may cost Raven's life.

2661044.title: Demons
2661044.description: Jaha returns to Polis, and Murphy has a surprise encounter. Meanwhile, Octavia uncovers a clue.

2661044.title: Join or Die
2661044.description: Clarke is on a mission that could change everything. Meanwhile Murphy gains insight that might prove useful in ensuring his survival. Lastly Kane reaches a breaking point.

2661044.title: Red Sky at Morning
2661044.description: Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia and Jasper hit a tragic roadblock. Meanwhile, Raven and Monty make an important discovery.

2661044.title: Perverse Instantiation: Part One
2661044.description: Clarke finds hope in a place she never expected. Alie's master plan begins to coalesce.

2661044.title: Perverse Instantiation: Part Two
2661044.description: In the second half of the two-part season finale, everyone prepares for a final showdown as they begin to face the reality of their tragic situation in the epic and mind-bending conclusion.

2661044.title: Echoes
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends struggle with how to proceed after the fate of the world is revealed.

2661044.title: Heavy Lies the Crown
2661044.description: The burden of leading weighs heavily upon Bellamy (Bob Morley) and Clarke (Eliza Taylor) when different challenges force them to determine who will live and die.

2661044.title: The Four Horsemen
2661044.description: Jaha leads Clarke and Bellamy on a road to possible salvation, while tensions rise in Arkadia and Polis.

2661044.title: A Lie Guarded
2661044.description: Clarke's decision on who gets to live causes tension in Arcadia. Jasper loses his sanity when the Black Rain falls. Bellamy and his friends face judgement for their crimes against the Ice Nation.

2661044.title: The Tinder Box
2661044.description: Clarke pleads with a former allied force to avoid a war and ensure her people's survival.

2661044.title: We Will Rise
2661044.description: Clarke and Roan are forced to work together when they are tasked to deliver a dangerous but crucial asset to Abby through enemy territories.

2661044.title: Gimme Shelter
2661044.description: Clarke's arrival on the island quickly takes a turn for the worse. Meanwhile, Bellamy tries to avoid further tragedy in Arkadia.

2661044.title: God Complex
2661044.description: Clarke and Abby question how far they're willing to go when they make a disappointing discovery; Jaha finds a lead to the Second Dawn.

2661044.title: DNR
2661044.description: Clarke struggles to keep the peace after word of Jaha's discovery spreads.

2661044.title: Die All, Die Merrily
2661044.description: Octavia fights in the final battle for survival, but not everyone is willing to play fair.

2661044.title: The Other Side
2661044.description: Clarke faces the consequences of her fateful choice.

2661044.title: The Chosen
2661044.description: Jaha and Kane disagree over how to handle their grim reality. Meanwhile, Clarke leads a group to save a friend.

2661044.title: Praimfaya
2661044.description: It's a race against the end of the world as Praimfaya arrives forcing our heroes to make impossible decisions to ensure their survival.

2661044.title: Eden
2661044.description: Clarke struggles to survive on a desolate, scorched earth while her friends in space come across a long awaited beacon of hope.

2661044.title: Red Queen
2661044.description: Octavia is forced to take guidance from an unlikely ally when the future of the bunker and all those inside it is jeopardized.

2661044.title: Sleeping Giants
2661044.description: Bellamy leads the charge investigating a potential way home. Meanwhile, Clarke and Madi deal with the new, uncertain threat to their home.

2661044.title: Pandora's Box
2661044.description: Our heroes are forced to rely on the help of Shallow Valley's dangerous new inhabitants in order to save some of their own, with surprising results.

2661044.title: Shifting Sands
2661044.description: Octavia leads her people towards Shadow Valley against the advice of Clarke and Bellamy; Kane and Abby adjust to a new set of challenges.

2661044.title: Exit Wounds
2661044.description: Kane's attempt to prove himself useful tests Wonkru's allegiance to Octavia. Madi faces an unexpected threat inside Wonkru, forcing Clarke to make an unlikely ally.

2661044.title: Acceptable Losses
2661044.description: Clarke and Bellamy make a startling discovery about Wonkru's battle plans as Echo risks her friendship with Raven to complete her mission.

2661044.title: How We Get to Peace
2661044.description: Clarke's determination to protect Madi puts Bellamy in an impossible position.

2661044.title: Sic Semper Tyrannis
2661044.description: The growing fractures in Wonkru threaten to explode once and for all. Meanwhile, in Shadow Valley, Murphy starts a fire, unleashing catastrophic results.

2661044.title: The Warriors Will
2661044.description: Monty strives to show Wonkru an alternative to war, and to the valley itself. Meanwhile, Abby's health continues to deteriorate, along with McCreary's patience.

2661044.title: The Dark Year
2661044.description: As Clarke races to save Abby, she learns more about the trials and tribulations Wonkru faced in the bunker, and the impossible decisions they were forced to make in the dark year.

2661044.title: Damocles: Part One
2661044.description: In part one of the fifth season finale, Octavia leads her people into war. While behind enemy lines, our heroes must overcome their differences to save Wonkru from extinction.

2661044.title: Damocles: Part Two
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends must risk everything to fight one last battle for survival, only to glimpse an even darker threat to the last living valley on earth.

2661044.title: Sanctum
2661044.description: Still reeling after receiving Monty's message, a small group goes down to explore the mysterious new planet. Back on the Mothership, several members of Wonkru face the consequences of their decisions.

2661044.title: Red Sun Rising
2661044.description: The team on the ground fights to survive the threat they face on the new planet. Meanwhile, Raven must join forces with an unlikely ally to save everyone on board the Mothership.

2661044.title: The Children of Gabriel
2661044.description: Clarke tries to win over the leaders of Sanctum in order to let her people stay. Meanwhile, Bellamy, Octavia, and Echo discover a new threat while on a mission to retrieve the transport ship.

2661044.title: The Face Behind the Glass
2661044.description: As Clarke and the others try to integrate themselves into the Sanctum, Octavia and Diyoza fight for their lives against an opposing faction of survivors.

2661044.title: The Gospel of Josephine
2661044.description: Jordan investigates Sanctum. Meanwhile, Octavia and Diyoza discover the threats of the new planet firsthand. Lastly, Bellamy and Clarke butt heads.

2661044.title: Memento Mori
2661044.description: Diyoza learns more about the mysterious Children of Gabriel while Abby continues to search for a way to save Kane.

2661044.title: Nevermind
2661044.description: Clarke's past catches up to her.

2661044.title: The Old Man and the Anomaly
2661044.description: Octavia and Diyoza make their way to the mysterious anomaly in search of the Old Man. Meanwhile, Murphy has an offer for Emori.

2661044.title: What You Take with You
2661044.description: Bellamy must venture into enemy territory with an unlikely companion. Meanwhile, Octavia is forced to confront her past.

2661044.title: Matryoshka
2661044.description: Russell seeks justice. Meanwhile, Gabriel must make a difficult choice. Lastly, the Blake siblings reunite.

2661044.title: Ashes to Ashes
2661044.description: Bellamy and Octavia must put aside any differences and work together to save their friends. Meanwhile, Echo confronts her past.

2661044.title: Adjustment Protocol
2661044.description: A special Naming Day changes everything in Sanctum. Gabriel comes face to face with an old friend.

2661044.title: The Blood of Sanctum
2661044.description: Sanctum becomes a battleground between the devout and the non-believers. The mystery of the anomaly deepens.

2661044.title: From the Ashes
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends attempt to rebuild Sanctum as a new threat rises in the woods.

2661044.title: The Garden
2661044.description: Echo and Gabriel learn more about Hope and her mysterious past.

2661044.title: False Gods
2661044.description: As Raven faces an unexpected threat, Clarke must keep the peace among opposing factions in Sanctum.

2661044.title: Hesperides
2661044.description: Mysterious outsiders arrive with news of Clarke's missing people.

2661044.title: Welcome to Bardo
2661044.description: Octavia gets to know a whole new world. Meanwhile, Murphy and Emori play make believe.

2661044.title: Nakara
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends find themselves on a planet that is not what it seems.

2661044.title: The Queen's Gambit
2661044.description: Emori tries to heal Sanctum's old familial wounds while Echo, Octavia and Diyoza struggle with new ones.

2661044.title: Anaconda
2661044.description: Clarke confronts a new adversary. A surprising connection takes us back to the past and the nuclear apocalypse that destroyed the Earth.

2661044.title: The Flock
2661044.description: Murphy and Indra must defuse a tense situation. Meanwhile, old friends make new allegiances.

2661044.title: A Little Sacrifice
2661044.description: Sheidheda makes his move. Meanwhile, a Disciple goes rogue.

2661044.title: Etherea
2661044.description: Where in the universe is Bellamy Blake?

2661044.title: The Stranger
2661044.description: It's a new day in Sanctum. Clarke, Octavia, Raven and Echo struggle with a new foe.

2661044.title: Blood Giant
2661044.description: The red sun derails Clarke's plans.

2661044.title: A Sort of Homecoming
2661044.description: Clarke and her friends reckon with all that has happened only to find an unexpected threat looming.

2661044.title: The Dying of the Light
2661044.description: Clarke and Octavia mount a desperate rescue mission as the Disciples close in on what they want.

2661044.title: The Last War
2661044.description: After all the fighting and loss, Clarke and her friends have reached the final battle. But is humanity worthy of something greater.

2707408.title: Descenso
2707408.description: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogota.

2707408.title: The Sword of Simón Bolivar
2707408.description: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

2707408.title: The Men of Always
2707408.description: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

2707408.title: The Palace in Flames
2707408.description: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

2707408.title: There Will Be a Future
2707408.description: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness.

2707408.title: Explosivos
2707408.description: Peña and Carillo close in on Gacha. Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

2707408.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
2707408.description: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

2707408.title: La Gran Mentira
2707408.description: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

2707408.title: La Catedral
2707408.description: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña - and the Cali Cartel - have other plans.

2707408.title: Despegue
2707408.description: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.

2707408.title: Free at Last
2707408.description: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.

2707408.title: Cambalache
2707408.description: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.

2707408.title: Our Man in Madrid
2707408.description: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.

2707408.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Dead
2707408.description: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limón proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.

2707408.title: The Enemies of My Enemy
2707408.description: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata's brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.

2707408.title: Los Pepes
2707408.description: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.

2707408.title: Deutschland 93
2707408.description: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.

2707408.title: Exit El Patrón
2707408.description: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.

2707408.title: Nuestra Finca
2707408.description: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.

2707408.title: Al Fin Cayó!
2707408.description: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

2707408.title: The Kingpin Strategy
2707408.description: The Gentlemen of Cali gather their associates together for a big surprise announcement about the future of their business.

2707408.title: The Cali KGB
2707408.description: A gas incident threatens to destroy the agreement between Cali and the government and requires Jorge's help. Peña has problems with his old contact in Los Pepes.

2707408.title: Follow the Money
2707408.description: The Rodríguez brothers are hiding during the negotiations. Pacho meets the Lord of the Heavens in Mexico. Peña's new DEA team visits Cali.

2707408.title: Checkmate
2707408.description: Peña hatches a plan to try to capture Cali leader Gilberto Rodriguez. Amado proposes a business idea to Pacho.

2707408.title: MRO
2707408.description: Paranoid about leaks, Miguel cracks down on his security. Pacho makes a decision about his new offer. Peña works on cultivating a witness.

2707408.title: Best Laid Plans
2707408.description: Jorge takes a dangerous risk. An accident in New York threatens to expose Chepe. Peña travels to Curacao to arrest a potential witness.

2707408.title: Sin Salida
2707408.description: Peña plans another secret operation to topple a member of the Cali cartel but may run out of time while looking for him.

2707408.title: Convivir
2707408.description: David seeks revenge on behalf of his father and puts Enrique in danger. Peña asks Don Berna for help on a rescue mission.

2707408.title: Todos Los Hombres del Presidente
2707408.description: David follows his suspicions. Peña is shocked to discover the depth of corruption in the Colombian government. Miguel is sought after once again.

2707408.title: Going Back to Cali
2707408.description: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.

2758950.title: Pilot
2758950.description: A Center for Disease Control medical team's investigation of a disease outbreak at a high tech arctic research lab uncovers the truth about a secretive research project that could threaten the future of humankind.

2758950.title: Vector
2758950.description: As Dr. Alan Farragut (Billy Campbell) accelerates the hunt for his infected brother Peter (Neil Napier), the quarantine of three scientists threatens to create panic at the lab. Doreen (Catherine Lemieux) finds evidence that Dr. Hatake (Hiroyuki Sanada) is lying about his research.

As Alan (Billy Campbell) sets up an isolation unit to quarantine the infected lab workers, Walker (Kyra Zagorsky) and Jordan (Jordan Hayes) each face the possibility that they have the deadly virus, too.

2758950.title: Single Strand
2758950.description: The quarantine floor has been sealed off but now that the communication satellite dish has been destroyed, Dr. Alan Farragut worries about their future. In particular, there is only one week's food on that level. In the quarantine itself, Julia tries to calm those who think they've just been locked away to die. They find a way to get some attention. She also finds someone lurking in the corridors. Alan wants to use the universal vaccine the lab has developed on his brother who he thinks is on his last legs. Sarah works with one of the scientists who thinks she is ...

2758950.title: The White Room
2758950.description: As Alan's (Billy Campbell) controversial cure leaves Peter (Neil Napier) clinging to life, the unchecked virus forces Jordan (Jordan Hayes) to make a devastating decision. Walker (Kyra Zagorsky) discovers the surprising truth about her new ally, while Daniel (Meegwun Fairbrother) squares off against Balleseros (Mark Ghanimé).

2758950.title: Aniqatiga
2758950.description: After Daniel (Meegwun Fairbrother) leaves Balleseros (Mark Ghanimé) to die, the mystery surrounding his connection to Hatake (Hiroyuki Sanada) is revealed. As he works to save Peter (Neil Napier), Alan (Billy Campbell) struggles with his feelings for both Walker (Kyra Zagorsky) and Jordan (Jordan Hayes).

2758950.title: Survivor Zero
2758950.description: As Ilaria CEO Constance Sutton arrives to collect the virus and its cure, Alan finds Walker (Kyra Zagorsky) seemingly symptom-free. Daniel (Meegwun Fairbrother) learns the truth about his "adoption" by Hatake (Hiroyuki Sanada).

2758950.title: Bloodline
2758950.description: Alan (Billy Campbell) risks his life to save his brother Peter from Ilaria CEO Constance Sutton (Jeri Ryan), only to see him re-captured by Vectors. Julia Walker (Kyra Zagorsky) deals with the mystery of her "cure" while her half-brother Daniel confronts their father, Dr. Hatake (Hiroyuki Sanada), about being abducted as a child.

2758950.title: Level X
2758950.description: The Vectors - 50 or so - seem to have disappeared and Alan learns there is another level below Level R - Level X, the virus vault. He and Julia set off to destroy the core virus samples in the vault but in order to do so, they will have to immobilize the Vectors - by lowering the temperature in the facility to match outside temperatures. On level X, they find something out of Julia's past. Hatake warns everyone that the war is not over and that Ilaria will not simply give up - they can now expect an army to come and take the virus. His relationship to Julia is ...

2758950.title: Fushigi
2758950.description: Hatake finds surveillance video showing Victor Adrian with the Narvik vaccine and leaving the facility. He tells Alan that Adrian could not have survived the weather and must be dead. When Alan learns that there is an abandoned satellite station just 50 miles away, he and Julia set off to him and hopefully, the vaccine as well. What they are not prepared for is what they find in the facility's underground storage. Back at the lab, Sarah makes an important discovery and manages to record her findings before she loses consciousness. Daniel, Ballesteros and Anana flee ...

2758950.title: Black Rain
2758950.description: With the injection of Julia's spinal fluid, Sarah's tumor seems to be shrinking. Julia, who finally tells Alan she didn't destroy the Narvik virus, may have found a way to destroy it after people are infected. Dr. Duchamp tells Peter that people are disappearing from the facility. It seems apparent that, after a two day hiatus, the Vectors have returned and are now setting traps for humans. Hatake sees a text message on Constance Sutton's phone telling her that she is to be picked up in 6 hours. He now expects a strike team of at least 100 mercenaries to arrive. His ...

2758950.title: The Reaping
2758950.description: The uninfected are hiding in a secret bunker on the base as the CDC attempt to retrieve the canisters with the virus and the cure while the Ilaria assassins capture Hatake and force him to chose between which one of his children they will kill first.

2758950.title: Dans L'Ombre
2758950.description: Alan (Billy Campbell) and Peter capture the assassin Scythe and demand to know the whereabouts of Julia's (Kyra Zagorsky) mother. Balleseros confronts Hatake (Hiroyuki Sanada) about the missing Inuit children, while Anana and her brother learn of Daniel's fate. Concerns that the virus is in Ilaria's possession again forces Alan and the team off the base to search the world in order to retrieve it.

2758950.title: San Jose
2758950.description: Peter Farragut, Sarah Jordan and Dr. Kyle Sommer go to a mysterious island to investigate an unknown pathogen that killed everyone, except Leila, aboard the Mist of Avalon.

2758950.title: Reunion
2758950.description: A sick child appears while the team is investigating the island, but Sarah suspects something is amiss when the child is miraculously healed; Julia and Caleb make a discovery that furthers the mystery of the island when they dig up Alan's grave.

2758950.title: Scion
2758950.description: Peter and Jordan leave the safety of the Abbey to retrieve some specimens and discover just what's living in the woods, meanwhile Sister Amy plots to make them leave forever.

2758950.title: Densho
2758950.description: Michael struggles to keep the abbey under control as the CDC team move closer toward tracking the source of the pathogen; at the same time, Alan fights the urge to rejoin his former colleagues and comes to terms with the reality about Peter's allegiances. In the future, Walker takes a risk attempting to escape her delusional father.

2758950.title: Oubliette
2758950.description: Peter reveals his brother's secret and gets them both in trouble, meanwhile Kyle has his hands full trying to quarantine the orchard and the infected hive.

2758950.title: M. Domestica
2758950.description: The CDC team are forced to work together when another outbreak threatens to overwhelm the Abbey

2758950.title: Cross-Pollination
2758950.description: Things go from bad to worse on the island. Elsewhere, Walker decides to go to St. Germain after learning about Brother Michael.

2758950.title: Vade In Pace
2758950.description: The Coast Guard arrives on the island to take the CDC team to another island to deal with another outbreak of the pathogen, meanwhile Sister Amy has to contend with Brother Michael and his plans.

2758950.title: Ectogenesis
2758950.description: Walker and Balleseros arrive at the Abbey while Alan, Kyle and Winger are out in the woods searching for the tree with red sap that might be a cure for the pathogen.

2758950.title: Mother
