2758950.description: At the Abbey Sister Amy makes a bargain for immortality, while in the woods the race is on to find the Bleeding Tree now that Kyle is infected.

2758950.title: Plan B
2758950.description: Walker prepares to implant Jordan's baby into Amy while the Navy prepares to implement Plan B, a final solution to ensure the virus and all infected people never leave the island.

2758950.title: The Ascendant
2758950.description: While Kyle and Jordan try to escape the island as the followers hunt them, Walker and Alan search for the Mother Tree so that Walker can halt ILARIA's deadly plan.

2758950.title: O Brave New World
2758950.description: In the Season 2 finale, Alan's relationship with Walker reaches a bloody climax, while his sibling feud with Peter erupts in flames. Elsewhere, Kyle does his best to protect a possible cure for the mycosis.

3032476.title: Uno
3032476.description: Struggling public defender Jimmy McGill constructs an elaborate yet questionable plan for winning back a pair of wealthy potential clients.

3032476.title: Mijo
3032476.description: Jimmy's latest scam has gone horribly wrong and he's face-to-face with violent criminals and being forced to talk his way out of a life-threatening situation.

3032476.title: Nacho
3032476.description: Jimmy must prove that Nacho is innocent when he is wrongly suspected of kidnapping.

3032476.title: Hero
3032476.description: Jimmy makes a bold move against Hamlin in an effort to attract potential clients.

3032476.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
3032476.description: After a strange encounter with the police, Chuck ends up in the hospital. Jimmy meets up with a series of unruly clients.

3032476.title: Five-O
3032476.description: Mike's days as a police officer in Philadelphia catch up to him when he's questioned about a tragic event from his past.

3032476.title: Bingo
3032476.description: The Kettlemans seek Jimmy as their lawyer after turning down an offer from HHM, going as far as attempting to blackmail him.

3032476.title: RICO
3032476.description: Jimmy discovers the Sandpiper Retirement Home has been scamming his elderly clients, and prepares to take legal action.

3032476.title: Pimento
3032476.description: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM much to Jimmy's dismay. Mike gets a job offer working as a bodyguard.

3032476.title: Marco
3032476.description: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend; Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

3032476.title: Switch
3032476.description: Jimmy decides to quit the law after turning down a job at Davis & Main. Mike breaks ties with a former associate.

3032476.title: Cobbler
3032476.description: While Mike attempts to track down Pryce's stolen baseball cards, Jimmy must defend him when the police call him in for further questioning.

3032476.title: Amarillo
3032476.description: Jimmy struggles with client outreach and decides to shoot a TV commercial for Davis & Main. Mike begins an investigation.

3032476.title: Gloves Off
3032476.description: Jimmy and Kim face the repercussions of the TV commercial. Mike makes a deal with Nacho in regards to his newest job offer.

3032476.title: Rebecca
3032476.description: Jimmy chafes under his restrictive work environment; Kim goes to extremes to dig herself from a bottomless hole at HHM.

3032476.title: Bali Ha'i
3032476.description: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity; Kim receives a life-changing proposal; when he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.

3032476.title: Inflatable
3032476.description: When Mike's hand is forced, he can no longer hide his frustration; Mike and Jimmy work together to keep the peace.

3032476.title: Fifi
3032476.description: Mike aims to settle the score with an enemy; an unexpected opportunity presents itself to Jimmy.

3032476.title: Nailed
3032476.description: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission; someone questions Chuck's capabilities; Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

3032476.title: Klick
3032476.description: Jimmy must make a hard choice; Mike takes control of matters; Hamlin delivers shocking news.

3032476.title: Mabel
3032476.description: As Chuck plots his next move, another lie comes back to haunt Jimmy. A rattled Mike tries to find out who's been tracking his movements - and how.

3032476.title: Witness
3032476.description: Jimmy and Kim hire an assistant; Mike seeks out a mysterious acquaintance; and Chuck uses the law to gain an advantage over Jimmy.

3032476.title: Sunk Costs
3032476.description: Jimmy decides to represent a new client, much to Kim's dismay. Meanwhile, Mike meets a formidable ally who presents him an enticing offer.

3032476.title: Sabrosito
3032476.description: Jimmy calls in a favor from Mike. Meanwhile, new complications disrupt the Salamancas' business; and Chuck and Jimmy struggle to compromise.

3032476.title: Chicanery
3032476.description: Kim and Jimmy face off with an adversary. Jimmy looks to Chuck's past to secure his future. Jimmy loses an ally and gains another.

3032476.title: Off Brand
3032476.description: Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor. Chuck pushes himself to the limit. Nacho finds himself ensnared in a power struggle.

3032476.title: Expenses
3032476.description: Jimmy tries to settle his debts. Nacho reunites with an old acquaintance. Mike helps Stacey with a project and makes a meaningful connection.

3032476.title: Slip
3032476.description: Jimmy is pushed to desperate measures. Nacho picks up a skill and Mike explores an alliance. Kim stands up to Hamlin.

3032476.title: Fall
3032476.description: Jimmy visits an old friend and takes up a new pastime; Chuck and Hamlin spar over the future of the firm; and Kim faces challenges at work.

3032476.title: Lantern
3032476.description: Kim resolves to take some time off from work, while Jimmy does his best to make amends; Nacho takes a major gamble with his future; Hamlin applies pressure on Chuck to finally make a decision.

3032476.title: Smoke
3032476.description: Jimmy struggles to cope with Chuck's tragic incidence. Mike ponders his role at Madrigal. Howard makes a startling confession.

3032476.title: Breathe
3032476.description: Jimmy seeks new employment. Gus navigates the fallout from Hector's collapse. Kim endeavors to support Jimmy in the wake of Chuck's death.

3032476.title: Something Beautiful
3032476.description: Jimmy puts a risky plan into motion; as alliances shift, Nacho finds himself in the crosshairs; Kim contemplates her future.

3032476.title: Talk
3032476.description: A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor while Mike burns bridges; Kim pursues her bliss; Nacho tries to survive a turf war.

3032476.title: Quite a Ride
3032476.description: Jimmy identifies a new market for his talents; Mike vets a potential partnership; Kim drives a hard bargain.

3032476.title: Piñata
3032476.description: While Jimmy daydreams about reconstituting Wexler-McGill, Kim sets out to secure her own future; Mike puts a plan into motion for Gus.

3032476.title: Something Stupid
3032476.description: Jimmy runs into a problem as he expands his business that only Kim can solve. Gus gets involved in Hector's medical care. Mike has to deal with a setback.

3032476.title: Coushatta
3032476.description: Jimmy goes to great lengths to right a wrong, as Kim pulls out all the stops for a case; Mike lets his team blow off steam; Nacho receives a visitor.

3032476.title: Wiedersehen
3032476.description: Jimmy and Kim unburden themselves, risking their relationship in the process; Nacho is forced to make the rounds with Lalo; Mike has cause to worry.

3032476.title: Winner
3032476.description: Jimmy turns the page on his reputation; Lalo tracks a loose end in Gus's operation; Mike is forced to make a difficult decision.

3032476.title: Magic Man
3032476.description: Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy that tests Kim's tolerance of his new legal persona. Lalo searches for the mysterious "Michael."

3032476.title: 50% Off
3032476.description: Jimmy's promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo's trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse, but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his temper.

3032476.title: The Guy for This
3032476.description: Jimmy's business enters uncharted territory. Kim's confidence is tested when she's faced with a legal problem only she can solve. Nacho navigates increased pressure from Gus. Mike continues to spiral.

3032476.title: Namaste
3032476.description: As Jimmy doubles down on "Saul Goodman", a deeply conflicted Kim brings him an interesting proposition. Gus makes a sacrifice in order to play the long game. Mike attempts to smooth things over with his family.

3032476.title: Dedicado a Max
3032476.description: Mike takes an impromptu trip out of town; as she and Jimmy grow closer over their campaign to help a client, Kim makes a surprising call.

3032476.title: Wexler v. Goodman
3032476.description: Kim tries to pump the brakes on Jimmy's latest scheme, but it may be too late to stop Saul; Mike turns the heat up on Lalo; Nacho attempts to enlist support from above.

3032476.title: JMM
3032476.description: Jimmy and Kim build a legal firewall with help from Huell; Kim sets things straight with her clients as Jimmy is compromised by his; Gus calms troubled waters in service of his plot to build an empire; Mike does damage control.

3032476.title: Bagman
3032476.description: When a simple errand for a client goes sideways, Jimmy is pushed to the limit; Mike takes measures to contain the wrath of the cartel; Lalo gets an unexpected visitor.

3032476.title: Bad Choice Road
3032476.description: In the wake of Jimmy's traumatic misadventure, Kim takes stock of what is important; Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual, but it's more difficult than anticipated; Gus and Mike set a plan in motion.

3032476.title: Something Unforgivable
3032476.description: Jimmy and Kim make a sideways move that takes a serious turn; Nacho gets closer to the cartel than he'd like.

3106210.title: Clean
3106210.description: Dirty water is transformed with a series of innovations - Chicago builds America's first sewer system, and Jersey City makes water safe for drinking (and bikinis). Manufacturing is transformed with the elimination of dust.

3106210.title: Time
3106210.description: With no natural light, submarines re-invent the workday. Frustrated with hundreds of local time zones, a railroad clerk fights to standardize time. Navigation, travel, and technology advances result from unrecognized contributions to time.

3106210.title: Glass
3106210.description: The invention of the mirror gives rise to the Renaissamce; glass lenses reveal worlds within worlds worlds; glass is essential; for communication in the deep ocean; glass lens allows millions to watch a man walk on the moon.

3106210.title: Light
3106210.description: The pioneers of light; Edison's light bulb; a French scientist accidentally discovers a neon light.

3106210.title: Cold
3106210.description: Ice delivery becomes big business, the father of frozen foods, Clarence Birdseye, and his vision for the future, and penguins who live in the desert.

3106210.title: Sound
3106210.description: 30,000 year old traces of a desire to record sound are located in caves, how radio influenced the civil rights movement, the weapon that laid the ground work for today's mobile phones, and the role of the ultrasound in modern medicine.

3148266.title: Pilot
3148266.description: 27 years after a virus wipes out most of humanity, scientists send a man (James Cole) back to 2015 to stop the plague from ever happening. Cole's only lead is a virologist (Dr. Cassandra Railly), who knows the dangerous source of the outbreak.

3148266.title: Mentally Divergent
3148266.description: Cole returns to the year 2015 to gather knowledge from a patient inside a mental institution. Jones believes that the 12 Monkeys are somehow involved in the pandemic that wiped out the population of Earth, thus making Cole's attempt to extract the information from the patient, imperative. Dr Railly feels that her intervention in Cole's case has given her incentive to continue to help him in his mission, much to Cole's compliance.

3148266.title: Cassandra Complex
3148266.description: Cole is led to Haiti in 2014, where a dangerous outbreak proved to be a devastating moment in Dr. Railly's life.

3148266.title: Atari
3148266.description: A fight for the future ensues when a dangerous band of marauders hunting for Cole and Ramse threatens the mission to save the past.

3148266.title: The Night Room
3148266.description: Cole and Dr. Railly face off with the Army of the 12 Monkeys when both discover the Night Room -- an off-site, black ops lab that houses the virus that will one day destroy the world.

3148266.title: The Red Forest
3148266.description: After the events in the night room, Cole automatically returns to 2043 and finds that the timeline has been altered. He meets Jones, who has no idea who he is. In this timeline, the time transporter is not functioning but a blood tests confirms that they had met previously. A database check also reveals that Cassie was killed in 2015, likely the event that caused the change. He finds that Ramse is in charge of the facility and after some persuasion, he agrees to send Cole back to 2015. To set things right, he has to keep Cassie from being killed.

3148266.title: The Keys
3148266.description: Cole, Railly and Aaron race to stop the virus from being deployed as a bio-weapon in Chechnya.

3148266.title: Yesterday
3148266.description: The Core that powers the time machine is fading. To get Cole back from the past, Jones must convince her former colleagues at the military operation "Spearhead" that her mission is worth saving.

3148266.title: Tomorrow
3148266.description: Cole finds himself in 2017 at the height of the plague. Out of options, Jones faces an impossible choice to replace the Core.

3148266.title: Divine Move
3148266.description: Forces come to a head when Ramse takes measures to protect his newfound family, leaving Cole to deal with the fallout.

3148266.title: Shonin
3148266.description: Cole splinters to Tokyo in 1987 in a last chance effort to stop the Army of the 12 Monkeys.

3148266.title: Paradox
3148266.description: With Cole dying from the effects of time-travel, Railly must find the one person who can save him.

3148266.title: Arms of Mine
3148266.description: Cole and Cassandra try for a final confrontation with the Witness, while Jones faces a new threat to the mission.

3148266.title: Year of the Monkey
3148266.description: Cole and Ramse mend their broken friendship while on the run from the Army of the 12 Monkeys. And in the year 2043, Railly and Jones navigate an uncertain future as Deacon and the Twelve command the Temporal Facility.

3148266.title: Primary
3148266.description: Cole gets stranded in 2016 after an attempt to destroy the virus changes the future; Jones and Railly deal with the consequences of the changed timeline.

3148266.title: One Hundred Years
3148266.description: Despite the growing tension between them, Cole and Cassie time travel to New York during World War II to track down a dangerous member of the Twelve.

3148266.title: Emergence
3148266.description: Jones turns to Ramse for help getting Cole and Cassie back from 1944; Jones visits old Jennifer Goines to explore the true nature of time.

3148266.title: Bodies of Water
3148266.description: In the present, Cassie and Jennifer Goines run from the 12 Monkeys; in 2044, Cole and Ramse face off against Deacon.

3148266.title: Immortal
3148266.description: Cole and Ramse travel to 1970s New York City to prevent the Twelve from murdering a Vietnam veteran with a connection to the Witness.

3148266.title: Meltdown
3148266.description: Cole comes face to face with the Witness, the phantom behind the Army of the 12 Monkeys as Cassie's (Amanda Schull) hallucinations undergo a chilling evolution. Making matters worse, the Temporal Facility becomes increasingly dangerous after the malfunctioning time machine begins to tear apart time and space, bringing back deadly visitors from the past.

3148266.title: Lullaby
3148266.description: Cassandra Railey goes back to 2020 on a mission to kill Dr. Katarina Jones. Followed by James Cole to stop her from this mission, they find themselves stuck in a time loop.

3148266.title: Hyena
3148266.description: In 2016 Jennifer is taking matters into her own hands, going after the tall man when Cole splinters back to help her. Cassie and Ramses are both looking for revenge, looking for a place called Titan and Katarina is trying to make sense of a newfound relationship.

3148266.title: Fatherland
3148266.description: Cole's loyalty is tested when Ramse and Railly go rogue and embark on an unsanctioned mission into 1961 East Berlin in the hopes of finding an unscrupulous German doctor who knows the location of The Witness so they can kill him.

3148266.title: Resurrection
3148266.description: As the temporal facility gets closer to destruction, Cole goes to 1957 to save humanity while everyone else looks for Titan, the stronghold of the Witness.

3148266.title: Blood Washed Away
3148266.description: Cole and Cassandra search for the primary in 1957 to prevent the paradox , while in 2044, Ramsey, Deacon and the daughters try to find titan to kill the witness.

3148266.title: Memory of Tomorrow
3148266.description: Cole and Railly adjust to the past, but a mysterious woman with apocalyptic visions gets them to do the unthinkable to save the world.

3148266.title: Mother
3148266.description: The birth of the Witness and the beginning of the end of the world.

3148266.title: Guardians
3148266.description: Cole travels to 1922 and faces new enemies; the origins of the Witness' world-ending plan are revealed.

3148266.title: Enemy
3148266.description: An old enemy unveils a dangerous new scheme which could shatter bonds and unravel reality.

3148266.title: Brothers
3148266.description: Cole faces the unthinkable to save the woman he loves; an escape from the time traveling city of Titan.

3148266.title: Causality
3148266.description: To track the Witness, the gang must travel to the most outrageous era yet - the 1980s.

3148266.title: Nature
3148266.description: The origin of the Army of the 12 Monkeys is finally revealed.

3148266.title: Nurture
3148266.description: One team, two agendas and a single event that changes the course of the mission, and pits friends against friend.

3148266.title: Masks
3148266.description: Hunted by the future, Cole and Cassie arrive in 1899 London in search of their son.

3148266.title: Thief
3148266.description: The reason why the Witness wants to destroy time and reality is revealed.

3148266.title: Witness
3148266.description: The final battle with the Witness begins.

3148266.title: The End
3148266.description: The final conflict with the Army of the 12 Monkeys begins when the Witness returns to Project Splinter.

3148266.title: Ouroboros
3148266.description: Travelers come face to face with ghosts from their past when they find themselves maneuvering around their own timelines.

3148266.title: 45 RPM
3148266.description: Cassie travels back in time to confront a younger Olivia; Cole helps Jennifer find the meaning behind her final Primary vision.

3148266.title: Legacy
3148266.description: Team Splinter goes back in time to the wild frontier in search of a weapon to destroy the Witness.

3148266.title: After
3148266.description: A clue to breaking the cycle leads Cole and Cassie to the 1960s; Zalmon Shaw returns.

3148266.title: Die Glocke
3148266.description: The team infiltrates a Nazi gala to steal an artifact as "Die Glocke"; their operation comes undone when French Resistance interferes and an unexpected guest arrives.

3148266.title: Daughters
3148266.description: Jones sends Hannah back in time to 2007 on a personal mission that could be the key to everything.

3148266.title: Demons
3148266.description: Everything changes when the team finally climbs the steps and rings the bell in the Middle Ages.

3148266.title: One Minute More
3148266.description: The beginning of the end approaches as Cole and Cassie embark on their final mission.

3148266.title: The Beginning Part 1
3148266.description: The final battle against the Witness begins as the fate of time and mankind hangs in the balance; all the pieces finally come together to mark the end of the beginning.

3148266.title: The Beginning Part 2
3148266.description: When all hope is lost, Cole must complete his cycle so that his younger self will one day arrive at the end with the answer.

3230854.title: Dulcinea
3230854.description: In the asteroid belt near Saturn, James Holden and the crew of the ice freighter Canterbury, on its way to Ceres Station, investigate a distress call from an unknown derelict ship, the Scopuli.

3230854.title: The Big Empty
3230854.description: Holden and crew are trapped in badly damaged shuttle. On Ceres, Miller uncovers clues about Julie Mao. On Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala questions a terrorist.

3230854.title: Remember the Cant
3230854.description: While Avasarala plays a dangerous game of politics, Holden and his crew are forced to turn on one another while held captive by the Martian Navy.

3230854.title: CQB
3230854.description: Holden and crew are caught in the middle of a desperate battle as mysterious war ships attack and board the Donnager. As Miller continues to investigate Julie Mao, his partner Havelock continues to go missing.

3230854.title: Back to the Butcher
3230854.description: The crew has survived the loss of the Canterbury and the Donnager and are contacted by an unlikely ally. Miller, on Ceres, continues his investigation and his thoughts of a conspiracy grow.

3230854.title: Rock Bottom
3230854.description: Holden's team makes an uneasy alliance with Fred Johnson while Miller fights for his life against Anderson Dawe's thugs.

3230854.title: Windmills
3230854.description: Holden and crew realize that they're not alone on the Rocinante and find themselves up against a Martian Marine blockade. Miller's dark night of the soul, believing all is lost, finds a new reason to keep going. Avasarala visits Holden's family in Montana.

3230854.title: Salvage
3230854.description: A derelict vessel holds a potentially devastating secret. Holden and his crew cross paths with Miller on Eros. Avasarala receives bad news.

3230854.title: Critical Mass
3230854.description: A flashback to Julie's origin story reveals her trajectory. Holden and Miller finally meet and team up to get to the bottom of the strange emergency situation happening on Eros. As the true horror of the events on Eros is revealed, an ailing Holden and Miller must overcome incredible odds if they hope to live to fight another day. Part 1 of 2

3230854.title: Leviathan Wakes
3230854.description: A flashback to Julie's origin story reveals her trajectory. Holden and Miller finally meet and team up to get to the bottom of the strange emergency situation happening on Eros. As the true horror of the events on Eros is revealed, an ailing Holden and Miller must overcome incredible odds if they hope to live to fight another day. Part 2 of 2

3230854.title: Safe
3230854.description: Unlikely allies Joe Miller and the crew of the Rocinante led by Jim Holden uncover more about the conspiracy to release the proto-molecule on Eros station.

3230854.title: Doors & Corners
3230854.description: Holden and crew stage a dangerous raid in search of information about the protomolecule.

3230854.title: Static
3230854.description: Holden and Miller butt heads about how the raid was handled.

3230854.title: Godspeed
3230854.description: Miller devises a dangerous plan to eradicate what's left of the protomolecule on Eros.

3230854.title: Home
3230854.description: The asteroid Eros takes direct collision course towards Earth. The Rocinante chases it. As last defense Earth launches missiles against Eros. Miller went inside Eros and makes a surprising discovery.

3230854.title: Paradigm Shift
3230854.description: Earth is planning an expedition to the point of Eros impact. Chrisjen conflicts with Sadavir about Jules-Pierre Mao. Col. Frederick Lucius Johnson improves his position in unexpected way. New battleground is opening.

3230854.title: The Seventh Man
3230854.description: Draper struggles with what happened on Ganymede while the coming Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Errinwright. Dawes confronts Fred Johnson about what the OPA's course of action should be regarding the protomolecule.

3230854.title: Pyre
3230854.description: Naomi tracks down signs of protomolecule and Fred Johnson's control over OPA collapses.

3230854.title: The Weeping Somnambulist
3230854.description: Bobbie becomes a pawn in a struggle between Earth and Mars.

3230854.title: Cascade
3230854.description: Holden leads his crew through the war-torn station on Ganymede.

3230854.title: Here There Be Dragons
3230854.description: Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.

3230854.title: The Monster and the Rocket
3230854.description: A discovery pushes Naomi and Holden apart and sets the Roci crew against each other.

3230854.title: Caliban's War
3230854.description: In the final episode of this season, the crew of the Rocinante comes face to face with an evolving intelligence infused with the alien protomatter.

3230854.title: Fight or Flight
3230854.description: The crew has to deal with Naomi's betrayal while caught in a war between Earth and Mars. Avasarala and Bobbie hatch up an escape plan.

3230854.title: IFF
3230854.description: The Rocinante answers an unexpected distress signal. Bobbie and Avasarala find themselves being hunted by a mysterious captor. UN Secretary-General Sorrento-Gillis brings in a colleague from his past to lend an ear during this crucial time of war.

3230854.title: Assured Destruction
3230854.description: Earth strategizes a costly ploy to gain advantage in the war against Mars; Anna struggles to convince Sorrento-Gillis to do the right thing; Avasarala and Bobbie seek refuge aboard the Rocinante.

3230854.title: Reload
3230854.description: The Rocinante tends to wounded Martian soldiers in exchange for supplies; Avasarala struggles with how to disseminate a key piece of evidence despite being in hiding.

3230854.title: Triple Point
3230854.description: The search for Prax's daughter comes to a head; officers loyal to Admiral Souther plan to mutiny aboard the Agatha King.

3230854.title: Immolation
3230854.description: The final battle between Earth and Mars threatens the very future of humanity; a new monster is unleashed on Prospero Station; Anna receives the smoking gun she needs.

3230854.title: Delta-V
3230854.description: All eyes turn to the edge of the solar system as a mysterious new presence emerges; Naomi recommits to her roots; Drummer butts heads with a seasoned new commander aboard the Behemoth; and a young Belter makes a name for himself.

3230854.title: It Reaches Out
3230854.description: An old friend taunts Holden with the answers he seeks; Naomi struggles to fit in; a mysterious low-level tech aboard the Thomas Prince enacts a terrifying plan.

3230854.title: Intransigence
3230854.description: The Rocinante seeks a new game plan as they attempt to avoid capture; Melba's true motives are revealed; Naomi is torn between identity and ideal; Anna seeks a way to stay aboard the Thomas Prince.

3230854.title: Dandelion Sky
3230854.description: Holden sees past, present, and future; a ghost from Melba's past threatens her mission; Bobbie struggles to trust an old friend as she leads a group into uncharted territory.

3230854.title: Fallen World
3230854.description: Drummer and Ashford find themselves trapped with few options for survival; Anna tends to the wounded masses as Melba continues to hunt down her prey; the Rocinante crew struggles to survive as Naomi reunites with her true family.

3230854.title: Congregation
3230854.description: Wounded survivors arrive at the Behemoth. Holden and Ashford have a conversation. Holden tries to come to grips with what he has seen and tries to find out what is going on with the Station.

3230854.title: Abaddon's Gate
3230854.description: Humanity's fate is on the line as Holden and his allies race against time to save the ring by countering the plan Ashford's team is implementing. A new chapter opens for humanity.

3230854.title: New Terra
3230854.description: With 1300 new worlds within reach, a new interplanetary "land rush" has begun. The UN charges the crew of the Rocinante to settle a land dispute on its new colony world "New Terra." Meanwhile, the OPA begins transitioning the Behemoth to become outpost and gatekeeper to humanity's new frontier.

3230854.title: Jetsam
3230854.description: Avasarala is blindsided while on a visit to Mars. The Roci crew continue their protomolecule investigation while tensions between the RCE and Belters reach a tipping point. Drummer and Ashford track down a terrorist.

3230854.title: Subduction
3230854.description: New alien threats emerge on Ilus as Naomi battles health challenges on the planet. Bobbie searches for a missing person on Mars. Avasarala faces a new challenge in the UN.

3230854.title: Retrograde
3230854.description: Drummer and Ashford confront a dangerous person from Naomi's past. Murtry hunts down a target. Bobbie's makes a life-changing confession.

3230854.title: Oppressor
3230854.description: As tensions on Ilus reach a boiling point, Holden reveals a secret. Avasarala debates Nancy Gao while an emergency on the Roci forces Alex and Naomi into action.

3230854.title: Displacement
3230854.description: The Roci crew prepares for an incoming disaster on Ilus. Ashford and Drummer close in on an enemy within the Belt. Bobbie takes on a dangerous job.

3230854.title: A Shot in the Dark
3230854.description: Naomi and Alex work to keep the Barbapiccola in orbit amidst a power outage. Avasarala faces a tough decision. Holden and Elvi race to find a cure for a disease spreading on Ilus.

3230854.title: The One-Eyed Man
3230854.description: Avasarala faces fallout for the UN's military mission. Ashford and Drummer makes big decisions about their future within the OPA. A spreading illness on Ilus takes a toll on Amos. Alex and Naomi's attempt to rescue the Barb turns desperate.

3230854.title: Saeculum
3230854.description: Holden and Miller race to save Ilus. Murtry puts his endgame into motion, putting the Roci crew's lives at risk.

3230854.title: Cibola Burn
3230854.description: Ashford closes in on an enemy while uncovering a dangerous plot. Avasarala faces a crossroads in her personal and political life. The Roci crew works to reestablish life on Ilus in the wake of a deadly catastrophe.

3250026.title: First Blood
3250026.description: Jackson Oz finds a link between his late father's theories and mysterious animal attacks.

3250026.title: Fight or Flight
3250026.description: Jackson's best friend, Abraham, thinks lions might be killing humans for sport.

3250026.title: The Silence of the Cicadas
3250026.description: Jackson Oz and Abraham Kenyatta fly to Japan to recover the rest of Oz's father's research involving animals. Also, Jamie convinces Mitch to accompany her on a trip to her hometown in Louisiana to show a senator their findings on the abnormal behavior of the zoo lions. In Paris, Chloe is the first to be recruited by a shadowy intelligence agent, Gaspard Alves (Henri Lubatti), who is looking for the cause of the strange animal behavior, and a death row inmate escapes from a Mississippi prison after a vicious wolf invasion sets the prison ablaze.

3250026.title: Pack Mentality
3250026.description: Jackson, Jamie, and Chloe travel to Mississippi to investigate the prison fire, while Abraham and Mitch go north to trap and study wolves.

3250026.title: Blame It on Leo
3250026.description: Jackson, Jamie and Agent Shaffer search for a chemist in Alabama who has evidence of Reiden Global's role in the growing animal problem. Meanwhile, Chloe, Mitch and Abraham fly to Rio de Janeiro to delay the local government's plan for a massive bat extermination and come up against a ruthless drug lord.

3250026.title: This Is What It Sounds Like
3250026.description: Abraham works to save Chloe and Mitch from a drug lord; Jackson and Jamie continue to work with Agent Shaffer in search of Evan Lee Hartley and the Mother Cell after Leo is killed in the crash.

3250026.title: Sleuths
3250026.description: The team heads to Paris to investigate a group of bears whose trackers have gone offline; Mitch makes a shocking new discovery about the Mother Cell; Chloe runs into her ex-fiancé.

3250026.title: The Cheese Stands Alone
3250026.description: After a cargo ship comes to shore in Massachusetts, rats invade the island; Mitch makes a visit to his daughter and prepares to get the cure to her terminal illness.

3250026.title: Murmuration
3250026.description: Mitch escapes from Reiden with the mother cell and rejoins the others. The team digs into Delavenne's dealings with Reiden after he's seen by Mitch at the company's headquarters. Mistrust builds between Mitch and the others when they learn he was trying to return the mother cell to Reiden in exchange for his daughter's medicine.

3250026.title: Emotional Contagion
3250026.description: Now fugitives, the members of the team head to Zambia with the ultimate goal of manufacturing a cure for abnormal behavior; Chloe makes a sacrifice.

3250026.title: Eats, Shoots and Leaves
3250026.description: Chloe is taken hostage by someone she knows. Jackson and the others are arrive at Zambia to find the leopard to test Mitch's theory of the animal mutation.

3250026.title: Wild Things
3250026.description: Chloe tries to bring light to the rising threat from the animals. Jackson is taken to a hospital and while they are there Mitch works to create a cure. However, there are many obstacles they must overcome.

3250026.title: That Great Big Hill of Hope
3250026.description: Jackson and the team make a final attempt to find a cure to the worldwide animal pandemic, but hit an obstacle that may be impenetrable.

3250026.title: The Day of the Beast
3250026.description: Following the dramatic shift in violent animal behavior, the team attempts to rescue Jamie and the leopard whose DNA may hold the key to curing the animal crisis.

3250026.title: Caraquet
3250026.description: The team discovers a shocking mutation that threatens the life of one of their own.

3250026.title: Collision Point
3250026.description: After tragedy strikes their only ally within the government, the team is left on their own to stop a surge of animal-related attacks from destroying the city of Geneva, Switzerland. Also, new team member Dariela (Alyssa Diaz) makes a shocking discovery about General Davies (Peter Outerbridge), head of the Noah Objective, and in the Canadian wilderness, Jamie witnesses the animals' broadening effect on the environment and uncovers a troubling detail about Logan.

3250026.title: The Walls of Jericho
3250026.description: In an effort to unravel a dark conspiracy within the Noah Objective, the team travels to Vancouver, where it must infiltrate a black-tie event in order to get close to General Davies and stave off an impending animal threat. Also, Jamie and Logan's journey is interrupted when Logan's past comes back to haunt them.

3250026.title: The Moon and the Star
3250026.description: Jaime and Logan arrive at Caraquet, but things are not what they seem. The group tries to save Chloe.

3250026.title: Sex, Lies and Jellyfish
3250026.description: The team travels to Portugal where they square off against a dangerous venom dealer in order to get one step closer to the cure. Also, Jackson's increasingly erratic behavior jeopardizes the entire team.

3250026.title: Jamie's Got a Gun
3250026.description: Mitch helps Jackson look into his past in their continuing quest for the cure. The rest of the team searches a small town in England for the triple helix.

3250026.title: Zero Sum
3250026.description: Jackson learns his mother is missing in Africa; a hostile force takes over the team's plane; Jamie discovers a shocking secret about Abraham.

3250026.title: Sins of the Father
3250026.description: Jackson faces the most difficult decision of his life. Also, Mitch reluctantly enlists help from his father, Max Morgan (Robin Thomas), to investigate the origin of the final set of triple helix animal bones.

3250026.title: The Yellow Brick Road
3250026.description: General Davies tries to find Jackson before Mitch and Abraham to prevent the team from making a cure. Jamie, Dariela and Allison try to persuade the Russian government to drop out of the Noah Objective.

3250026.title: The Contingency
3250026.description: Mitch and Jamie find themselves in the middle of an animal attack at the Russian Embassy in Washington, D.C. Meanwhile, Jackson finally gets the answers he's been looking for...and it's from a surprising source.

3250026.title: Pangaea
3250026.description: The team rushes to Pangea to find the Saber Tooth Cat to complete the cure. Davies makes his move with the TX-Gas.

3250026.title: Clementine
3250026.description: The team races the clock to find Clementine and vaccinate her before the TX gas reaches the general population.

3250026.title: No Place Like Home
3250026.description: Ten years after the animals were cured but at the cost of sterilizing the human population, a new threat rises in the form of "the hybrids," an army of unstoppable lab-made creatures focused on destroying mankind.

3250026.title: Diaspora
3250026.description: Jackson and Logan discover a link between the hybrid attacks that occur in Portland and New York; Mitch is interrogated by a woman claiming to be his daughter, Clementine; and a new development in Abraham's research into the sterility crisis endangers his family.

3250026.title: Ten Years Gone
3250026.description: Jackson, Logan and Tessa's hunt for Abigail becomes dangerous when new hybrids appear. Abe and Dariela search for their son.

3250026.title: Welcome to the Terra Dome
3250026.description: Abe and Dariela ponder over making a deal that will betray their friends. Abigail's game of cat and mouse continues. Clementine's past catches up to her.

3250026.title: Drop It Like It's Hot
3250026.description: While Jamie's under arrest, she manages to manipulate Mitch and Logan into helping her hunt shepherds, members of a secretive group responsible for sterilizing humans.

3250026.title: Oz Is Oz
3250026.description: Mitch rushes to save Clementine from international corporate leaders. Jackson discovers he has hidden abilities.

3250026.title: Wham, Bam, Thank You Sam
3250026.description: As the team launches a rescue mission for Issac, Jaime and Mitch hunt for a large snake creature. Abigail's master plan comes to light.

3250026.title: Stakes on a Plane
3250026.description: Abigail holds Jackson prisoner in order to extract information from him that is critical to her secret master plan, and the team faces a mid-air crisis when their plane experiences an electrical malfunction.

3250026.title: The Black Forest
3250026.description: After Mitch's alter ego, Mr. Duncan, attacks the team's plane then flees, Jamie, Abe and Max set out to find him and help.

3250026.title: Once Upon a Time in the Nest
3250026.description: Logan tries to destroy the hybrid nests before they activate. Clem's pregnancy undergoes a surprising development. The team tries to perfect the cure using Abigail and the hybrids.

3250026.title: Cradles and Graves
3250026.description: As the team is trapped inside the plane by toxic spores surrounding them, complications arise during the delivery of Clementine's baby.

3250026.title: West Side Story
3250026.description: After the team's plane suffers a catastrophic accident in the hybrid zone, Dariela and Tess set out on a rescue mission to save them.

3250026.title: The Barrier
3250026.description: The team races to stop the hybrids from breaching the barrier wall by shutting down the last beacon that draws them in.

3400010.title: Get Action (1858-1901)
3400010.description: The Roosevelt family originally migrated from Holland in the 17th century. They eventually became one of New York's most prominent families with a dedication to public service. Teddy Roosevelt was the second of four children and suffered from ill-health in his youth. Teddy's father was a philanthropist who dedicated half of his time to charitable organizations. The senior Roosevelt's wife, a Southerner, begged him not to enlist in the Union Army during the Civil War and he obliged, something Teddy never forgave him for and for which he tried to make amends in his own ...

3400010.title: In the Arena (1901-1910)
3400010.description: Having boundless energy Teddy Roosevelt proved to be a president like no other. He set out to shift power from the Congress, which dominated at the time, to the executive branch of government. He went after combines and trusts and then focused on completing the Panama canal, purchasing shares owned by France. When the Columbian Senate refused to pass a deal he had negotiated with them, he threw his support behind Panamanian rebels. He faced re-election in 1904 and won easily but he also committed what is considered to be the gravest error of his political career: he ...

3400010.title: The Fire of Life (1910-1919)
3400010.description: FDR, now 28 years old, first sought and won elected office in 1910 when he ran for a seat in the New York state senate. He ran and won as a Democrat and his party did well in these midterm elections. In Albany, he proved to be a force to be reckoned with and led a group of senators opposing the governor's nominee to the U,S. Senate. He was reelected in 1912 but accepted the post of Assistant Secretary of the Navy in the Wilson administration. Teddy Roosevelt decided as early as 1910 that he would again seek the Republican nomination for president. The party bosses ...

3400010.title: The Storm (1920-1933)
3400010.description: Franklin Roosevelt was nominated as the vice presidential candidate for the 1920 election. He campaigned vigorously and was joined by Eleanor who, along with all other women, were going to vote for the first time. Although the Republican Warren G, Harding won the election, FDR was seen to have done well and was well placed to gain the presidential nomination in 1924. In August 1921 however, FDR fell ill while at his summer retreat on Campobello island in Canada. Doctors had great difficulty determining the exact nature of the disease - he suffered from high fevers and...

3400010.title: The Rising Road (1933-1939)
3400010.description: By the time Franklin was inaugurated in March 1933, 5000 banks had failed and 9 million bank accounts were wiped out. He declared a 3 day bank holiday and went on the radio urging people to show faith in the system by depositing funds when they re-opened. It worked. His cabinet included the first woman, Frances Perkins as Secretary of Labor. The first 100 days saw 15 major bills passed including deposit insurance, home ownership loans and major public works projects. The National Recovery Administration was his most ambitious program, setting prices and wages in 541 ...

3400010.title: The Common Cause (1939-1944)
3400010.description: After the German invasion of Poland in September 1939 Franklin Roosevelt assured the nation that the USA would remain neutral. The public generally agreed. He did ask Congress to authorize additional funding for the military, which was small and poorly armed, and for industry to build 50,000 airplanes which was 10 times their current annual capacity. The main political question remained whether FDR would run for a third term in office. He advised the Democratic convention that he would not run but they nominated him anyway and he agreed. He defeated Wendell Wilkie in ...

3400010.title: A Strong and Active Faith (1944-1962)
3400010.description: The war - and the resulting levels of work and security - had kept Franklin Roosevelt out of public sight. By the spring of 1944 however, he was seriously ill with bronchitis. This information was kept from the public with his doctor issuing far more positive medical reports. The event most had been waiting for finally occurred on June 6, 1944 when Allied forces landed in France. Among those going ashore was FDR's cousin and longtime political foe Theodore Roosevelt Jr., a Brigadier General who led his men in the attack at Utah beach. Less than a month later however, ...

3475734.title: Now Is Not the End
3475734.description: In 1946, Peggy Carter is now a secretary for the Strategic Scientific Reserve. Howard Stark asks her for help when the country believes that he is selling deadly weapons to their enemies.

3475734.title: Bridge and Tunnel
3475734.description: Howard Stark's deadliest weapon has fallen into enemy hands, and only Agent Carter can recover it. But can she do so before her undercover mission is discovered by SSR Chief Dooley and Agent Thompson?

3475734.title: Time and Tide
3475734.description: As Agent Carter closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, Peggy's secret mission could unravel when the SSR arrests Jarvis and a secret is revealed.

3475734.title: The Blitzkrieg Button
3475734.description: Peggy may be in more trouble than usual when fugitive Howard Stark suddenly returns for mysterious reasons. And Chief Dooley chases a new clue all the way to Europe that threatens to destroy Peggy's future at the SSR.

3475734.title: The Iron Ceiling
3475734.description: Carter finally gets a chance to prove herself as she is sent on a mission in Russia with Agent Thompson and the Howling Commandos. Meanwhile, Agent Sousa makes an important discovery.

3475734.title: A Sin to Err
3475734.description: Carter believes that the spy that stole Stark's technology is a woman. The SSR now knows that Carter is helping Stark. There's a new spy in the agency.

3475734.title: SNAFU
3475734.description: Peggy is cornered and more vulnerable than ever as Leviathan makes their move against her. As the SSR zeroes in on Howard Stark, they may pay the ultimate price as they find their true enemy is closer than they realized.

3475734.title: Valediction
3475734.description: Peggy faces the full fury of Leviathan, as Howard Stark makes his return.

3475734.title: The Lady in the Lake
3475734.description: Dedicated to the fight against new Atomic Age threats in the wake of World War II, Agent Carter journeys from New York City to Los Angeles for her most dangerous and bizarre assignment yet.

3475734.title: A View in the Dark
3475734.description: Peggy discovers her murder investigation has huge ramifications that can destroy her career, as well as everyone near and dear to her.

3475734.title: Better Angels
3475734.description: Peggy's pursuit of the truth about Zero Matter places her on a collision course with her superiors.

3475734.title: Smoke & Mirrors
3475734.description: Peggy and the SSR discover that beautiful Hollywood star Whitney Frost harbors a dangerous secret, and that she's more than just a pretty face.

3475734.title: The Atomic Job
3475734.description: As Jarvis' precision and quick-thinking skills are put to the ultimate test, Peggy must find a way to stop an atomic explosion that threatens to destroy all of California.

3475734.title: Life of the Party
3475734.description: When Peggy realizes she cannot save Wilkes on her own, she turns to her most unexpected adversary for help while Whitney makes a move to control the deadly Zero Matter.

3475734.title: Monsters
3475734.description: As Peggy plots a rescue mission, Whitney hunts for even more dark power; and Jarvis learns he should not make promises he cannot keep.

3475734.title: The Edge of Mystery
3475734.description: Peggy and Sousa propose a trade with Whitney Frost, while the SSR gets help from Howard Stark that may be the key to eliminating Zero Matter.

3475734.title: A Little Song and Dance
3475734.description: Peggy desperately tries to save Dr. Wilkes with a dangerous plan to stop Whitney Frost. But Thompson makes a surprising move that could destroy them all.

3475734.title: Hollywood Ending
3475734.description: Peggy needs Howard Stark to eliminate Zero Matter as they are faced with a mission none of them could come back.

3522142.title: La Famiglia
3522142.description: A brief history of the Italian Risorgimento provides the context for the great flight from the mezzogiorno region. By the late 19th century, Italians begin to put down roots and "Little Italys" spring up in urban areas throughout the U.S. But the first generation, holding onto language and culture, is branded "outsiders" and mistrusted by non-Italians. In New Orleans, this mistrust explodes into violence and 11 Italian Americans are murdered by an armed mob. Meanwhile, in San Francisco, a second-generation Italian American saves his community from disaster while ...

3522142.title: Becoming Americans
3522142.description: At the turn of the 20th century, more than four million Italians immigrate to America. Leonard Covello is forced to give up his "old world" ways and adopt American mores, including changing his name; Arturo Giovannitti, a new immigrant, leads the largest labor strike of 1912, when Italian Americans push for better working conditions and wages. Italian Americans are forced to worship in the basement of churches controlled by the Irish archdiocese; anarchists Sacco and Vanzetti are executed, reinforcing stereotypes that plague Italian Americans today; Prohibition breeds...

3522142.title: Loyal Americans
3522142.description: A second generation of Italian Americans begins to enter the labor movement, politics, sports and entertainment. Fiorello LaGuardia becomes mayor of New York City. Joe DiMaggio, the son of a San Francisco fisherman, becomes a baseball powerhouse who becomes an American hero. But with the outbreak of World War II, loyalty to America is questioned and Italians are forced to choose between two nations at war. While many Italian Americans fight on the frontlines with valor and bravery, other Italian Americans are labeled "Enemy Aliens," including DiMaggio's parents. The ...

3522142.title: The American Dream
3522142.description: In post-war America, Italian Americans enter the middle class. Italian-American crooners define American cool, but even as Frank Sinatra skyrockets to fame, he is haunted by accusations of Mafia ties. Can Italian Americans fit into 1950s America or will the specter of organized crime always plague them? Governor Mario Cuomo, son of Italian immigrants, struggles to straddle both worlds, while his sons' success promises assimilation and acceptance. Antonin Scalia becomes the first Italian American appointed to the U.S. Supreme Court and Congresswoman Nancy Pelosi is the...

3556944.title: Brave New World
3556944.description: After a terrorist attack in Odessa, Texas, left the city decimated and lives in shambles, those with extraordinary abilities are in hiding after being blamed for the catastrophic event. A new world order has them being hunted by those with nefarious motives, such as Luke (Zachary Levi) and Joanne Collins (Judi Shekoni), who are out to avenge a tragic loss of their son. Meanwhile, Noah Bennet (Jack Coleman) has taken measures to put his old life behind him and start over, until he comes face to face with Quentin Frady (Henry Zebrowski), a conspiracy theorist out to ...

3556944.title: Odessa
3556944.description: After a terrorist attack in Odessa, Texas, left the city decimated and lives in shambles, those with extraordinary abilities are in hiding after being blamed for the catastrophic event. Elsewhere, some are discovering their newfound skills. For better or for worse, some are fated to cross paths with assorted heroes of the past and together their ultimate destiny is nothing less than saving the world and mankind.

3556944.title: Under the Mask
3556944.description: Erica reveals how far she will go to protect the world from Evos; Tommy shares his ability with Emily; Noah and Quentin continue their quest for the truth; and invisible guides Malina.

3556944.title: The Needs of the Many
3556944.description: Tommy's mom needs a blood transfusion following the crash and it may be up to Tommy to retrieve it for her. Luke begins to question he and Joanne's quest. Noah and Quentin capture Erica's daughter for answers. Molly makes a heavy decision.

3556944.title: The Lion's Den
3556944.description: Noah Bennet (Jack Coleman) and Quentin (Henry Zebrowski) take on Renautas while Miko's plan to retrieve her sword may land her in trouble. Malina's (Danika Yarosh) journey bring her closer to the truth. Elsewhere, Luke (Zachary Levi) returns home to confront his past and the authorities close in on Tommy (Robbie Kay). Meanwhile, Carlos (Ryan Guzman) may have found an unexpected ally and Erica (Rya Khilstedt) solidifies her plans.

3556944.title: Game Over
3556944.description: Noah Bennet (Jack Coleman) takes matters into his own hands to get much-needed answers. After Tommy (Robbie Kay) makes a startling discovery, he and Emily (Gatlin Green) go on an unexpected journey. Elsewhere, Luke (Zachary Levi) continues to come to grips with the fact that he has become what he has been hunting. Malina (Danika Yarosh) finds a surprising ally. Miko (Kiki Sukezane) stays on the course to save her father, but Erica (Rya Khilstedt) takes measures to interfere. Meanwhile, Carlos (Ryan Guzman) learns more about what is really going on with EVOS from an ...

3556944.title: June 13th - Part One
3556944.description: Noah and Hiro join forces to return to the events of June 13, 2014, that set everything in motion; Mohinder receives a message from Angela Petrelli about Erica's motives; Hachiro moves against Hiro.

3556944.title: June 13th - Part Two
3556944.description: Erica puts her plan into motion; Hiro and Angela take on an important mission; Noah has an unexpected reunion with Matt Parkman.

3556944.title: Sundae, Bloody Sundae
3556944.description: Noah is on the hunt for Tommy to reveal his past to him and guide him on his destiny to stop a catastrophic event. Taylor's discoveries about her mother, Erica Kravid, leads to her capture by an underground group.

3556944.title: 11:53 to Odessa
3556944.description: Noah and Luke's destinies intersect as Malina tries to save those around her by unleashing her power; Tommy may be forced to work with his enemy; Carlos confronts his past while under Matt Parkman's watch; Ren looks for Miko.

3556944.title: Send in the Clones
3556944.description: Luke and Malina unite to rescue Tommy and save mankind in the wake of Noah's vanishing. Tommy and Miko team up against Erica. At the Sundtone Manor a battle rages to free prisoners under Matt Parkman's control.

3556944.title: Company Woman
3556944.description: Erica faces her past when Taylor threatens her life. Tommy and Quentin switch sides once again. Ren and Emily end up in the same place. Malina tries to get in touch with Tommy.

3556944.title: Project Reborn
3556944.description: The real Miko is brought to life. Ren enters the game to save Tommy. Quentin is put in a difficult situation. Malina attempts to stop the solar flare.

3663490.title: And the Crown of King Arthur
3663490.description: Someone is killing off potential Librarians and it's up to Flynn Carsen and his new Guardian, Colonel Eve Baird, to save the three that are left.

3663490.title: And the Sword in the Stone
3663490.description: The Serpent Brotherhood is trying to return magic to our world. Flynn, Colonel Baird, and the potential Librarians must stop them before it's too late.

3663490.title: And the Horns of a Dilemma
3663490.description: The Librarians' first solo mission hits a snag when Baird loses the others in a mysterious Labyrinth that magically exists below the skyscraper of a modern corporation.

3663490.title: And Santa's Midnight Run
3663490.description: Santa or at least the Spirit of Santa is kidnapped by the Serpent Brotherhood. The Librarians are tasked by Mrs. Clause to rescue Santa in London.

3663490.title: And the Apple of Discord
3663490.description: When the dragons sleeping beneath the earth threaten to awaken and wreak havoc around the world, Flynn returns to help find their hidden treasure.

3663490.title: And the Fables of Doom
3663490.description: The Librarians travel to a town where fairy tales are coming to life - and attacking.

3663490.title: And the Rule of Three
3663490.description: When a group of competitive high-school students start undercutting each other with witchcraft, the Librarians have to intercede before disaster destroys them all.

3663490.title: And the Heart of Darkness
3663490.description: The Librarians encounter the House behind the legend of all haunted houses and set out to destroy it.

3663490.title: And the City of Light
3663490.description: A missing-person investigation uncovers what appears to be an alien invasion in a small rural town.

3663490.title: And the Loom of Fate
3663490.description: The changing destinies of the Librarians.

3663490.title: And the Drowned Book
3663490.description: The Librarians gather after months of being on their own to investigate a mysterious and massive storm over Manhattan.

3663490.title: And the Broken Staff
3663490.description: Prospero summons other fictionals to retrieve the parts of his staff.

3663490.title: And What Lies Beneath the Stones
3663490.description: The Librarians must come clean and tell the truth after a shape-shifting entity that grows stronger when lies are told is freed.

3663490.title: And the Cost of Education
3663490.description: Students start to vanish at a university founded by a mad historian who believed in alternate dimensions.

3663490.title: And the Hollow Men
3663490.description: While chasing one of the Library's missing artifacts, Flynn is kidnapped by a mysterious stranger with both amnesia and a collection of all the Library's missing artifacts. Soon all of them are in pursuit of the Staff of Zarathustra before it falls into the hands of Prospero.

3663490.title: And the Infernal Contract
3663490.description: An old friend of Baird's is running for Mayor of a small New Hampshire town and finds himself embroiled in a scandal in the form of a missing intern and a literal contract with the Devil. Baird soon finds herself in a battle not only for her own soul, but also for the souls of all the Librarians.

3663490.title: And the Image of Image
3663490.description: Mysterious events affecting young and beautiful clubbers lead the Librarians to a certain person in possession of a unique selfie.

3663490.title: And the Point of Salvation
3663490.description: The Clipping Book sends the team to a high-tech research facility, where the researchers have been turned into mindless monsters by some bizarre power source in the center's lab. When they disconnect the artifact, however, they find themselves stuck in a time loop.

3663490.title: And the Happily Ever Afters
3663490.description: The team members scatter, living ideal versions of their lives. However, they're drawn back together to investigate the appearance of Ariel, a sprite, bound to serve Prospero.

3663490.title: And the Final Curtain
3663490.description: Prospero gains renewed magic that creates havoc with the world's technology. Flynn and Baird must travel back to 1611 to battle Prospero and thwart his scheme to recreate a forest utopia.

3663490.title: And the Rise of Chaos
3663490.description: The Egyptian God of Chaos inhabits a human, and tries to release pure evil into the world; the librarians must decipher clues in a science museum.

3663490.title: And the Fangs of Death
3663490.description: Flynn leads the others on a rescue mission, which leads them into a subterranean trap filled with ancient Egyptian werewolves.

3663490.title: And the Reunion of Evil
3663490.description: Two Librarians retrieve a magical object. They take refuge at a lodge where everyone wants the object to further their evil powers. Jenkins, Jones and Baird work through the magic in an attempt to provide a timely rescue.

3663490.title: And the Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
3663490.description: After seeing a vision of her own death at the hands of a supernatural assassin, can Baird cheat fate and stop the deadly prophecy coming true?

3663490.title: And the Tears of a Clown
3663490.description: The Librarians investigate a mysterious traveling carnival and discover how dangerous their collection of magical artifacts could be.

3663490.title: And the Trial of the Triangle
3663490.description: In order to stop the spread of pure evil, the team must find the Eye of Ra and unravel the mystery of the Bermuda Triangle; Flynn must pass a series of tests.

3663490.title: And the Curse of Cindy
3663490.description: The obnoxious Cindy Kroger has suddenly become super-popular thanks to a magical love potion. The Librarians must stop her before she launches a love missile that would force the whole world to become her fan base.

3663490.title: And the Eternal Question
3663490.description: A man's strange death by exploding into flames send Jake, Cassandra and Ezekiel to a wellness retreat like no other. There they find the key to eternity or at least it seems they do. Meanwhile Carsen and Baird spend much needed time alone.

3663490.title: And the Fatal Separation
3663490.description: When The Monkey King's sacred homeland of Shangri-La is taken over by a ruthless collector of magical artifacts, the balance of the Universe is put in jeopardy, forcing all the Librarians to come together to help save the imperiled land but at a terrible cost.

3663490.title: And the Wrath of Chaos
3663490.description: The library is simultaneously infiltrated by DOSA and Apep; Flynn, Baird, Stone, Cassandra, Ezekiel and Jenkins must put aside their differences to save the library, the world and themselves.

3663490.title: And the Dark Secret
3663490.description: A secret sect of the Vatican Church unearths a map detailing the locations of the four cornerstones of the Library of Alexandria; Flynn and the Librarians work with an unexpected ally to stop them before the stones can be used to destroy the Library.

3663490.title: And the Steal of Fortune
3663490.description: When people begin getting hurt in the unluckiest of ways, the Librarians are led to a casino where the owner appears to possess an artifact capable of stealing people's luck.

3663490.title: And the Christmas Thief
3663490.description: Eve, Flynn and Jenkins go to a party hosted by Santa Claus. In the meantime Santa's Sleigh is left in the care of The Library, it also happens to be All Thanksthieving Day celebrated by thieves all the world over. Ezekiel feels he needs to see his family of thieves to bring his adoptive mother a gift which happens not to be stolen. Once Ezekiel mother finds out that Ezekiel has been leading a double life at the Library one thing leads to another as mother steals the magical world globe to do her own thefts and what ensues has The Libraians try to right what's wrong ...

3663490.title: And the Silver Screen
3663490.description: When Flynn and Baird are sucked into Baird's favorite classic Film Noir movie, the Librarians are drawn into the world of movie magic - literally - where they'll need to perfect their lassoing skills, sharpshooting, and snappy dialogue if they're going to make it out alive.

3663490.title: And the Bleeding Crown
3663490.description: A Librarian from the past teams up with the Librarians of the present to take down an ancient and powerful enemy let loose in the modern day. When superfan Flynn is met with the prospect of teaming with his Librarian hero Darrington Dare, he could not be more excited, until Darrington leaves the Librarians with this dire warning: There can be only one Librarian - ignore at your own peril.

3663490.title: And the Graves of Time
3663490.description: When Baird goes after Nicole Noone in an attempt to repair her rift with the Library, she ends up joining Nicole in a mission to retrieve a dangerous artifact before it falls into the hands of Russian grave robbers. But can she convince Nicole to forgive the Library and return home with her? Or, will Nicole open Baird's eyes to the dangers of a Guardian dedicating herself, heart and soul, to the Library?

3663490.title: And the Disenchanted Forest
3663490.description: When dissension threatens the group, Baird takes the Librarians to a charismatic self-help guru's team building camp on the edge of a forest where people have been mysteriously disappearing. Is there a monster in the woods? Or is something more sinister going on? And can the Librarians get their team mojo back in time to defeat it?

3663490.title: And the Hidden Sanctuary
3663490.description: After Cassandra freezes up during a mission, she decides it's past time to go on a vacation. Searching for her ideal town, she lands on Havenport, the "Safest Town in America." At first blush, it seems just what she needed, but is there always a price to pay for unrealistic peace of mind?

3663490.title: And a Town Called Feud
3663490.description: When a Civil War reenactment in a town called Feud is plagued by ghosts, the Librarians have to uncover the truth of what really happened there over 100 years ago.

3663490.title: And Some Dude Named Jeff
3663490.description: When Jenkins body-switches with a 28-year-old slacker named Jeff, he must find his way back into the Library to correct the mistake. But he will need a team to do it, and enlists the help of Jeff's hapless Dungeons and Dragons friends. Can they make it in time, before Jeff destroys the Library?

3663490.title: And the Trial of the One
3663490.description: As tensions between the Librarians escalate over which of them is the most deserving to participate in the tethering ceremony with Baird, the Library steps in and turns each of the Librarians into their most primal selves, and are sent to survive a terrifying alternate reality to determine who is the most worthy.

3663490.title: And the Echoes of Memory
3663490.description: After the world is morphed into a horrible and unrecognizable place - one where the Library never existed - it's up to Baird to bring the Librarians together before this bleak, knowledge-less world becomes the new reality.

3843168.title: Puppies and Kittens
3843168.description: Three years into the zombie apocalypse, Lt. Hammond assembles a team of everyday heroes to transport the only known survivor of the zombie virus from New York to California in hopes of using his blood for a vaccine.

3843168.title: Fracking Zombies
3843168.description: In New Jersey, the survivors run out of fuel and embark on a dangerous mission to replenish their supply. Meanwhile, Cassandra's past comes back to haunt her.

3843168.title: Philly Feast
3843168.description: The survivors make their way through the mean streets of Philadelphia, where they cross paths with a group of psychotic outlaws with ties to one of their own.

3843168.title: Full Metal Zombie
3843168.description: What's worse than zombies? Soldier zombies. Plus: Ten Thousand's mysterious past is revealed.

3843168.title: Home Sweet Zombie
3843168.description: The survivors visit Warren's home town, but will they find her long missing husband? Oh, yeah - there's also a zombie tornado.

3843168.title: Resurrection Z
3843168.description: An encounter with a seeming utopian enclave and a religious cult results in a series game changer.

3843168.title: Welcome to the Fu-Bar
3843168.description: As the survivors try to recover from what happened, they come upon a gun show that makes the zombie apocalypse look calm.

3843168.title: Zunami
3843168.description: The group finds themselves trapped in a morgue as a giant hoard of zombies approach. Citizen Z gets an unexpected visitor who might not be who he seems to be.

3843168.title: Die Zombie Die... Again
3843168.description: The travails of Mack and Addy, separated from the group.

3843168.title: Going Nuclear
3843168.description: The survivors must prevent a nuclear meltdown, while dealing with glowing and radioactive zombies.

3843168.title: Sisters of Mercy
3843168.description: An all-female commune in Utah is where the two groups of survivors find each other, but when one of them is shot, the idea of Utopia is destroyed.

3843168.title: Murphy's Law
3843168.description: Murphy is kidnapped by a group of outlaws trying to crack the 'Fort Knox of Oxycotin.' While the survivors fight drug enhanced zombies, Murphy makes a startling discovery about his abilities.

3843168.title: Doctor of the Dead
3843168.description: The team is rerouted to a Colorado lab where they hope to find Dr. Merch.

3843168.title: The Murphy
3843168.description: Season 2 picks up where Season 1 left off, moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons triggered by Murphy. It's every man for him/herself. Our Heroes split up as they try to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies and unable to communicate with the team. In a desperate attempt to help them out on their quest to get to California and the CDC, Citizen Z issues an on air bounty for Murphy. Suddenly everyone wants a piece of the Murphy, including a mysterious and deadly bounty hunter, Vasquez.

3843168.title: White Light
3843168.description: Following Citizen Z's on-air bounty announcement, it seems like everyone left who isn't a zombie is on the hunt for Murphy -- and they're not afraid to do whatever it takes to bring him in dead or alive! Newly reunited, our Heroes find themselves battling both zombies and over-eager bounty hunters. The fighting is fierce, resulting in a near-death experience for each of our Heroes, culminating in a tragedy no one saw coming. In all the confusion, Murphy manages to give our Heroes the slip yet again. Vasquez, at first interested only in bagging Murphy for himself, ...

3843168.title: Zombie Road
3843168.description: Our Heroes manage to finally track Murphy down. They come across a wagon train caravan of desperate survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way they are attacked by "Blasters," superfast zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout. Our Heroes are introduced to "Z-Weed," an ultra-potent strain of marijuana grown in zombie compost. They go on a quest for "Batch 47," a potential cure for the Zombie Virus.

3843168.title: Batch 47
3843168.description: Cassandra and Murphy visit the botanical labs to check out the so-called herbal cure.

3843168.title: Zombaby!
3843168.description: The gang runs into trouble while trying to deliver Serena and Murphy's baby to safety. But is the baby worth saving?

3843168.title: Zombie Baby Daddy
3843168.description: The group worries about the hybrid baby's true nature, prompting Murphy to escape with his daughter.

3843168.title: Down the Mississippi
3843168.description: Our Heroes try to cross the Mississippi but are involved in a boating accident and split up again. 10K is drawn into Sketchy and Skeezy's latest scam, resulting in a run in with Escorpion. Playing judge, jury and executioner all in one, Escorpion sentences 10K, Sketchy and Skeezy all to death. Warren and the rest of our Heroes arrive on the scene, but is it too late?

3843168.title: The Collector
3843168.description: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by an overly enthusiastic and slightly unbalanced zombie fan, "The Collector," who is hell-bent on adding him to his zombie museum. Murphy must match wits with the Collector if he's to survive, much less escape.

3843168.title: Rozwell
3843168.description: Mysterious things are starting to happen as our Heroes drive through RoZwell, New Mexico. Bright lights in the sky and the appearance of a beautiful but slightly 'spacey' woman, Bernadette, lead the team on an adventure through an abandoned Air Force base in search of zombie aliens. There they discover what looks like alien technology and quite possibly the answer to the question, "Are we really alone in the universe?"

3843168.title: We Were Nowhere Near the Grand Canyon
3843168.description: The team splits up because of a massive zombie horde, and encounters a Native American tribe fighting against itself.

3843168.title: Corporate Retreat
3843168.description: Our Heroes find themselves eyeball deep in corporate politics after they decide to seek shelter at a hotel taken over by a group of white collar survivors. While they're participating in trust falls and talking stick circles, someone tries to kill Murphy by shooting him. Suddenly faced with a possible killer in their midst, our Heroes play a dangerous game of "Clue" - with zombies!

3843168.title: Party with the Zeros
3843168.description: The team meets La Reina, Queen of the Zeros, after being captured.

3843168.title: Adiós, Muchachos
3843168.description: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that Dr. Kurian's Z-Vaccine doesn't work at all! Instead of building an immunity to the Zombie Virus, the bad vaccine actually makes anyone inoculated susceptible to Murphy's unique brand of mind manipulation. Vasquez gets caught in his plot to kill Escorpion and is sentenced to death by La Reina. Murphy uses mental manipulation to position Warren as La Reina's new second in command. Warren frees Vasquez just in time to watch everyone who was inoculated succumb to a bizarre new form of the Zombie Virus.

3843168.title: Day One
3843168.description: As Citizen Z looks for answers as to who has hacked his system, the others reflect on where they were when it all began as they travel further towards their goal of finding a cure in California.

3843168.title: All Good Things Must Come to an End
3843168.description: Los Angeles! Our Heroes drive through the abandoned city on their way to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab given to them by Citizen Z. They head up towards Malibu where they discover the CDC lab isn't just a lab...it's a submarine! Dr. Merch welcomes our Heroes aboard and not a moment too soon as the Zeros show up hot on their heels. It's a bittersweet moment as Murphy says goodbye to the rest of our Heroes. As they leave Murphy and the fate of humanity with Dr. Merch, one question lingers; is this really the end of our grand adventure?

3843168.title: No Mercy
3843168.description: The gang protects the town against a new enemy.

3843168.title: A New Mission
3843168.description: In the season 3 premiere, Warren and gang are taken prisoner, while Murphy escapes the sub with his newly formed group of blends.

3843168.title: Murphy's Miracle
3843168.description: Murphy begins starting his new world plans. Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town with a single inhabitant.

3843168.title: Escorpion and the Red Hand
3843168.description: More people flock to Murphy's new cult. The others are stuck in the middle of a war.

3843168.title: Little Red and the Wolfz
3843168.description: 10K, injured and alone, is stalked by a pack of wolves.

3843168.title: Doc Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
3843168.description: Doc is captured by the residents of a mental hospital and must help them escape.

3843168.title: Welcome to Murphytown
3843168.description: The Man discovers Lucy's existence. 10k reunites with the gang and he tells them about Murphy's growing army.

3843168.title: Election Day
3843168.description: Doc and Addy run into Sketch & Skezzy when the Murphymobile isn't working. Sketch is running for President of the Apocalypse.

3843168.title: Heart of Darkness
3843168.description: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy.

3843168.title: They Grow Up So Quickly
3843168.description: Doc and Addy try to convince Lucy's family to follow them. Murphy tests 10K's allegiance.

3843168.title: Doc's Angels
3843168.description: Doc tries to find a way to communicate with Warren, but instead encounters something much more menacing.

3843168.title: The Siege of Murphytown
3843168.description: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

3843168.title: Duel
3843168.description: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her, and Lucy does the same to The Man.

3843168.title: Everybody Dies in the End
3843168.description: The gang reunites and faces the biggest battle yet.

3843168.title: Warren's Dream
3843168.description: The group is confronted by the inhabitants of Zona.

3843168.title: Escape from Zona
3843168.description: Driven by Warren's dream of a black rainbow, Warren and Murphy make their way back to the mainland.

3843168.title: The Vanishing
3843168.description: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, 10K and the group must decide whether to keep looking for them, or give up and press on to Newmerica.

3843168.title: A New Mission: Keep Moving
3843168.description: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing The Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

3843168.title: The Unknowns
3843168.description: An Unseen Force captures the team and forces them to work in an underground facility doing dangerous and bizarre tasks.

3843168.title: Back From the Undead
3843168.description: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life; and the others Battle of biologically modified Franken zombie.

3843168.title: Warren's Wedding
3843168.description: Shaken by the death of one of the team, something snaps in Murphy, and Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

3843168.title: Crisis of Faith
3843168.description: Warren and the others encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber, but he's something much more than that.

3843168.title: We Interrupt This Program
3843168.description: The group explores an abandoned TV news station and encounters news crew zombies triggering haunting flashbacks from day one.

3843168.title: Frenemies
3843168.description: Doc and Our Heroes are reunited with Sketchy and Skeezy when they take refuge in a working Barber Shop full of mysterious, and murderous, characters

3843168.title: Return to Mercy Labs
3843168.description: Warren's dream leads the group back to Mercy Labs where she must perform a dangerous task without knowing why.

3843168.title: Mt. Weather
3843168.description: Warren and the group must stop Zona from launching operation Black Rainbow to cleanse the landscape of zombies- and humans.

3843168.title: The Black Rainbow
3843168.description: The secret of Warren's dream is unlocked when they reach their final destination, the "Black Rainbow" facility.

3843168.title: Welcome to the Newpocalypse
3843168.description: Warren recovers from the drone crash with handsome, mysterious Cooper; Doc and the others finally arrive in Newmerica, where they meet George, who is helping form the new country.

3843168.title: A New Life
3843168.description: Warren must leave her new life behind and find her way to Newmerica, reuniting with Murphy and the other heroes, while discovering George is an old friend.

3843168.title: Escape from Altura
3843168.description: 10K nearly loses everything as Panic and anti-Talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote.

3843168.title: Pacifica
3843168.description: Warren, Doc and George find evidence of vigilante violence against Talkers, and Lt. Dante may be part of an underground network helping Talkers flee humans.

3843168.title: Killing All the Books
