3843168.description: Pacifica is bombed and the heroes decide to follow the Talker Underground to stop whoever is behind the attacks.

3843168.title: Limbo
3843168.description: Warren and the gang find Limbo and are reunited with an old friend. Murphy and his band of Blends runs the casino there which also serves as a sanctuary for the Talkers.

3843168.title: Doc's Stoned History
3843168.description: Skeezy and Sketchy re-enact Doc's stories of the Founding Fathers. Warren and the others search for the bizkit bakery and the secret ingredient in them.

3843168.title: Heartland
3843168.description: The heroes arrive in the farming outpost that produces flour for bizkits and find it overrun by zombies.

3843168.title: Water Keepers
3843168.description: Doc must spirit walk again to help save the Chief of the Water Keepers and get the water flowing to Newmerica.

3843168.title: State of Mine
3843168.description: Talkers are forced by the Altura militiamen to mine a hazardous landfill for the secret ingredient to bizkits.

3843168.title: Hackerville
3843168.description: With some help from an outpost of renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

3843168.title: At All Cost
3843168.description: Estes imprisons the captive Talkers and Blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

3843168.title: The End of Everything
3843168.description: The heroes try to bring Estes and Pandora to justice. Cooper reappears and shocks Warren with a new revelation.

4052886.title: Pilot
4052886.description: Lucifer has left Hell to take up a life on Earth. When a friend of his is murdered Lucifer joins forces with the good side of the law to discover who the perpetrators are and to give them what they rightfully deserve.

4052886.title: Lucifer, Stay. Good Devil.
4052886.description: When a movie star's son is killed after being chased by the paparazzi, Chloe takes a deep look into the case with a little help from Lucifer. Meanwhile, Maze and Amenadiel continue to encourage Lucifer to go back to hell.

4052886.title: The Would-Be Prince of Darkness
4052886.description: An up-and-coming quarterback calls Lucifer after finding a corpse in his pool; Lucifer asks Chloe to help investigate, which leads them into the world of big-money sports.

4052886.title: Manly Whatnots
4052886.description: In an effort to get over his infatuation with Chloe, Lucifer decides that he must seduce her. Meanwhile, the two team up on a missing girl case and Amenadiel confronts Maze about his concerns with Lucifer.

4052886.title: Sweet Kicks
4052886.description: When Lucifer is attending a fashion show, a girl gets murdered. He then volunteers to help Detective Decker solve the homicide. Mazikeen goes behind Lucifer's back.

4052886.title: Favorite Son
4052886.description: A robbery gone bad leads to Lucifer and Chloe working together. Dan has an unusual encounter with Mazikeen. Chloe suspects Lucifer might be a criminal. Linda chooses to play Lucifer's game.

4052886.title: Wingman
4052886.description: Lucifer gets help from an unlikely source while trying to find the contents of his stolen container; Chloe uncovers a vital clue.

4052886.title: Et Tu, Doctor?
4052886.description: The murder of a therapist prompts Lucifer to enlist the help of Dr. Linda to search for a suspect.

4052886.title: A Priest Walks Into a Bar
4052886.description: A priest seeks out Lucifer's help when he suspects an underground drug operation has set up shop at a neighborhood youth center. Meanwhile, Malcolm manipulates a way to keep an eye on Dan.

4052886.title: Pops
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe suspect a restaurateur's son played a part in his death; the return of Chloe's mother sends her life into upheaval.

4052886.title: St. Lucifer
4052886.description: When philanthropist Tim Dunlear is found dead, Lucifer explores his good side by becoming a benefactor for Tim's glitzy Los Angeles charity.

4052886.title: #TeamLucifer
4052886.description: The team investigates the death of a woman whose body with "Hail Lucifer" message was found lying in a pentagram.

4052886.title: Take Me Back to Hell
4052886.description: When Lucifer is framed for murder, he and Chloe must work together to clear his name and prove the identity of the true killer.

4052886.title: Everything's Coming Up Lucifer
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe look into the murder of a stand-in actress; Chloe's faith in Lucifer is tested.

4052886.title: Liar, Liar, Slutty Dress on Fire
4052886.description: Lucifer suspects his mother may be involved in a ghastly murder for which she claims she's innocent.

4052886.title: Sin-Eater
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a gruesome murder after a video of the crime surfaces on social media. When a second video appears, they realize they have a serial killer on their hands.

4052886.title: Lady Parts
4052886.description: After the bodies of two young L.A. transplants are found poisoned, Chloe and Lucifer hunt for the killer. Upon Maze convincing Chloe to go out for drinks, which the detective perceives as an act of friendship, but is actually part of a bet between Maze and Lucifer, the two make a shocking decision.

4052886.title: Weaponizer
4052886.description: Lucifer's brother Uriel shows up as he investigates the murder of his favorite action hero.

4052886.title: Monster
4052886.description: Guilty and self-destructive, Lucifer clashes with Chloe during an investigation, leading her to team up with Dan instead. Meanwhile, Amenadiel bonds with Charlotte, and Maze takes Trixie trick-or-treating.

4052886.title: My Little Monkey
4052886.description: After the man convicted of killing Chloe's father is murdered, new clues suggests he was framed; Maze looks for a job; Lucifer tries to learn how to be normal by watching Dan.

4052886.title: Trip to Stabby Town
4052886.description: Lucifer seeks Azrael's blade when he discovers it's been used in a string of violent stabbings linked to a local yoga studio.

4052886.title: Homewrecker
4052886.description: Lucifer goes to great lengths to protect his home when the owner is murdered and the new owner wants it demolished.

4052886.title: Quid Pro Ho
4052886.description: Charlotte is determined to get Lucifer to leave Earth by turning Chloe against him. Meanwhile, Amenadiel has begun working as Charlotte's soldier, which makes Maze question his loyalty.

4052886.title: Stewardess Interruptus
4052886.description: The tension between Lucifer and Chloe makes it difficult for them to investigate the murder of two victims who happen to be Lucifer's old flames.

4052886.title: Love Handles
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a mysterious masked killer who is poisoning college students. They also try to make sense of their new relationship, after a long-awaited kiss. Meanwhile, Charlotte visits Linda for advice on a touchy subject.

4052886.title: A Good Day to Die
4052886.description: Lucifer returns to hell to find an antidote for Chloe and his mother goes to hell to bring him back.

4052886.title: Candy Morningstar
4052886.description: Lucifer has gone off the grid and cut off all contact from his family and the police department, following Chloe's near-death. But the murder of an up-and-coming guitarist causes him to resurface - with a new mystery woman. Meanwhile, Lucifer's mom realizes she may have found a way to finally get them back to Heaven.

4052886.title: Deceptive Little Parasite
4052886.description: Lucifer attempts to control his emotions when he learns the flaming sword is the only way the family can return home. In the meantime, a therapist and head of admissions at a prestigious private school is found dead.

4052886.title: God Johnson
4052886.description: When a grisly murder takes place at an insane asylum, the prime suspect calls himself God. Lucifer, unsure this may be his father, tries to find the real killer.

4052886.title: Sympathy for the Goddess
4052886.description: Charlotte helps Lucifer and Chloe find out who killed the man who had the last piece of the Flaming Sword.

4052886.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Crispy
4052886.description: Charlotte accidentally burns a man to death, leaving Lucifer to keep Chloe from figuring what really happened, so he puts Maze in charge of locating Charlotte and Amenadiel, who have both gone missing. Meanwhile, Lucifer seeks a permanent solution for the ticking-time-bomb that is his mother.

4052886.title: They're Back, Aren't They?
4052886.description: Lucifer enlists Chloe to figure out how he wound up in the desert with his wings back.

4052886.title: The One with the Baby Carrot
4052886.description: Lucifer takes a sudden interest in a case while continuing to track down the Sinnerman.

4052886.title: Mr. and Mrs. Mazikeen Smith
4052886.description: Maze heads to Canada to get more out of life, but Chloe suspects she's being deceived by a conman.

4052886.title: What Would Lucifer Do?
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe investigate the murder of a youth counselor.

4052886.title: Welcome Back, Charlotte Richards
4052886.description: When a food chemist is found dead, Lucifer and Chloe's investigation pits them against an unexpected face - criminal defense attorney Charlotte Richards. Everyone is caught off guard when they see her back in the precinct. As Lucifer tries to understand her return, he makes a shocking discovery that helps solve the case.

4052886.title: Vegas With Some Radish
4052886.description: When Lucifer discovers Candy has gone missing, he hightails it to Las Vegas with Ella in tow. They work to find her, but interesting secrets could compromise the investigation. Meanwhile, Chloe is upset that Lucifer left on her birthday.

4052886.title: Off The Record
4052886.description: A reporter seeks revenge after he discovers that Lucifer has been sleeping with his estranged wife. However, when it's revealed who the estranged wife is, things get messy. Lucifer's reputation and safety are on the line, especially when a serial killer from the past resurfaces.

4052886.title: Chloe Does Lucifer
4052886.description: When a murder is connected to a celebrity dating app, Lucifer and Chloe question all they know about the world of social media in order to solve the case. Meanwhile, Amenadiel helps Linda deal with the death of her ex-husband.

4052886.title: The Sinnerman
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe come face-to-face with the Sinnerman.

4052886.title: The Sin Bin
4052886.description: With the Sinnerman in custody, Lucifer is determined to get his devil face back, but his conscience is in question when another victim's life is on the line.

4052886.title: City of Angels?
4052886.description: A flashback episode about Lucifer's first days on Earth.

4052886.title: All About Her
4052886.description: Lucifer tries to earn Chloe's assistance in his investigation of Pierce. Meanwhile, Amenadiel deals with a personal health issue.

4052886.title: Til Death Do Us Part
4052886.description: When there's a murder in a suburban neighborhood Lucifer and Pierce have to go undercover to find the killer.

4052886.title: My Brother's Keeper
4052886.description: While investigating a death of a diamond thief, Chloe and Lucifer hone in an unexpected suspect. Meanwhile, Charlotte upsets Linda with a request.

4052886.title: High School Poppycock
4052886.description: Lucifer fights a mental block, Chloe has silly fun while solving a murder, and Maze helps her friends get some resolve.

4052886.title: Infernal Guinea Pig
4052886.description: A murder investigation reveals the dark side of Hollywood. Chloe puts her life on the line.

4052886.title: Let Pinhead Sing!
4052886.description: When a superstar singer's life is threatened, the team is thrust into the world of big-ticket stadium shows, crazed fans and divas, giving Lucifer a run for his money. Meanwhile, Charlotte tries to help Linda and Maze repair their friendship.

4052886.title: The Last Heartbreak
4052886.description: Chloe and Lucifer track down a serial killer targeting couples in love and Pierce realizes the case is connected to a murder he solved in 1958.

4052886.title: Orange Is the New Maze
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe enter the world of bounty hunting to investigate a murder.

4052886.title: The Angel of San Bernardino
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a murder where a witness claims a winged guardian angel saved her life; Pierce and Chloe's relationship takes an interesting turn; Lucifer discovers something that could change everything.

4052886.title: Anything Pierce Can Do I Can Do Better
4052886.description: When a ballerina is brutally murdered, Lucifer helps Chloe solve the case; Amenadiel begs Charlotte to help him with an important plan; Maze remains devoted to a task from which Pierce asked her to back away.

4052886.title: All Hands on Decker
4052886.description: When Chloe takes some time off, Lucifer is forced to work with Dan on a murder case involving a dog show. Meanwhile, Charlotte and Maze have differing ideas for Chloe's party and after a wild night, Chloe rethinks a life-changing decision.

4052886.title: Quintessential Deckerstar
4052886.description: When Lucifer and Chloe investigate the death of a woman, they discover that they may be pursuing the wrong suspect. Then, Charlotte risks her safety when she decides to take matters into her own hands, and just as Lucifer makes a huge confession, Chloe gets a tragic phone call that changes everything.

4052886.title: A Devil of My Word
4052886.description: Shocked by someone's death, Chloe, Lucifer and the rest of the team work together to investigate and take down the killer. Then, Lucifer has an epiphany, Maze decides to mend a broken friendship and Chloe finally sees the truth.

4052886.title: Boo Normal
4052886.description: As Lucifer and the team investigate the murder of a child psychiatrist, Ella thinks about a big childhood secret that she's been hiding.

4052886.title: Once Upon a Time
4052886.description: Set in an alternate universe where God changed one little thing, which affects Lucifer, Chloe and the people around them.

4052886.title: Everything's Okay
4052886.description: While investigating a beekeeper's murder with Lucifer, Chloe insists that she's completely fine with his devilish revelation.

4052886.title: Somebody's Been Reading Dante's Inferno
4052886.description: Chloe continues her investigation into Lucifer's true identity while they investigate a murder on a reality TV set.

4052886.title: O, Ye of Little Faith, Father
4052886.description: After an encounter with a priest, Lucifer suspects Chloe of betraying him. Meanwhile, the team investigates the murder of a former gang member.

4052886.title: All About Eve
4052886.description: After Chloe and Lucifer's falling out, they each set out individually to solve a case involving a stolen necklace, which might have a connection to Lucifer's old flame.

4052886.title: Expire Erect
4052886.description: After a collector of classic cars is killed, Lucifer and Chloe search for the culprit - as well as some closure to their relationship.

4052886.title: Orgy Pants to Work
4052886.description: While Lucifer and Chloe search for a connection between a murdered auditor and a nudist colony, Amenadiel plays host to an unexpected visitor.

4052886.title: Devil Is as Devil Does
4052886.description: Eve takes a more active role in her main man's professional life. Meanwhile, Lucifer gets back to basics and Amenadiel fights for his family.

4052886.title: Super Bad Boyfriend
4052886.description: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a teacher's murder. Meanwhile, Lucifer goes to extremes to convince Eve to dump him, and Amenadiel mentors a teen.

4052886.title: Save Lucifer
4052886.description: Lucifer's so-called epiphany has Chloe worried, but it's his physical transformation that's really freaking her out. Also, Maze gives Eve a pep talk.

4052886.title: Who's da New King of Hell?
4052886.description: With murderous demons on the loose in Los Angeles, it's up to Lucifer to reign in the chaos and protect the ones he most cares about.

4118466.title: Vertical Mobility
4118466.description: In 2074, where corporations govern all, one man must risk exposing his true identity to find his lost love.

4118466.title: Downsizing
4118466.description: Ben scrambles to deflect suspicion after the Spiga data breach; Laura offers to help when her mother's policies evict an innocent family; Theo is forced into an important cage fight.

4118466.title: Human Resources
4118466.description: An executive from a rival company covertly offers to divulge valuable secrets, prompting Ben, Elizabeth, and Julian to plan a defection. Meanwhile, Laura responds to a domestic betrayal; and in the past, Aaron and Elena meet again.

4118466.title: Cost Containment
4118466.description: The Larsons and Elizabeth don't see eye to eye when it comes to certain life choices; Theo defies an order to cripple a basketball prodigy; Roger enlists help uncovering Ben's secrets; and a daring heist is planned by Aaron and Theo.

4118466.title: Profit and Loss
4118466.description: Ben improvises to keep Roger from discovering the truth about Elena; at the same time, he faces pressure from Elizabeth to complete a vital project. Meanwhile, Laura takes her therapy to the next level; and Julian offers assistance to a friend in need.

4118466.title: Sweating the Assets
4118466.description: Laura, who's on a mission of mercy, relives the painful events of eight years ago that forever changed her life and her relationships with Elizabeth and Julian. Meanwhile, a sudden event causes Ben and Theo to rethink their next move.

4118466.title: Executables
4118466.description: Ben races to finish the Everclear device and help Spiga question an enemy agent; Laura brokers to save a girl's sight; Theo's skills are tested against a well-conditioned opponent from uptown.

4118466.title: Operational Realignment
4118466.description: After his strategy misfires, Ben's backup plan risks his life and Elena's rescue; Laura bypasses company policy to save a cardiac patient; Julian accepts Ben's help to investigate a murder.

4118466.title: Burning Platform
4118466.description: Ben's ongoing investigation leads to a shock; Laura's child patient reveals some sobering facts; and Elizabeth and Julian put their bold plan against Inazagi in motion. A thief is discovered; a killer is hunted down; Elizabeth and Laura deal with the fate of the clinic; and Theo makes his way inside the wall.

4118466.title: Golden Parachute
4118466.description: Ben's mission reaches a critical juncture; Laura finds the thief; Theo ventures inside the wall; Elizabeth and Laura reckon with the fate of the clinic; Julian tracks a killer.

4122068.title: Episode #1.1
4122068.description: Laura Hawkins begins to suspect there's something unusual about their family 'Synth' Anita.

4122068.title: Episode #1.2
4122068.description: Niska stages a brutal escape from the brothel; Leo's secret is revealed; George is horrified to be given a new Synth.

4122068.title: Episode #1.3
4122068.description: Anita saves Toby's life; George tries to break free; Pete is angry at the brothel-murder cover-up.

4122068.title: Episode #1.4
4122068.description: Laura insists the family take Anita for testing; Leo gets one step closer to finding Mia; Niska gets revenge.

4122068.title: Episode #1.5
4122068.description: Killer Synth is the breaking news story, and public panic is growing; Joe's secret threatens to destroy the family.

4122068.title: Episode #1.6
4122068.description: With Joe in exile and the kids tired of their parents' lies, Laura decides it's time to tell the truth.

4122068.title: Episode #1.7
4122068.description: Karen sets out to George's house to find Niska; Pete is determined to find out who Karen is.

4122068.title: Episode #1.8
4122068.description: With the Synths in captivity, the devastated Hawkins realise how much Mia means to them.

4122068.title: Episode #2.1
4122068.description: Niska is living as a fugitive in Berlin, while the other Synths are laying low in the UK.

4122068.title: Episode #2.2
4122068.description: Karen and Pete learn about a special Synth being sold on the black market; Mia risks exposing her secret to help Ed.

4122068.title: Episode #2.3
4122068.description: Athena arrives in the UK; Niska's consciousness assessments begin.

4122068.title: Episode #2.4
4122068.description: Mia and Ed's relationship is threatened; Things looks bleak for Niska when Laura calls a surprise witness.

4122068.title: Episode #2.5
4122068.description: Mia is forced to take drastic action; Hester and Leo locate the silo; Pete locates the valuable stolen Seraph.

4122068.title: Episode #2.6
4122068.description: Athena challenges Milo over his ethics, and is shocked whine he reveals his plan; Max starts a new community of synths.

4122068.title: Episode #2.7
4122068.description: Mattie asks Max to help save Leo from Hester's influence; Toby receives a disturbing message.

4122068.title: Episode #2.8
4122068.description: Hester seeks revenge on Leo; Karen takes matters in her own hands; Joe makes a shocking confession to Laura.

4122068.title: Episode #3.1
4122068.description: 1 year after the dawning of synth consciousness, Leo is still in a coma leaving Max, Mia and Flash to broker an uneasy peace with the fearful human world. Laura's fight for synth rights receives an unexpected boost.

4122068.title: Episode #3.2
4122068.description: A police raid on the Railyard leaves Max dealing with the fall-out from his life-or-death decision. The situation worsens when Agnes begins an anti-human campaign. Laura discovers an operation that could threaten synth survival.

4122068.title: Episode #3.3
4122068.description: Laura struggles to uncover the truth about Operation Basswood; Mattie and Leo confront their feelings for each other.

4122068.title: Episode #3.4
4122068.description: Laura leads a tense visit of the Dryden Commission to the Railyard, but Agnes's anger may threaten success. Mia confronts her past when she meets Ed. A night out turns to tragedy.

4122068.title: Episode #3.5
4122068.description: Truths are revealed and dangerous plans are put into action at the Railyard.

4122068.title: Episode #3.6
4122068.description: Laura and Leo discover shocking and painful truths; Niska continues on her mysterious journey.

4122068.title: Episode #3.7
4122068.description: Laura reels from her heartbreaking decision; Niska's journey takes an unexpected turn.

4122068.title: Episode #3.8
4122068.description: Humans and Synths go head-to-head; Laura, Niska and Mattie face major decisions.

4146128.title: The Overlords
4146128.description: An alien presence arrives on Earth with the intention to end all suffering and guide humanity into a utopia. But when the aliens refuse to reveal their appearance, some wonder if this dream is instead a nightmare.

4146128.title: The Deceivers
4146128.description: Now living in a golden age of peace, some humans begin to notice changes in their children that lead them to question the aliens' motivations.

4146128.title: The Children
4146128.description: A new era begins for the entire world as the children from all nations start to display supernatural abilities, but the older generations worry about the repercussions of this development in regards to the future of humanity.

4158110.title: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
4158110.description: A notorious hacker takes an interest in cyber security engineer and vigilante styled computer hacker Elliot, while an evil corporation is hacked.

4158110.title: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
4158110.description: Elliot is hesitant about fsociety; Elliot is offered a new job; Elliot worries about Shayla's association with Fernando Vera; Ollie is given a CD outside of Allsafe; Mr. Robot makes Elliot talk about his father.

4158110.title: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
4158110.description: Elliot tries to live a bug-free life, but is quickly drawn back in; Tyrell takes matters into his own hands when the CTO position becomes available; Ollie gets blackmailed; Gideon starts getting suspicious of the infected server.

4158110.title: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
4158110.description: While dealing with his withdrawal, Elliot suffers a series of hallucinations about his life, while Shayla helps Angela take an unexpected trip.

4158110.title: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
4158110.description: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America, while Angela makes an important decision.

4158110.title: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
4158110.description: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's "game" gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

4158110.title: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
4158110.description: Elliot misses Shayla. Angela makes a deal with Colby. Sharon Knowles has an encounter with Tyrell.

4158110.title: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
4158110.description: Allsafe is hacked and Elliot is meeting White Rose. Tyrell is interrogated by the police and Elliot remembers who he really is.

4158110.title: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
4158110.description: Elliot has to face the challenges of his past, and become accustomed to his new found family.

4158110.title: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
4158110.description: Another huge discovery for Elliot surrounding his family and fsociety, Tyrell's world starts to close around him and Angela has a rather unexpected visitor.

4158110.title: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt1.tc
4158110.description: Elliot keeps seeing his psychologist, Krista. The new character Susan Jacobs is having trouble with technology. Gideon pays a visit to Elliot complaining he's been targeted for a crime Elliot might have committed. Fsociety are back in action, asking E Corp for 5.9 million dollars in 24 hours.

4158110.title: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt2.tc
4158110.description: Five/nine has changed the world; Elliot is in seclusion; Angela finds happiness at Evil Corp.; fsociety delivers a malicious payload.

4158110.title: eps2.1_k3rnel-pan1c.ksd
4158110.description: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot; Angela gets a glimpse behind the curtain at E Corp; and fsociety stirs up trouble.

4158110.title: eps2.2_init_1.asec
4158110.description: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot; Angela gets a glimpse behind the curtain at E Corp; and fsociety stirs up trouble.

4158110.title: eps2.3_logic-b0mb.hc
4158110.description: Elliot can't quit the game; Dom and the FBI head to China to investigate 5/9; Joanna is haunted; and Darlene calls on Angela for help.

4158110.title: eps2.4_m4ster-s1ave.aes
4158110.description: Mr. Robot has an original way to show Elliot that he can be useful. Darlene and Angela take a shot at their plan.

4158110.title: eps2.5_h4ndshake.sme
4158110.description: Mr. Robot and Elliot try to keep the peace. Fsociety releases a video honoring Uncle Sam. Darlene acts upon an old desire.

4158110.title: eps2.6_succ3ss0r.p12
4158110.description: The latest fsociety leak has Dom trying her best to spin the case in the FBI's favor; Angela defends her career choices; Darlene makes it known that her circle of trust is shrinking.

4158110.title: eps2.7_init_5.fve
4158110.description: Angela wants more from Evil Corp; Dark Army's allegiance is in question; Elliot and Darlene seek answers.

4158110.title: eps2.8_h1dden-pr0cess.axx
4158110.description: Elliot wonders if Mr. Robot has been lying to him; Darlene attempts to do the right thing; Dom and the FBI get closer.

4158110.title: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt1.p7z
4158110.description: Angela makes an acquaintance; Dom begins seeing the scope of things; an old friend reveals everything to Elliot.

4158110.title: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt2.p7z
4158110.description: Angela makes an unexpected acquaintance; Darlene realizes she's in deep; and an old friend reveals all to Elliot.

4158110.title: eps3.0_power-saver-mode.h
4158110.description: Elliot realizes his mission, and needs help from Angela; Darlene worries about them coming out clean.

4158110.title: eps3.1_undo.gz
4158110.description: Elliot becomes encouraged trying to undo five/nine; Darlene gets stuck between a rock and a hard place; Mr. Robot sparks a panic.

4158110.title: eps3.2_legacy.so
4158110.description: The former interim CTO of E Corp returns.

4158110.title: eps3.3_m3tadata.par2
4158110.description: Dom has a close call; Elliot chases himself with Darlene on the lookout.

4158110.title: eps3.4_runtime-err0r.r00
4158110.description: Elliot tries to piece everything together and stop Stage 2 as chaos quickly unfolds at E Corp; Angela tries to do a job intended for Elliot while avoiding imminent threats; Darlene brings Elliot up to speed and tells him the truth.

4158110.title: eps3.5_kill-pr0cess.inc
4158110.description: Elliot faces off with Mr. Robot; Dom gets tired of the red tape; Tyrell has a new plan.

4158110.title: eps3.6_fredrick+tanya.chk
4158110.description: Mr. Robot wants answers; the FBI closes in; Angela hits the rewind button.

4158110.title: eps3.7_dont-delete-me.ko
4158110.description: Elliot nearly loses all hope after the recent tragedy, but ends up having to take Trenton's brother to the movies; Elliot wants to pay his respects to Trenton and Mobley; Elliot receives an important email.

4158110.title: eps3.8_stage3.torrent
4158110.description: Elliot trolls a former ally; Mr Robot leaves cryptic text; Tyrell gets new commands.

4158110.title: shutdown -r
4158110.description: Elliot tries to save Darlene, but things don't go as planned; Mr Robot must decide whether to step up or step back.

4158110.title: 401 Unauthorized
4158110.description: During the Christmas season, Elliot and Mr. Robot make their return; Darlene deals with real trouble; Tyrell is bored; Dom becomes paranoid.

4158110.title: 402 Payment Required
4158110.description: Elliot and Darlene reconnect; Price gives Elliot some background info and plays his hand; Dom completes the interview, but her lack of confidence raises suspicion with Janice; Some unexpected threats become known to Elliot and Mr. Robot.

4158110.title: 403 Forbidden
4158110.description: Elliot's newest hack helps him share his emotions; Whiterose puts the pieces in motion; Elliot and Darlene have a disagreement; Vera plans his next move; In flashbacks, some key moments in Whiterose's life are revealed.

4158110.title: 404 Not Found
4158110.description: Tyrell, Elliot, and Mr. Robot go on a perilous journey through the woods; Darlene deals with her feelings when she has to take a drunk Santa home; Dom is aroused and has a nightmare.

4158110.title: 405 Method Not Allowed
4158110.description: Dom has an unpleasant Christmas. Darlene and Elliot perform a daring infiltration. Krista prepares for a date.

4158110.title: 406 Not Acceptable
4158110.description: Elliot blackmails Olivia to make an important phone call; Dom struggles when she's ordered to do something distressing; Vera gets information out of Krista; Whiterose wants Elliot brought directly to her.

4158110.title: 407 Proxy Authentication Required
4158110.description: Vera holds Krista hostage as he tries to force Elliot into joining him by understanding Mr. Robot. Elliot realizes a shocking truth.

4158110.title: 408 Request Timeout
4158110.description: Janice tries to get Elliot's location from Dom and Darlene. Elliot goes to the Queens Museum.

4158110.title: 409 Conflict
4158110.description: Mr. Robot and Darlene attempt to take down the Deus group as Elliot remains unstable; Price faces off with Whiterose; Whiterose tries to manipulate Elliot; Mr. Robot struggles to figure out how to help Elliot find himself.

4158110.title: 410 Gone
4158110.description: Darlene and Dom hit the road. Elliot is not done yet.

4158110.title: eXit
4158110.description: Enough is enough. Elliot goes to the Washington Township Power Plant.

4158110.title: whoami
4158110.description: Elliot wakes up in an abandoned lot following the explosion at the Washington Township plant, which is no longer there.

4158110.title: Hello, Elliot
4158110.description: Elliot gets to Coney Island, and the delusion begins to slip. Mr. Robot reveals the truth.

4159076.title: Pilot - Part 1
4159076.description: Six strangers awake amnesic on a marooned and damaged spacecraft. Quickly however they discover their personal talents and from there struggle to understand who they are and what has happened to them.

4159076.title: Pilot - Part 2
4159076.description: The motley crew discover a small mining colony on a planet that happens to be the target of big corporations. Discovering their identities brings each one to question who they really are.

4159076.title: Episode #1.3
4159076.description: While en route to the nearest space station, the ship suffers another mysterious malfunction -- their FTL fails in the middle of a gamma radiation storm. This makes the crew think a saboteur may be aboard.

4159076.title: Episode #1.4
4159076.description: The lookalike for One goes on the attack, only to reveal a disturbing truth about his doppelganger.

4159076.title: Episode #1.5
4159076.description: While recovering a damaged ship, some of its dead crew are discovered. They were slaughtered by an animalistic attack, but what happened to the attacker?

4159076.title: Episode #1.6
4159076.description: 5 builds a mind probe that reveals some of her hidden memories. She experiences some of 4's past and discovers why she's on the ship.

4159076.title: Episode #1.7
4159076.description: The crew gains access to the secret room, and discovers an android and an ill woman who reveals a connection to Three.

4159076.title: Episode #1.8
4159076.description: The crew stops at a space station to refuel and rest, but Six has a different agenda - revenge.

4159076.title: Episode #1.9
4159076.description: 4 travels to talk with his brother about their father's murder, but it's a trap.

4159076.title: Episode #1.10
4159076.description: Forced to team up with another team of mercenaries the crew are assigned to steal an unknown package from a rival corporation.

4159076.title: Episode #1.11
4159076.description: Double crossed by the mercenaries the crew must save themselves and retake the ship before they are turned over to the Galactic Authorities.

4159076.title: Episode #1.12
4159076.description: The team's handler sends the crew on another mission to retrieve a scientist being held against his will.

4159076.title: Episode #1.13
4159076.description: Crew members are targeted and paranoia mounts as they search for the perpetrator; the person responsible for the mind-wipe makes a move.

4159076.title: Welcome to Your New Home
4159076.description: The crew awakens to find themselves prisoners on the Hyperion-8 Maximum Security Galactic Detention Facility.

4159076.title: Kill Them All
4159076.description: Imprisoned in Hyperion-8, the crew must negotiate attempted assassinations, extraditions, and behind-the-scenes machinations as they plot their escape.

4159076.title: I've Seen the Other Side of You
4159076.description: A computer glitch makes the crew turn against one another.

4159076.title: We Were Family
4159076.description: Three reconnects with his former crew; the Android finds herself in unique company.

4159076.title: We Voted Not to Space You
4159076.description: The Android goes undercover to help the crew track a dangerous, yet familiar, foe.

4159076.title: We Should Have Seen This Coming
4159076.description: Nyx's plan to make some money has an ulterior motive.

4159076.title: She's One of Them Now
4159076.description: The crew goes after Alicia Reynaud looking for answers.

4159076.title: Stuff to Steal, People to Kill
4159076.description: A Blink Drive test goes awry, propelling the Raza to a parallel reality.

4159076.title: Going Out Fighting
4159076.description: The crew takes a dangerous mission inside Dwarf Star Technologies in a desperate bid to save their ailing leader.

4159076.title: Take the Shot
4159076.description: An uploaded computer virus from an unknown source wreaks havoc with the crew, the Android and the ships main computer. The crews pasts are used against them and the Android is tested.

4159076.title: Wish I'd Spaced You When I Had the Chance
4159076.description: Inspector Kierken chases the crew spotted by GA while shopping on a planetary station. Three and Five are cut off and depend on each other to survive. Six is almost back to full trust and suggests an interesting perspective for the crew.

4159076.title: Sometimes in Life You Don't Get to Choose
4159076.description: Sometimes In Life You Don't Get to Choose

4159076.title: But First, We Save the Galaxy
4159076.description: The crew of the Raza works to prevent the destruction of a space station and prevent an all out corporate war.

4159076.title: Being Better Is So Much Harder
4159076.description: The survivors of the EOS 7 bombing fight to stay alive and find the rest of their crew.

4159076.title: It Doesn't Have to Be Like This
4159076.description: Ryo Ishido is now the emperor of Zairon. Who makes an enemy of his former allies.

4159076.title: Welcome to the Revolution
4159076.description: After the crew receives a distress call from a former associate, they find themselves having to broker a peace deal during the midst of an uprising.

4159076.title: All the Time in the World
4159076.description: Unbeknownst to the rest of the crew, THREE has been trapped in a time loop, reliving the same day over and over.

4159076.title: Give It Up, Princess
4159076.description: The crew of the Raza track a data file across the galaxy in an attempt to strike a blow against Ferrous, and save the life of a young woman.

4159076.title: One Last Card to Play
4159076.description: Familiar faces from the past return, causing havoc and forcing our crew to scramble to save their already damaged reputations.

4159076.title: Wish I Could Believe You
4159076.description: An injured crew member is haunted by the life they left behind, unaware of the dangers lurking in the present.

4159076.title: Hot Chocolate
4159076.description: While providing safe transport for some allies, The Raza comes under attack from within.

4159076.title: Isn't That a Paradox?
4159076.description: The Blink Drive self activates and sends the crew of the Raza 600 years back in time to the friendly 21st century suburbia. They must try to fit in while searching for answers. Only the local kids become suspicious.

4159076.title: Built, Not Born
4159076.description: While helping the Android's friend Victor, the crew find answers about Two's past.

4159076.title: The Dwarf Star Conspiracy
4159076.description: One of the Android's newly discovered memories leads the crew to a suspicious Dwarf Star facility on Nova 17.

4159076.title: My Final Gift to You
4159076.description: Ryo invites his former crew to Zairon in a final attempt to secure the Blink Drive and his victory over Pyr.

4159076.title: Nowhere to Go
4159076.description: The Raza's crew discover the secret shipyard and attempt to unite Ferrous's enemies before the ships come online.

4378456.title: A Suitable Donor
4378456.description: After Jimmy Pritchard is killed in a robbery at his son's home, Pritchard is brought back to life in the body of a younger man by a billionaire and a bioengineer.

4378456.title: One More Notch
4378456.description: Due to the power surge that Mary and Otto caused in bringing Pritchard back to life, two notorious murderers escape from prison. Still determined that this is his city to protect, Pritchard goes on the hunt for them, and Mary - who believes she's partially responsible for the fugitives' escape - offers assistance. Meanwhile, in order to win Duval's trust, Pritchard tells him they're half-brothers.

4378456.title: From Darkness, the Sun
4378456.description: Pritchard tries to prove to Duval that he was a better police officer and man than his son ever knew. Meanwhile, he and Duval go up against a deadly psycho and another father-son duo that is out to cause trouble.

4378456.title: Admissions
4378456.description: A case from the past comes back into play as Pritchard and Duval investigate a series of murders involving young prodigies. As the investigation unravels, Duval comes to terms with the possibility that Pritchard could be his father reincarnated.

4378456.title: Scratch That Glitch
4378456.description: Mary's life is in danger when a dead pool predicts her death for the same day as an important Lookinglass product launch. Meanwhile, when Pritchard is needed the most, he fails to show up and winds up in the hospital after a near fatal brawl. After Pritchard's hospitalization, Otto begins to find glitches in Pritchard's code that might not only drastically change Pritchard, but Mary, as well.

4378456.title: Palimpsest
4378456.description: A killer that mangles his victims beyond recognition is on the loose. Meanwhile, Otto becomes jealous of the growing bond between Pritchard and his sister and considers finding another donor.

4378456.title: That Time in the Car
4378456.description: Duval's sister, is dating Wally, a parole officer, whom she's known since high school. Pritchard never liked him and must hide his distrust. However, he and Duval discover Wally involved in a possible prison break.

4378456.title: May Old Acquaintance Be Forgot
4378456.description: Pritchard's past comes back to haunt him. 20 years ago, Pritchard covered up a murder committed by a drug lord's girlfriend, who happened to be his confidential informant at the time. Instead of staying on the right side of the law after Pritchard helped her elude the crime. 20 years later she has turned into a major drug lord.

4378456.title: When You Have to Go There, They Have to Take You In
4378456.description: Prichard and Duval join forces to track down a serial killer, and Alexa and Connor (guest star Adan Canto) try to procure key technology from Lookinglass.

4378456.title: Geworfenheit
4378456.description: Pritchard and Duval continue to investigate who Albert Lin really is, who created him and try to uncover how he is involved in a string of murders. The investigation drives a wedge between Mary and Otto, and Otto must choose if he will betray Mary and undo everything they have built.

4378456.title: Gelassenheit
4378456.description: Pritchard and Duval race against the clock to save Gracie from Connor and Otto's life-threatening experiment. But time is quickly running out for Pritchard, as well, since there is no tank in which he can regenerate. Meanwhile, Mary, with the help of Alexa, does everything she can to try and unlock the code to save Pritchard's life before it's too late, and Otto wrestles with his conscience and the decisions he's made that have changed lives forever.

4383082.title: Magic Bullets
4383082.description: The search for a "cure" for cancer is the greatest epic in the history of science, spanning centuries and continents. This episode follows that centuries-long search, but centers on the story of Sidney Farber, who, defying conventional wisdom in the late 1940s, introduces the modern era of chemotherapy, eventually galvanizing a "war on cancer." Interwoven with Farber's narrative is the contemporary story of a 14-month-old diagnosed with T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia. The film follows her as she and her parents struggle with the many hardships and decisions ...

4383082.title: Ep Two: The Blind Men and the Elephant
4383082.description: This episode picks up the story in the wake of the declaration of a "war on cancer" by Richard Nixon in 1971 and the search for a cure. In the lab, rapid progress is made in understanding the essential nature of the cancer cell, leading to the revolutionary discovery of the genetic basis of cancer, but few new therapies become available. Not until the late 1990s do advances in research begin to translate into more precise targeted therapies with breakthrough drugs. Following the history during these fraught decades, the film intertwines the contemporary story of an ...

4383082.title: Finding an Achilles Heel
4383082.description: This episode starts at a moment of optimism: Scientists believe they have cracked the mystery of the malignant cell, and the first targeted therapies have been developed. But very quickly cancer reveals new layers of complexity and a formidable array of defenses. Many call for a new focus on prevention and early detection as the most promising fronts in the war on cancer. By the second decade of the 2000s, the bewildering complexity of the cancer cell yields to a more ordered picture, revealing new vulnerabilities and avenues of attack. Perhaps most exciting is the ...

4532368.title: Pilot, Part 1
4532368.description: Time-traveling rogue, Rip Hunter, has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.

4532368.title: Pilot, Part 2
4532368.description: The team meet Vandal Savage, who senses the presence of Hawkman and Hawkgirl. A fight follows in which Ray loses a piece of his costume that threatens to change the future. Then the team plan to correct that.

4532368.title: Blood Ties
4532368.description: In an effort to weaken Savage by going after his financial assets, Rip and Sara infiltrate his bank. Meanwhile, Snart and Rory take the jump ship back to Central City for a job.

4532368.title: White Knights
4532368.description: Dr. Stein sneaks into a lab and finds out that Savage is trying to create Firestorm.

4532368.title: Fail-Safe
4532368.description: After some of the Legends are captured and thrown into a Russian gulag during the height of the Cold War of 1986, Snart leads the team in an elaborate Prison Break to free their comrades. However, Rip gives Sara a secret side mission that could prove not only to be a liability, but fatal to the team.

4532368.title: Star City 2046
4532368.description: A malfunction sends the Waverider to 2046 Star City where the team faces a future in which they fail to stop Savage and return home.

4532368.title: Marooned
4532368.description: When there's no trace of Savage, Rip spends time dwelling on the past and Rory continues to be a liability to the team. The crew receive a distress call from another Time Master and seek it out, only to find that the ship was commandeered by time pirates. Snart has an important decision to make.

4532368.title: Night of the Hawk
4532368.description: The team tracks Savage to a small town in Oregon in the 1950s where they suspect he's involved in a recent string of murders.

4532368.title: Left Behind
4532368.description: Ray, Sara and Kendra are stranded in the '50s when the Waverider takes off without them.

4532368.title: Progeny
4532368.description: The team is divided over killing a 14-year-old boy who will grow to be a powerful ally for Savage.

4532368.title: The Magnificent Eight
4532368.description: The Legends travel back to the Old Wild West and gain the aid of a true legend - a morally ambiguous gunslinger with a penchant for danger named Jonah Hex.

4532368.title: Last Refuge
4532368.description: A deadly assassin called the Pilgrim wants to wipe the Legends from the timeline by killing the heroes' younger selves before they become powerful.

4532368.title: Leviathan
4532368.description: Rip takes the team to London in the year 2166, three days before his family is killed. He believes this to be their final opportunity to take out Savage who is, unfortunately, at the height of his power. However, the team discovers two key elements to defeating him - Savage's daughter and the means to kill Savage once and for all.

4532368.title: River of Time
4532368.description: After the team successfully captures Vandal Savage, his presence causes dissension amongst them - as they decide whether he should live or die.

4532368.title: Destiny
4532368.description: Being in the vicinity of the Time Masters leaves Rip and Rory incredibly disturbed for very different reasons. Meanwhile, Sara takes over the Waverider, Kendra is reunited with Carter and Snart decides he might be a hero after all.

4532368.title: Legendary
4532368.description: After all their sacrifices, Rip returns the team to Central City a few months after they left, so they can decide for themselves if they’re willing to risk everything in the finale.

4532368.title: Out of Time
4532368.description: When a new threat emerges, Dr. Nate Heywood seeks out Oliver Queen to help find the scattered Legends; once reunited, they go to 1942, to keep Albert Einstein from being kidnapped before the Nazis destroy New York City with a nuclear bomb.

4532368.title: The Justice Society of America
4532368.description: The Legends discover a time aberration that threatens the Justice Society of America, who are on a mission to intercept and seize a mysterious package in Nazi-occupied Paris.

4532368.title: Shogun
4532368.description: Nate is shocked to learn he has powers, but then accidentally lands himself and Ray in Feudal Japan.

4532368.title: Abominations
4532368.description: The Legends find themselves fighting for survival against Confederate zombies in the Civil War.

4532368.title: Compromised
4532368.description: The Legends trace a time quake to the White House during Ronald Reagan's presidency and discover that Damien Darhk is a Senior Adviser.

4532368.title: Outlaw Country
4532368.description: The Legends find Jonah Hex in trouble with his arch-nemesis Quentin Turnbull when they arrive in the Old West.

4532368.title: Invasion!
4532368.description: The Legends work with The Flash, Supergirl and Green Arrow to kill the invaders; while working out how to defeat the Dominators, Stein gets distracted by the aberration he created in 1987.

4532368.title: The Chicago Way
4532368.description: The Legends track a Time Aberration to 1927 Chicago and realize they've been set up by Eobard Thawne, Damien Dahrk and the newest member of the Legion of Doom - Malcolm Merlyn.

4532368.title: Raiders of the Lost Art
4532368.description: Damien Dahrk and Malcolm Merlyn create a big aberration as they attempt to capture Rip in 1967.

4532368.title: The Legion of Doom
4532368.description: The Legends must find the Spear of Destiny before they can rescue Rip, while Malcolm and Damien realize that Thawne is pitting them against each other.

4532368.title: Turncoat
4532368.description: The Legends travel to the winter of 1776 to protect George Washington during the American Revolution, but Sara is forced to send out Nate and Amaya when things don't go as planned.

4532368.title: Camelot/3000
4532368.description: The Legends continue their quest to find the Spear of Destiny before the Legion of Doom get their hands on the pieces. Their first stop is the future, after which they travel to Camelot and find Stargirl guarding a piece of the Spear.

4532368.title: Land of the Lost
4532368.description: The Legends are left seventy million years in the past when Rip causes the Waverider to crash after his capture.

4532368.title: Moonshot
4532368.description: The Legends learn where the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny is hidden when they track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970.

4532368.title: Fellowship of the Spear
4532368.description: The Legends land in France during World War I and enlist the aid of J.R.R. Tolkien to retrieve the last pieces of the Spear of Destiny from the Legion of Doom.

4532368.title: Doomworld
4532368.description: The Legion of Doom rewrites history after obtaining the Spear of Destiny, potentially changing the Legends forever.

4532368.title: Aruba
4532368.description: When a massive timequake rocks the ship while the legends are preparing for their next destination, they must break a cardinal rule of time travel.

4532368.title: Aruba-Con
4532368.description: When the Time Bureau relieves the Legends of duty, they must steal back the Waverider when Julius Caesar is spotted in Aruba.

4532368.title: Freakshow
4532368.description: The Legends attempt to fix the anachronism in 1870 that happens to be P.T. Barnum's circus.

4532368.title: Zari
4532368.description: The Legends try to protect an outlaw named Zari in order to capture a rogue time traveler.

4532368.title: Phone Home
4532368.description: The Legends go back to 1988 to save Ray when they realize he'll die because of their breaking time.

4532368.title: Return of the Mack
4532368.description: The Legends run into Rip in 1897 London where they attempt to hunt down a time-traveling vampire.

4532368.title: Helen Hunt
4532368.description: The Legends track down an anachronism in 1930s Hollywood, where Helen of Troy has started a war between two film studios.

4532368.title: Welcome to the Jungle
4532368.description: The team trace a new Anachronism to the jungles of Vietnam. Rory and Nate bump into someone from Rory's past.

4532368.title: Crisis on Earth-X, Part 4
4532368.description: The gang comes together for Barry and Iris's wedding, but the ceremony is crashed by villains from Earth-X.

4532368.title: Beebo the God of War
4532368.description: The Legends investigate an Anachronism in a Viking settlement in the New World and realize the Norsemen are worshiping an artifact as their god.

4532368.title: Daddy Darhkest
4532368.description: John Constantine pays the Legends a visit; they agree to accompany him to a present-day psychiatric hospital and are surprised to discover who Constantine is trying to help; Amaya and Nate once again come face-to-face with Kuasa.

4532368.title: Here I Go Again
4532368.description: Zari finds her place on the team when she gets caught in a time loop that results in the Waverider blowing up over and over again.

4532368.title: The Curse of the Earth Totem
4532368.description: While Sara takes some private time, the Legends follow a lead on the whereabouts of the Earth Totem and find themselves in 1717 on the hunt for Blackbeard's treasure.

4532368.title: No Country for Old Dads
4532368.description: After being taken hostage by the Dahrks, Ray teams with Nora to fix the Fire totem in 1960's East Germany and come face-to-face with a younger and deadlier version of Damien.

4532368.title: Amazing Grace
4532368.description: The Legends embark on a mission to save music when they learn that a tragedy destroyed Memphis in 1954.

4532368.title: Necromancing the Stone
4532368.description: When Mallus's power over Sara resurfaces, she unwittingly becomes the bearer of one of the Totems. And Rory must conquer his dark side to save the crew.

4532368.title: I, Ava
4532368.description: Sara and Ray set out to find Ava when she disappears and Time Bureau agent Gary reveals a disturbing truth about her.

4532368.title: Guest Starring John Noble
4532368.description: The Legends must fix two anachronisms at the same time to keep Mallus at bay and form an uneasy alliance with one of their enemies.

4532368.title: The Good, the Bad and the Cuddly
4532368.description: Rip is forced to improvise when the Legends' plan to vanquish Mallus with the totems doesn't work.

4532368.title: The Virgin Gary
4532368.description: After the Legends defeated Mallus and wiped the final anachronism from time they find themselves in unfamiliar territory with the Time Bureau. All that changes when Constantine informs Sara of a new magical threat that leads the team to Woodstock. Constantine thinks he knows how to defeat the new threat but will need the help of the team and their special klepto talents to help with his spell. Meanwhile, Nate and Rory go on an adventure leaving Nate facing someone from his past.

4532368.title: Witch Hunt
4532368.description: The Legends find themselves headed to the Salem witch trials, where they learn that a magical creature in town is causing problems they hadn’t expected.

4532368.title: Dancing Queen
4532368.description: When the Legends discover a fugitive is hiding in 1970's London, they realize he is part of a gang that is targeting the British Monarchy. Trying to stop the gang, they realize someone from the Legends must infiltrate them. Surprising everyone, Ray is the one to gain their trust after he is put through a series of tests with help from Sara and Rory. Meanwhile, Gary shows Nate the ropes at the Time Bureau, but it turns out to be anything other than an ordinary day at the office.

4532368.title: Wet Hot American Bummer
4532368.description: When the Legends discover that kids at a summer camp have disappeared, Sara, Ava, Ray and Constantine find themselves as the new camp counselors.

4532368.title: Tagumo Attacks!!!
4532368.description: A new fugitive is loose in 1951 Tokyo; as Constantine struggles to recover, Ray must look outside the team for help; Ava joins Nate and his family for an unconventional Thanksgiving dinner.

4532368.title: Tender Is the Nate
4532368.description: Hank Heywood confronts Ava about the spending habits of the Legends; Mona tries to make a good impression with Ava, but her eagerness gets her and Ava stuck in a cell together.

4532368.title: Hell No, Dolly!
4532368.description: Sara tries to help Rory and Ava to get along, while a new magical creature attacks the Legends. Meanwhile, Constantine is forced to confront his tragic past and Mona has a crush on someone she works with.

4532368.title: Legends of To-Meow-Meow
4532368.description: After Constantine breaks the cardinal rule, he, Charlie and Zari try to deal with the ramifications without telling anyone else.

4532368.title: Lucha de Apuestas
4532368.description: When the Legends hear that Mona has let a fugitive go, they must head to 1961 Mexico City to clean up her mess. Mona tries to convince the Legends and the Bureau that the people responsible for releasing the fugitive were some mysterious Men in Black and not her. With no evidence to back up her theory, the Legends must decide if they should trust her and go against the Bureau. Meanwhile, Nate and Zari go on a recon mission to find out what Hank might be hiding from everyone.

4532368.title: The Getaway
4532368.description: When Hank commandeers the Waverider in 1973, the Legends find themselves on the run in an RV after kidnapping the President who is only able to tell the truth. With the help of Constantine, they discover the reason that none of them can lie making for an uncomfortable family road trip. Meanwhile, Nate and Zari, with the help of Nora and Gary, work together to find out what Hank is really up to.

4532368.title: Séance and Sensibility
4532368.description: When Mona discovers that her favorite author, Jane Austen, might be at the epicenter of a magical alert, Mona, Sara, Charlie and Zari find themselves in Bath, England, 1802.

4532368.title: The Eggplant, the Witch & the Wardrobe
4532368.description: With darkness on the rise in 2019, the team realizes that a host of problems have risen while they were cleaning up history. Sara saves Ava from a fate worse than death.

4532368.title: Egg MacGuffin
4532368.description: While Ray is worried about Nora, he is suddenly faced with his own problem that forces him to do the unthinkable. Nate and Zari are stuck in an awkward limbo, so Sara devises a plan to send them on an easy mission together. Meanwhile, Charlie and Rory are approached with a lucrative offer that could upend their lives.

4532368.title: Nip/Stuck
4532368.description: When Sara hesitates to make a tough call, Rory steps up creating a wedge in the team. Meanwhile, Ava gives Gary the responsibility of handling the Bureau performance reviews for all the Agents.

4532368.title: Terms of Service
4532368.description: Sara and Ava concoct a bold plan to take back the Time Bureau; Zari and Charlie must work together to discover what Neron is planning; Constantine is given a tough choice on who to save from Hell.

4532368.title: Hey, World!
4532368.description: Sara and Ava concoct a bold plan to take back the Time Bureau; Zari and Charlie must work together to discover what Neron is planning; Constantine is given a tough choice on who to save from Hell.

4532368.title: Crisis on Infinite Earths: Part Five
4532368.description: Worlds lived, worlds died. Nothing will ever be the same.

4532368.title: Meet the Legends
4532368.description: After saving the world, the Legends become famous and invite a documentary film crew aboard the Waverider. But trouble arises when Rasputin returns from Hell in the season premiere.

4532368.title: Miss Me, Kiss Me, Love Me
4532368.description: When a new blip lands the Legends in 1947 Los Angeles, it puts them on the trail of Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel; Sara, Ray and Constantine devise a plan to capture him; Ava struggles with being on the sidelines with Rory.

4532368.title: Slay Anything
4532368.description: When the Legends discover a new Encore, Sara, Rory and Ava end up crashing a high school reunion to attempt to stop a serial killer from finishing unfinished business. The Legends devise a plan to send Nate, Ray, Nora, Behrad and their hostage Zari, back in time to try and intervene in order to try to save everyone including them. Meanwhile, Constantine is annoyed that Charlie has been squatting in his old home, but it might be the blessing in disguise they were not looking for.

4532368.title: A Head of Her Time
4532368.description: When Sara is called away on business, she leaves Ava in charge and Ava tries to impress the team as they try to take on their latest Encore, Marie Antionette. With Zari still on the ship, Behrad convinces the team to bring her along on the mission which they all hope isn't a mistake. Meanwhile, Constantine finally confronts someone from his past with the help of Charlie, which leads him on a journey through his past.

4532368.title: Mortal Khanbat
4532368.description: With Sara away from the Waverider, the Legends find a new Encore with Ava's new invention, the Prognosticator, and must now to defeat Genghis Khan in 1990s Hong Kong; Constantine's life is hanging in the balance.

4532368.title: Mr. Parker's Cul-De-Sac
4532368.description: Ray plans a date night for him and Nora, but all goes awry when an Encore shows up making the team think on their feet and create a lie to keep the Encore at bay. While trying to fool the Encore, Ava learns what Sara was really doing while she was away and confronts her. Charlie and Constantine make a deal to work together, which will benefit both of them. Meanwhile, Rory is upset when he gets negative comments about his book, so Zari helps track down who the critic is, and Rory gets more than he bargained for.

4532368.title: Romeo V. Juliet: Dawn of Justness
4532368.description: The Legends continue their hunt for pieces for the Loom of Fate and find themselves face to face with William Shakespeare; Ray and Nora make another big life decision that leaves the team surprised.

4532368.title: Zari, Not Zari
4532368.description: Sara, Constantine and Charlie find themselves in British Columbia for another piece of the Loom; Zari has been having trouble feeling like herself, so she goes on a meditative journey at the suggestion of Behrad.

4532368.title: The Great British Fake Off
4532368.description: With Sara recuperating from her latest battle, Charlie starts to notice something might not be right with her; Constantine and Zari find themselves trapped in a 1910 boarding house; Ava, Gary and Rory take a trip.

4532368.title: Ship Broken
4532368.description: The Legends deal with a shipboard saboteur as they attempt to use the Loom.

4532368.title: Freaks and Greeks
4532368.description: The team find themselves going back to college and forming a sorority in order to retrieve an ancient artifact; Nate falls under Dion's spell, letting him know of Sara, Astra, Ava and Charlie's plan to get the cup.

4532368.title: I Am Legends
4532368.description: After drinking from the Chalice, the Legends have immortality for 24 hours, which gives them time to get to the Waverider and use the Loom of Fate; they get stuck at Constantine's house during a zombie apocalypse.

4532368.title: The One Where We're Trapped on TV
4532368.description: After Charlie does the one thing that goes against her nature when it comes to her sisters, she tries to protect the Legends by scattering them in different television shows.

4532368.title: Swan Thong
4532368.description: Still controlled by the Fates, the Legends find themselves in 1984-esque world, they soon discover that things aren't as they thought they would be. The Legends must convince the civilians to trust them and stand up for their right to choose, but the Fates don't make it easy by resurrecting the Encores once again.

4977374.title: Out of Thin Air
4977374.description: One of science's great odd couples--British minister Joseph Priestley and French tax administrator Antoine Lavoisier--together discover a fantastic new gas called oxygen, overturning the reigning theory of chemistry and triggering a worldwide search for new elements. Soon caught up in the hunt is science's first great showman, a precocious British chemist named Humphry Davy, who dazzles London audiences with his lectures, introduces them to laughing gas, and turns the battery into a powerful tool in the search for new elements.

4977374.title: Unruly Elements
4977374.description: Over a single weekend in 1869, a young Russian chemistry professor named Dmitri Mendeleev invents the Periodic Table, bringing order to the growing gaggle of elements. But this sense of order is shattered when a Polish graduate student named Marie Sklodowska Curie discovers radioactivity, revealing that elements can change identities - and that atoms must have undiscovered parts inside them.

4977374.title: Into the Atom
4977374.description: Caught up in the race to discover the atom's internal parts - and learn how they fit together - a young British physicist, Harry Moseley, uses newly discovered X-rays to put the Periodic Table in a whole new light. And a young American chemist named Glenn Seaborg creates a new element - plutonium - that changes the world forever, unleashing a force of unimaginable destructive power: the atomic bomb

5057054.title: Pilot
5057054.description: In the series premiere, CIA analyst Jack Ryan uncovers a series of suspicious transactions that take him and his boss James Greer out from behind their desks into the field to hunt down a powerful new threat to the world. Hanin begins to question her husband's affairs after he brings a mysterious outsider into their home.

5057054.title: French Connection
5057054.description: Jack and Greer decode a fresh piece of intel that takes them to Paris and one step closer to the elusive Suleiman. Hanin's husband returns home with a renewed fervor for his secretive mission, leaving her unsure of their family's future.

5057054.title: Black 22
5057054.description: Drone pilot Victor struggles with the immense responsibility attached to his job. Jack and Greer join French Intelligence officers on a mission to track down Suleiman's brother. Hanin is forced to make a dangerous decision for the sake of their children.

5057054.title: The Wolf
5057054.description: As Jack and Cathy grow closer, Jack's double-life is put to the test. A show of force from Suleiman adds to his ranks and brings him one step closer to his next attack.

5057054.title: End of Honor
5057054.description: After the horrific Paris church attack, Jack and Greer discover a deeper strategy behind Suleiman's actions, forcing Jack to suggest an unusual trap for him. Hanin faces new challenges in her quest for freedom.

5057054.title: Sources and Methods
5057054.description: Jack's moral code is tested when he and Greer use a Turkish criminal to help them track down a high-value target who may be able to lead them to Suleiman. Hanin tries to evade her pursuers and keep her daughters safe. Cathy investigates an outbreak of a virulent form of Ebola that may point to something more ominous.

5057054.title: The Boy
5057054.description: Jack and Greer try to convince their superiors to lead a covert ground assault to capture Suleiman. Jack's double life costs him an important relationship.

5057054.title: Inshallah
5057054.description: Jack and Greer fear Suleiman's next attack could be on U.S. soil. They must figure out how to stop him or risk enormous costs.

5057054.title: Cargo
5057054.description: Jack Ryan searches for the truth behind Venezuela's transactions with various World Powers. James Greer, about to get sidelined from his new post in Russia, joins Jack in Venezuela and the two find themselves in the midst of a Venezuelan leader's re-election effort.

5057054.title: Tertia Optio
5057054.description: Jack is granted permission from Senator Chapin to stay in Venezuela. President Reyes denies involvement in the events that are keeping Jack in country. Meanwhile, Jack and Harry team up to follow a lead that could create dissension within the ranks.

5057054.title: Orinoco
5057054.description: The U.S. Special Activities team lands in Venezuela where Jack's intel leads them to a militia guarded compound. Deep in the jungle, Jack's search for answers puts the whole team in danger. President Reyes' opponent, Gloria Bonalde, proves to be a real contender in the upcoming election.

5057054.title: Dressed to Kill
5057054.description: Relieved of duty in Venezuela, Jack follows a new trail to London and seeks the help of MI5, only to discover the man he's after is also after him. Back in Venezuela, Reyes makes Gloria an offer.

5057054.title: Blue Gold
5057054.description: Using Max's daughter as bait, Jack and Harry convince Max to meet face to face. Stranded in the jungle, Marcus stumbles across a prisoner camp. Greer visits Gloria hoping to draw a connection between Reyes and her missing husband.

5057054.title: Persona Non Grata
5057054.description: Reyes accuses the U.S. of tampering with the election. The U.S. Embassy is evacuated. Jack, Greer and Mike November must decide whether to follow orders or go off the grid. Reyes' men pursue Matice and the American soldiers in the jungle.

5057054.title: Dios y Federación
5057054.description: The election in Venezuela is moved up. Stranded in a hostile country, Jack and Mike fight for their lives, while Greer is interrogated. The Ubarri family must decide to flee or face Reyes.

5057054.title: Strongman
5057054.description: Jack heads to the Presidential Palace to retrieve Greer. When the polls are shutdown, violent protests erupt outside the palace, and Jack must make a decision that could determine his future.

5164196.title: Pilot
5164196.description: A slightly unhinged former Navy SEAL lands a job as a police officer in Los Angeles where he's partnered with a veteran detective trying to maintain a low stress level in his life.

5164196.title: Surf N Turf
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh respond to a noise complaint at a party at heavyweight boxer Ronald Dawson's Hollywood hills home. When gunshots go off, they are drawn into a major case involving illegal gun runners with advanced military technology. Riggs becomes personally invested in the case when he discovers one of their targets is a pregnant woman who reminds him of his deceased wife. Meanwhile, Trish worries about Murtaugh's health, as partnering with Riggs tests his limits.

5164196.title: Best Buds
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh follow a violent case involving a drug cartel, theft, two killings and, unfortunately, Murtaugh's old T.O., Ned Brower. As the case unfolds, it turns out that Ned is more involved than just driving the cash, which leaves Murtaugh with an inevitably dangerous decision to make. Looking for back-up, the duo turns to Cruz for help. In the midst of all the chaos, Riggs continues to depend on outside vices, rather than face the reality of Miranda's death, while Murtaugh and Trish struggle to find alone time.

5164196.title: There Goes the Neighborhood
5164196.description: A string of burglaries hits close to home for Murtaugh when one occurs in his own neighborhood, and it gets just as personal for Riggs when another break-in ends in a casualty. Meanwhile, Roger Junior connects with an old friend who might be twisted up in some criminal action of his own.

5164196.title: Spilt Milk
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs target a former Navy SEAL. Murtaugh sees a parallel between the suspect and Riggs. Murtaugh sees Riggs connection to the suspect threatens to interfere with the case.

5164196.title: Ties That Bind
5164196.description: When Riggs and Murtaugh investigate a high-profile case surrounding the murder of a young model, they uncover a vicious secret behind the locked mansion gates of one of LA's wealthiest families. Riggs gets a jolt from his past when he discovers that an old friend of his wife has ties to the case. Back at home, Murtaugh is shocked to hear that his daughter is sending promiscuous photos to her new boyfriend.

5164196.title: Fashion Police
5164196.description: As Riggs and Murtaugh examine the murder of one of L.A.'s fashion expeditors, they follow a trail of evidence that leads them to an ongoing and exceptionally dangerous underground investigation led by the Drug Enforcement Administration. In the meantime, Trish and the kids are off visiting colleges, leaving Murtaugh to a "bender" of his own, while Riggs has trouble sleeping through the night due to his all-too-real dreams of Miranda.

5164196.title: Can I Get a Witness?
5164196.description: When a million dollar casino heist takes a deadly turn, Riggs befriends the only credible witness, an eight-year-old boy, and takes him into his care. On the flip side, Murtaugh pulls some dangerous stunts in an attempt to prove to everyone that he can be a motorcycle guy. Meanwhile, Riggs contemplates what to do with the money he received from selling his home in Texas.

5164196.title: Jingle Bell Glock
5164196.description: Holiday celebrations are cut short when the precinct is called to examine a homicide linked to the deranged nephew of the drug lord who has ties to Riggs; and Murtaugh has a problem with his neighbor's excessive holiday decorations.

5164196.title: Homebodies
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh end up in the middle of a turf war as they investigate the murder of a millennial "designer drug" dealer.

5164196.title: Lawmen
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs suspect misuse of power in the LA Sheriff's department when they investigate the killing of a Texas Ranger.

5164196.title: Brotherly Love
5164196.description: Roger and Trish find themselves pitted against each other when a stolen car full of cocaine is traced to a ring of car thieves.

5164196.title: The Seal Is Broken
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh investigate a series of violent crimes with one thing in common - the victims are all members of the same church. While investigating the case, Riggs faces a moral dilemma of his own when the one-year anniversary of Miranda's death sends him to a new low. Also, Trish and Roger disagree with RJ about his future.

5164196.title: The Murtaugh File
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs discover that Cahill is being targeted by a murderous stalker after a violent car accident; Riggs begins to obsess over Murtaugh's past after finding his file in Cahill's office; Roger and Trish find their daughter's fake ID

5164196.title: As Good as It Getz
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are forced to work with DEA agent Karen Palmer again, to protect Leo Getz, an ambulance-chasing attorney who was linked to the Cartel. As the three delve further into the case, they begin to realize that Leo may not be the only one with a target on his back. In the meantime, Riggs begins to view Agent Palmer in a new light while Murtaugh is left worried after Trish makes a spontaneous decision.

5164196.title: Unnecessary Roughness
5164196.description: A murder involving a high school football phenomenon draws Riggs and Murtaugh into the lucrative - and corrupt - world of college recruiting. Meanwhile, Murtaugh considers a big change in his professional life, and Riggs contemplates an even bigger shift in his personal life, as he spends more time with DEA Agent Karen Palmer.

5164196.title: A Problem Like Maria
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh team up again with DEA Agent Karen Palmer, and together they gain inside knowledge of dangerous new cartel operations. As Riggs' attachment to Palmer deepens, so do his impulsive actions, further worrying Captain Avery and Delgado. In the meantime, Trish explores the potential of an amazing new career opportunity.

5164196.title: Commencement
5164196.description: Riggs makes a shocking discovery about Miranda's death that leads him back to the cartel in a frantic search for answers. His wild desperation leaves Murtaugh torn between his commitment to his partner and his commitment to his family.

5164196.title: El Gringo Loco
5164196.description: Riggs plans to finish off Tito Flores in Mexico where Murtaugh follows him.

5164196.title: Dancing in September
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh uncover a drug ring at a wellness clinic while investigating a plastic surgeon's death.

5164196.title: Born to Run
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh investigate the death of a famous singer's bodyguard.

5164196.title: Flight Risk
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs search for an unreliable father who committed a robbery 20,000 feet in the air with his daughter as the main witness.

5164196.title: Let It Ride
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs investigate a death that occurs moments before the victim's bet wins a horse race. Leo Getz insists it's a homicide and aids in the investigation. Meanwhile, Murtaugh updates his will, while Riggs struggles to come to terms with his past.

5164196.title: Gold Rush
5164196.description: Riggs is reunited with childhood friends and comes to realize they might be mixed up in the robbery-homicide case he and Murtaugh are investigating. Meanwhile, Murtaugh finds a joint stashed in his kitchen that he brings to Scorsese for testing in effort to bust one of his kids.

5164196.title: Birdwatching
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh investigate a surfer's death.

5164196.title: Fork-Getta-Bout-It
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh investigate a murder in a hospital that leads them to the underworld.

5164196.title: Fools Rush In
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are drawn into a fatal world of conspiracy theories. Meanwhile, Riggs' relationship with Molly evolves and Murtaugh and Trish attempt to get Harper into a fancy pre-school.

5164196.title: Wreck the Halls
5164196.description: Murtaugh's Christmas vacation in Hawaii is put on hold when he and Riggs are called to a homicide and the victim is an old friend.

5164196.title: Funny Money
5164196.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are thrown into the world of counterfeit money. When a group of teenagers inadvertently gets involved, it strikes a chord with Murtaugh, who is dealing with his own issues regarding his son, RJ. Meanwhile, Riggs decides to pay a visit to someone from his past.

5164196.title: Diggin' Up Dirt
5164196.description: A secret about Riggs' deceased wife is revealed when he visits his father-in-law in prison.

5164196.title: Better Living Through Chemistry
5164196.description: Murtaugh and Riggs respond to the murder of an escaped patient of Dr. Cahill's who mysteriously goes off the rails. The investigation brings to light a hidden scheme far bigger than they imagined. Meanwhile, Riggs' anger gets the better of him once again, causing Avery to consider whether or not he is fit to serve. Also, family tension runs high between Murtaugh and Trish, who have to make big decisions about R.J.

5164196.title: Double Shot of Baileys
